name: Geneva center - Hosting females
description:
The space
This is a private room with own half bath ( sink & toilet) to rent in a great 2 bedrooms apartment in Geneva center. The large bathroom with bathtub is shared.

It is located only 5 minutes by walk to the lake, the old town and fashion boutiques.

I am looking to host professional females, clean, no pets & no smoking.
We would share a spacious, quiet, fully furnished 2 bedroom flat, the kitchen and the living room.
There (email hidden), free WIFI, access to the washing machine and a dryer.

The flat is perfectly situated in the heart of Geneva. There is excellent public transport links (tram 12 and various busses) :
- Cornavin train station : 12min
- United Organizations : 22min
- Geneva airport : 30min

There are all the needed commodities around : Shops, supermarkets (Migros, Coop), bars, restaurants (especially nice in the old town).
I would be happy to provide you with additional informatio
host_about:
Hi, I am a Management consultant professional, working with multinational and Big 4 firms as Program Manager / Strategy alignment efforts, and Project Management Office (PMO) manager.  I travel a lot for my work.
I love living in the center of the city, where there are loads of cultural events, parks,  the lake to enjoy and do biking, jogging, walking, skying, etc.  

It is also a pleasant experience to share and get to know another culture.

name: Perfect Cozy Bedroom Close to Lake & Transport
description:
Perfect for the single traveler whether it be for work or pleasure! A cozy place to come home to in a great location where everything is easily accessible :)

The space
You will be staying in a cozy bedroom with a single bed, an armchair, and a desk (with lots of reading material :)).

You will have access to a fully equipped kitchen, bathroom, dining and living room (complete with 42" TV and surround system in case Geneva weather gets the best of you and your plans :)) as well as free wifi.

I can also provide a free (data only) SIM card which you may use during your stay (please ask for this when booking).

Guest access
You will have access to the kitchen, bathrooms, dining and living room.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is situated in the heart of Geneva and is a 15 minute walk from the lakeside (great for walking, sailing, water biking, getting wet under the famous Geneva fountain…), the main shopping district, the Old Town, several museums and parks.

There are also several amenities nearby such as bakeries for your morning (or afternoon, or evening ;)) coffee and pastries, supermarkets (even one that stays open late and is open on Sundays!), and several bars and restaurants to enjoy Geneva like a local.

I will be available throughout your stay to give you information to navigate the city and find its hidden charms. My job is to make your stay the best possible so don't hesitate to ask!
host_about:
In Geneva by way of Istanbul, Santiago, Lagos, Kobe, Milan and Boston :)
Love to laugh, talk, eat, dance, make jewelry and do whatever as long as it's in good company :)

Version Française et Anglaise

A maid is coming once a week and everything needed (towels etc.) are provided.

name: Charming apartment in city center
description:
The space
My apartment is ideally located 5 minutes walk from the lake of Geneva and 5 minutes walk from the Park Lagrange (Whitewater), in a nice area right in the center of Geneva.

The flat has a large bedroom with kingsize bed, a large living room, a small kitchen and a bathroom, with a small entrance hall.
It Is fully furnished and equipped with broadband, washing machine, dryer, dish washer, TV and stereo.

This place is perfect to accomodate up to 2 persons : for people on business trip or for couples on holidays.
Thanks to its ideal location, you will be able to easily reach the main train station, the airport, the UN, the nice Geneva old town. There is easy public transportation around.
It Is also close to shops, bars and restaurants.

I have lived in Geneva for 30 years and it will be my pleasure to introduce you to the city.
Welcome in Geneva !
host_about: Dear travelers! Welcome to Geneva and welcome to my place! I am delighted to introduce you to my beautiful city. I will make sure that your stay here is pleasant and comfortable, and that you get to see the most interesting places and events in town!

description:
Welcome dear guests,

The 3-bedroom apartment is ideally located by la Gare des Eaux-Vives, a 10 minutes walk to the center of Geneva and its beautiful lake.

The apartment has:
- 1 large double room (comfortable bed: 160cm x 200cm) + balcony,

name: 5th Sky (Downtown Geneva)
description:
Unique & quiet attic located in Pâquis, the vibrant heart of Geneva, with an amazing view and a groovy host (LGBTIQ friendly). About 150m from the central station and 10mn from the airport, the UN HQ and Palexpo (Convention centre). How cool is that? #Superhost ^_^

The space
Finding accommodation in Geneva can be really expensive and frustrating as this lively, affordable alternative to the well-heeled shopping streets on the city's Left Bank proves. This apartment is perfect for business travellers or tourists who want the simplicity and comfort of a "home away from home", above the hum and buzz of the city, without having to pay extra for all the amenities like wifi and the ability to cook at home! The view is spectacular and you can see the roofs of city, the "Jet d'eau" and - weather allowing - the french Alps, including the Mont Blanc! There is a queen-size futon and the shared bathroom has a bathtub and shower.

Guest access
Since it's
neighborhood_overview: The Pâquis quarter is one of Geneva's most colourful, where you'll find an attractive array of boho boutiques, bistros, ethnic eateries, and nightclubs. It is one of the most vibrant "neighbourhoods" of Geneva, where you will meet people from all continents, scents from far and near, busy streets and quiet parks only a few blocks away from the lake.
host_about:
Hello traveler. I'm a humanist consultant working on different projects that gather people, languages & cultures. I was born in Geneva but grew up mainly in South America, Africa and the Middle East. Looking forward to seeing you around!

“All journeys have secret destinations of which the traveler is unaware.” ~ Martin Buber

description:
The space
A small but charming 1 bedroom apartment,

It is located only 1 minute walking from to lake Geneva, just in front of "Jet d'Eau" of Geneva, the one and only. There is also a big kitchen fully equipped and one bedroom with a great quality sofa bed, (kids room will be closed) and a space to arrange your clothes!

You can easily reach the place from the airport by taking the train first (5 minutes) and a bus a the main train station of Geneva (10 minutes). This is really easy and you'll cross the "Rhone" on the famous "Mont Blanc" bridge.

The area is great, including many restaurants and really close to the old town, where you'll find good shopping possibilities and the trendiest bars in town.

description:
Comfortable and spacious 150 m2 apartment and 80 m2 terrace in the beautiful district of Geneva.
The apartment includes 3 bedrooms, 4 adult beds (5 people). There is also a large lounge and kitchen, entrance hall, two terraces and 3 bathrooms.

The space
Comfortable and spacious 150 m2 apartment and 80 m2 terrace in the beautiful district of Geneva.

The apartment includes three bedrooms, four beds for 5 people. There is also a large lounge and kitchen, entrance hall, two terraces and 3 bathrooms.

description:

The space
Our small and cute Appartment of 43sm is part of an old city house (ground floor), ideally situated 5 minutes walk from the train main station of Geneva and the river Rhône, and only 10 minutes walk from the lake.
If you want to stay in the centre of the city and enjoy a calm stay in a nicely decorated little place, then just drop by!
We have a little cat, Bouboulina, that we leave at home with the guests, so if you are allergic to cats or not fond of them, this is probably not the right place for you.

description:
This flat is located in the very heart of Geneva! It is in the centre, close to the lake, located in a quiet street while being 2 minutes walk away from the main entertainment area.

The space
This is a charming, cosy and bright apartment with romantic french balcony in a beautiful old building one minute walk from the Rhone. Centrally located, it is a mere five minutes’ walk on foot to the centre with both bus and tram stops nearby. Whilst situated on a safe, quiet street, the apartment is only a short walk from an atmospheric neighborhood with plenty of restaurants and bars.

description:
The space
Idéalement située en plein centre de Genève, cette grande chambre meublée est parfaite pour accueillir jusqu'à deux personnes, lors de vacances, et même à l'occasion d'un business trip.

Vous êtes situés à moins de 5 minutes à pied de la gare Cornavin de Genève, à 15 minutes des Nations Unies et aussi de la vieille ville et à moins de 10 minutes du magnifique bord de lac de Genève.
L'appartement est proche de toutes commodités (supermarché, bars, sympathiques restaurants, cinéma,...)

Le chambre de 15 mètres carré est entièrement meublée, avec un lit double.
Vous aurez accès à internet grâce au WIFI, et à la machine à laver.

N'hésitez pas à me contacter pour toute demande de réservations dans les dates disponibles.

Je me ferais un plaisir de vous accueillir dans cet appartement, avec un rapport qualité / prix très intéressant, et de vous donner quelques conseils sur la ville!
host_about:
Bonjour,

Je me réjouis de vous accueillir dans cette jolie chambre sous les toits, en plein cœur de Genève.
Si vous avez besoin de conseils pour visiter la ville, je vous aiderais volontiers!
Il existe beaucoup d'endroits intéressants qui ne se trouvent pas forcement dans les guides de (Website hidden by Airbnb) plaisir de vous rencontrer.
cordialement

Ideally centrally located in Geneva, in a very lively area, this very charming and design modern apartment is situated in an ancient building from 1910. It is completely renovated with quality materials and taste. The flat is fully furnished.

The bedroom (bed with high standard latex mattress) is located on the quiet side of the building, the en-suite bathroom has a nice stone basin from Bali and a walk in shower.
Design open kitchen in the living room, with a fireplace and a small balcony with a view on the square.
It is perfect for a single person or a couple, there is no extra bed available.

Public transportation are at 2 steps, as well as grocery stores, cafes and many nice restaurants.

name: An artistic studio in Geneva Old Town
description:
A very comfortable studio featuring a comfortable double bed and all the commodities. Right in the heart of Geneva Old Town - next to St. Pierre Cathedral! I invite you to spend a few nights in Geneva like a local.

The space
A cosy studio with a piano, next to famous historical landmarks of Geneva. Located in the heart of Geneva, neighbouring Saint Pierre Cathedral with an underground museum featuring history of Geneva back to the Roman times 121 BC. Art galleries, cafes and museums are at the doorstep, 5 min by foot to the main shopping street, 7 min by foot to the lake, about 20 min on foot to the train station.

Our building is very special: famous artists, lawyers and musicians live here. In 2012, George Clooney has helped raising funds for Obama campaign during privately hosted dinner held by one of the very special residents.

The studio comprises a living room with a very comfortable double bed. There is a comfy sofa for relaxing with
neighborhood_overview: Old Town is like a museum but people live here and it is not only a place for tourists. That's what makes Geneva Old Town so unique! You will walk the streets that famous writers, artists and scientists used to walk. Borges, Rousseau, Voltaire, Calvin, George Eliot and many many others could be your neighbours some other time in the past.
host_about: Hello and thank you for dropping by my profile. I am an Israeli citizen and currently reside in Geneva, Switzerland. I work as a researcher at the University studying embryo development. I have travelled a lot, mostly in Europe. I lived in Germany for many years and also for a short time in Spain, France and England. I am very comfortable sharing apartments, having guest and accommodating different cultures, mentalities and nationalities. I am passionate about music, art, theater and anything that has to do with human creativity. I am looking forward to welcome you at my home or visit yours one day. Please, feel free to message me for any enquiries you might have. Yours Eliora

Very pleasant suite with loggia (36 m2), ideally located in front of a very nice & large Park (the safest area of the city - next door to UN buildings), overlooking the city of Geneva & the Mt-Blanc mountains.

An equivalent location of that size in the Geneva’s hotels facing Geneva's water fountain & Mt Blanc starts at CHF 500.- ... per night (low season).

My flat and my daughter's flat and yours!

host_about:
C'est avec plaisir que nous vous  recevrons  tout au long de l'année à:
-VERBIER: une chambre et douche, pour profiter d'un enneigement et ensoleillement souvent privilégiés, vue panoramique magnifique!

-GENEVE pour rendre votre séjour touristique ou de travail agréable. 
Nous vous proposons 1 petit appartement avec une chambre et un salon cuisine et salle de bain.
Vous vous y sentirez vite chez vous, même si nous sommes absents. Il y a une Boite à clés avec un code. 
La décoration est simple, soignée et propre.
 Ce que j’attends de mes hôtes est de prendre soin des lieus et des voisins. Merci de vider le frigo et emporter vos poubelles.

Nous aimons la vie, le chocolat, le ski, les amis, lire, se promener dans la nature, la musique, les bons films, découvrir, échanger quelques mots sur ce que nous connaissons et ce que vous nous ferez peut-être connaître de vos expériences de voyage et de vie.
Nous aimerons votre compagnie, mais nous savons nous faire discret!

Nous attendons de nos hôtes juste qu'ils soient contents et qu'ils soient dans le respect des lieux et de chacun.

Si vous aimez les gourmandises, ne manquez pas de gouter à nos Caramels tendres au cacao fait maison avec des ingrédients de qualité et 100% Suisse!  (sur demande à la réservation)
Vous pourrez repartir avec votre petit sachet pour quelques francs suisse....

Profitons de la vie et de ce qu'elle nous offre!

A bientôt

LIENS UTILES:
transports publiques et ligne de bus qui passe devant l'appartement de Genève:
Application pour les transports public de Genève: TPG
Application pour le partage de place de Park à Genève: parku
Verbier location de matériel de ski à la Boite a ski.
Alpibus depuis l'aéroport, navettes.

We are located in a great privilege and quiet residential área, with 3 supermarkets close by, restaurants an cafeterías, convenient store 7/7, medical center righ down the building, gym just 50mts, etc.

The location of this apartment is ideal for touring Geneva by walking, since you have everything close by, restaurants, shops, supermarkets, department stores, Lake 15 minutes walking, the old town of Geneva just next to the lake and other attractions very accessible.

Next to the United Nations with a direct bus that takes you there in 6 minutes, close to the center of Geneva, where you can enjoy the most recognized touristics attractions, shopping, etc. approx. 10 minutes, Gare de Cornavin in 8 minutes, the offices of Rolex 10 minutes. by direct bus. direct tramway to the CERN in about 15 mins from home. 15 mins. from CICR (International red cross head quarter) and the International Museum of Red Cross. 20 mins. from Mission of United States of America. 20 mins.
host_about:
I am a calm, respectful and with much zest for life, that is, I consider every second of life as a universal gift, opt for the good energy and always appreciate the positive side of things without judging because I see life with simplicity though I am not conformist. Respect and loyalty offered in exchange.

 For the rest I am an adventurous person who likes to travel and discover new horizons, I am easy to adapt, both in the most chic and in humble surroundings, I love to collaborate with the world and with those who need it whenever I have time and economic background.

I'm in for all gastronomic discovery, as I am a good eater :-), I am a person who likes to learn from every experience, open to listening without taking anything personally, among others.

description:
The space
We are renting a beautiful big private room with a double bed (king size), a flat screen TV, a private bathroom (shower over the bath) and private toilet in a luxury apartement with high ceilings.

It is tastefully decorated with paintings and antiques.
It is ideally situated right in the middle of the bank and theatre disctrict in the city center of Geneva, next to the famous Victoria Hall and 2 minutes walk from the Grand Theatre.
The main shopping streets of Rue du Rhone and Rue de Rive are only 5 minutes walk away. It is the ideal location to visit Geneva !!!

host_about:
J'aime beaucoup voyager et rencontrer des gens de tous horizons :-)
J'ai travaillé 20 ans comme médecin en cabinet privé à Genève et 11 ans comme médecin responsable de la santé des délégués du Comité International de la Croix Rouge à Genève. 
Actuellement je suis à la retraite, je séjourne régulièrement dans ma maison de Provence et j'aimerais en faire profiter à mes hôtes ainsi que du plaisir de partager la douceur de cette terre d'accueil qu'est la Provence notamment la Drôme provençale.

I love travelling and meeting new people ,-)
Guests become my friends !!!
Jacqueline: I was a doctor (GP) working in private consultation in Geneva and for the ICRC. Now retired, I love travelling between Switzerland and my holiday house in Provence and I will be great to share with guests.

description:

In a building of the early 1900, the luxury high ceilings 75sqm contemporain loft is composed of an open space with three sections.

A large living room with a confortable sofa, a luxury sound system and a beamer for watching movies on an automatic screen of 3 meters large. A comfortable dinning room for 6 people. A bedroom with a King size bed. The open kitchen is fully equiped with an oven, a microwave, a laundry (wash/dry) unit, a fridge, a nespresso machine, iron and many other facilities. It has a separated toilets and a brand new bathroom with a giant mirror and a tube. Many different and spacious closets are disposed all over the appartment. The high door/windows bring a fantastic sun light in the loft and an acess to a private white gravel garden of 60sqm equiped with a professional barbecue
neighborhood_overview:
Eaux-Vives neighbourhood is full of trendy animated bars and good restaurants. You cannot go wrong. Also, the two principal parks of Geneva are literally at 5 minutes walk. Large well maintained grass areas and a stunning variety of flowers are only waiting for you. In summer time the rosary of the "Parc des Eaux-Vives" is just a must view and in the evening free open air concerts will let you enjoy live jazz, rock and other world music. The Museum of Natural History is also at 5 minutes walk.

name: Stylish Loft - Amazing Views
description:
The perfect place to stay while in Geneva. A stylish and comfortable modern loft apartment with loads of character, original wood beams and views of the river Rhône and Salève mountain - only 10 mins from the main train station.

The space
Stunning, light, loft apartment full of character on the 6th floor (with new elevator) of an early 20th Century block in the Jonction area of Geneva.

Beautiful wood beams and copious plants make this a perfect oasis above the city with views of the Rhone river from the back and the Alps and Saleve from the front.

Fully fitted kitchen and bathroom with bath and shower.

Modern, bright mid-century modern living area with Middle Eastern inspired bedroom suitable for one or two people to stay.

Tram 14 from outside the flat takes you into the city centre in 5 mins and the train station in less than 10 minutes. You can walk along the river to the side of Lake Geneva in around 15 to 20 mins. I
neighborhood_overview:
Jonction is the place where the Rhône and the Arve meet on the west side of Geneva, but it’s also the place where Geneva's inhabitants meet up in the summer to bask along the water’s edge.

Urban and trendy, this future eco-area just five minutes from the city centre is expanding with the creation of pedestrian zones and green spaces.

On the south side of the neighbourhood, the Bois de la Bâtie forest delights little ones with its animal park and older ones with its legendary music festival, catering for all tastes.

Jonction is conveniently located only 15 minutes walk from the shores of Lake Geneva along the River Rhône.

On the doorstep is the best of the city - with supermarkets, transport links and restaurants - and the best of nature with the Rhône flowing past and a quiet forest only minutes away.
host_about: British but living in Geneva - clean and tidy - love design, architecture and interesting apartments with loads of character and warmth. Love to travel - experience new places - meet interesting new people.

The United Nations with a direct bus that takes you there in 6/8 minutes from home ( max. 20 mins easy and flat walking)

host_about:
I am a calm, respectful and with much zest for life, that is, I consider every second of life as a universal gift, opt for the good energy and always appreciate the positive side of things without judging because I see life with simplicity though I am not conformist. Respect and loyalty offered in exchange.

 For the rest I am an adventurous person who likes to travel and discover new horizons, I am easy to adapt, both in the most chic and in humble surroundings, I love to collaborate with the world and with those who need it whenever I have time and economic background.

I'm in for all gastronomic discovery, as I am a good eater :-), I am a person who likes to learn from every experience, open to listening without taking anything personally, among others.

We are renting 4 rooms in our nice house in Geneva, ideally located 5 minutes walking distance from Palexpo, where the famous Geneva Motor Show takes place, in March every year. We are at 15 minutes walking distance from Geneva Airport. We are also at walking distance from UN organizations (20 minutes to WHO and ILO). Also not so far from CERN (45 min by public transport / 15min by car)

By booking this listing, you are booking a room (Swiss Chalet Style) with a double bed (140cm // 355.6 inches) that can accommodate up to 2 persons.
neighborhood_overview:
Whit it’s 12’000 citizens Grand-Saconnex is a very nice, clean quite neighborhood but still with action due all the important the important scenes.


At a 5-10 min walk from the house you will find 3 supermarkets (Migros, coop and Denner), 2 tobacco shops, 3 restaurants (2 italian, 1 swiss), 2 pharmacies and one post office.

Of course you can always ask us for other restaurants or other places you would like to experience in Geneva and we will always advice you the best we can!
host_about:
We are a very friendly family living in Geneva.
We love cooking, travelling and getting to know new persons.
We are looking forward to welcome you here in Switzerland, and make you feel at home


*The house is shared with other guests.*

name: Chic loft in the Geneva countryside
description:
The space
Chic & cosy! An incredible loft - appartement in the Geneva countryside, just a couple of minutes from the center by public transports! Recently renovated (i'm an interior designer), with a breath-taking view on the Mont-Blanc!

The appartement offers all the modern comfort:
a fully equiped kitchen with a central unit, a dishwasher, a washing machine, a comfortable bathroom with an italian shower, separate toilets, wi-fi, no TV but a huge DVD collection and a beamer...
Very well served by the public transports! A direct line to the center stops in front of the house! And you also have free parking lots in front of the house.
The appartement's situated on the 1st floor of an old farm house from the 19th century, on the "rive gauche" of the typically Geneva countryside. It's close to the World Economic Forum! This beautiful region offers lots of activities & gustative discoveries : you can have a brunch on a farm, buy vegetables from a fa
neighborhood_overview: The house's situated in a very small village in the rural zone of Geneva, surrouned by wineyards and green gardens and looking at the Mt Blanc. It's a beautiful region for walks, bike (and horse!) rides, birds watching. And all just a 15 min bus drive from the center of the city!
host_about: I'm a freelance interior & graphic designer, a DJ and I run a music booking agency. I I love travelling, meeting people, discovering new places.

For medium and long stay, contact us for a fair reduction.

The space
Composed by a hall, a large living room (kitchen, living, bedroom...) and a bathroom. Elegant and contemporary it has a very nice view on a residential park.

Peaceful and central, 5 to 10 minutes (by tram ,bike or foot ) to the center of the city and the old town, 15 Minutes to the railway station and 20 to the airport, 20 min to UN..

Room in our apartment where we live my husband and myself, located in an old building, not far from the famous fountain, the Jet d'eau, at one block from a wonderful parc, ideal for joggers. There is one double bed and I add up to 3 single beds according to the number of guests.

The space
Hello, we are a couple and are renting a large room in our private apartment, with nice decoration, high ceilings.
You would rent one large room, with a double bed (comfortable sofa bed). We can also add 3 extra single bed. This room can then accommodate up to 5 guests.

Guest access

neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in a quiet area with a large range of international restaurant and movies theaters at walking distance. Taxis station just in front of the appartment and in diagonal, a nice tea room. Old town, 10 minutes walking from our building.
There is the largest park of Geneva right next to the flat, and we also recommend to enjoy a nice jogging around the beautiful lake border, 2 minutes away.
host_about:
Hello, 

We are Fabrizio and Adrienne. We are friendly and open-minded persons.  We like to meet new peoples from different cultures and interact with them, thus looking forward to hosting Airbnb members at my nice and warm place.

We speak several languages of which Spanish my mother tongue, English and French.

Among our hobbies, there is interior decoration. We like sports and enjoy traveling.

I am a Professional event organizer specialized in public and press relations and overall communications, having worked in both the humanitarian and business field. Now, I am teaching event management in a school of hospitality. My partner is a Professor of history.

name: Perfect location to United Nations
description:
You will stay in a fully furnished, equipped and quiet 3rd story apartment in a stylish 1930ies building. Breakfast awaits you on your 1st night. Welcome to Geneva!

The space
Great flat on the third floor of a 1930s traditional stone house, right between Geneva's main station and it's airport and only minutes away from major UN agencies, this place is perfect for your Geneva business trip but also for your holidays.

It is close to the main tram and bus lines of the city and within short walking distances you will find shops, restaurants, bars and all you need to feel at home while away!

You will access the apartment by elevator, the building is nice and has recently been renovated. You will also enjoy a balcony which is great to sit on in summer enjoying the "apéro" or even use the BBQ (provided).

The flat is fully equipped and includes an oven, microwave, dish-washer, washing machine, 42' flat-screen TV and wireless Internet. For

There are furthermore 3 grocery shops, a movie theatre and a lot of restaurants and cafes around. And on Thursdays you can enjoy a street market just a block away.
host_about: I love freedom, encounters and most of all travelling. I like learning new things, to open up to new horizons and I am always fascinated by these 1000 facets that our world is offering us! All that is required is to encounter the world with an open mind, and open eyes and ears. Carpe Diem ! :-)

description:
Stylish room to rent in beautiful 120m2 apartment in Geneva for single, double or twin occupation (1 queen-size bed, 1 single bed).

The space
The apartment is located quietly but very central in the St-Jean quarter (UN/CERN/airport side), only 3 bus stops from the main railway station and 15 minutes from the airport. There is a direct bus connection to the UN quarter.

The room is equipped with free Wi-Fi, iPod/Android/MP3 sound station incl. alarm clock, cupboard, and office table. There is a 20" plasma TV connected to a DVD player (no TV reception).

Other shared facilities: Fully equipped kitchen with tea kettle, espresso machine, microwave and toaster (incl. free Nespresso coffee/tea supplies). Bathroom with tub/shower, toilet and hair dryer. Separate guest toilet. Living room with 40" LED TV, Dolby surround stereo, DVD/Blu-ray, and beamer (200+ DVDs on stock, Pay-per-View movies and sports events optional).

Balcony leading to
neighborhood_overview: Calm, residential neighbourhood next to the city center and the river/lake. Close to airport, UN and CERN.
host_about:
I am Peter, a sociable, open-minded and welcoming Swiss guy living in Geneva since 1995. I work as head of operations for a human rights NGO.

My wife and I love travelling and meeting people as much as you do, so accommodation-wise we do expect a certain standard when being away. Be assured we are doing our very best to make you meet your expectations. We are pretty confident you will not be disappointed!

Looking forward to meeting you soon at my place!  :-)

name: Appartement avec jardin à Genève
description:
Un appartement style loft dans une maison individuelle avec accès au jardin. Un très bel espace, au calme, à quelques minutes du centre ville.

The space
La campagne en ville...
Vaste appartement de charme au rez de chaussée d'une maison avec jardin. Avec le printemps qui arrive enfin, vous pourrez en profitez!
Une cuisine dans la véranda, noyée dans la verdure, un salon et une salle de bain particulière... avec baignoire sur pied. Deux chambres, l'une avec un lit double, la seconde est une chambre d'enfant, avec un lit simple qui peut se dédoubler au besoin.
Un endroit atypique, qui pour moi à une âme, plus bohème que design!
Idéalement situé: au calme, mais à proximité des transports publics (tram 12 et bus 5/ 25). Proche sortie autoroute (à 5 minutes de la douane de Vallard).
Le vieux village de Chêne-Bourg est à quelques centaine de mètres. Plusieurs bons restaurants. Proche des commerces, de la piscine de Thonex et du centre spor

name: Bright room in duplex penthouse
description:
The space
Bright room in duplex penthouse with stamp in downtown Geneva. 200m from the train station, 200m from the lake.
Shower, private toilet.
160x200cm bed
Air conditioning, wi-fi, DVD player, hair dryer.
A few steps from the lively Geneva, all amenities nearby, supermarkets, post office, bus and train station, public transport.
Tourist office 100m.
Building with access code. Private floor.
Kettle, tea, coffee

Partial view of the Jet d'Eau.
Many restaurants down the building.

Washing machine and tumble dryer also available.
We can speak french, english, spanish, vietnamese, mandarine and cantonese.
neighborhood_overview: Ideally located in the center city, half way from the train and the bus station. 200m from the lake. Many restaurants in the area and in the back street.
host_about:
Jean-Philippe:
Je suis français, je suis venu en Suisse pour 2 semaines de vacances et je ne suis jamais reparti depuis plus de 20 ans. J'ai vécu à Genève et aussi à Lausanne. Je suis infirmier de formation, puis je suis devenu cadre de soins. Je me suis ensuite réorienté pour diriger un restaurant à Genève.
Aujourd'hui je donne un nouveau souffle à ma carrière pour les années à venir.
J'aime: les langues étrangères, voyager, les films, la lecture, la cuisine, bien manger, passer des soirées entre amis, faire de nouvelles rencontres, la randonnée.
Je parle français , anglais, espagnol, je me débrouille en allemand et je comprends l'italien.
J'aime cuisiner, donc si vous venez au bon moment, j'ai peut-être un plat en préparation et vous aurez la chance de le partager avec nous.

Xuong:
Je suis vietnamien, je suis arrivé en Suisse en novembre 2012. J'apprends le français, pour le moment je ne travaille pas.
J'aime la cuisine vietnamienne, jouer au tennis sur PS3, le cinéma, la mer, rencontrer du monde, la campagne, sortir avec des amis, voyager.
Je parle vietnamien, anglais, mandarin, cantonais et je commence le français.

Nous avons toujours eu des invités d'un genre ou un autre occupant nos chambres d'amis. Nous aimons avoir des invités. Nous apprécions de passer du temps avec mais ils peuvent aussi mener leur petite vie dans leur coin, comme nous avons aussi parfois besoin de tranquillité.

Nous sommes heureux de pouvoir recevoir des gens des quatre coins du monde et de partager et échanger avec eux. Nous tenterons de leur faire découvrir la vie en Suisse et les bonnes combines que nous connaissons pour profiter au mieux de notre ville.

GLBT bienvenus

Jean-Philippe:
I am French, I came to Switzerland for 2 weeks vacation and I never left for nearly 20 years. I lived in Geneva and also in Lausanne. I am a nurse, and I became nurse manager. I then shifted to run a restaurant in Geneva.
Today I give a new life to my career for years to come.
Likes: foreign languages​​, traveling, movies, reading, cooking, eat well, spend evenings with friends, meet new people, hiking.
I speak French, English, Spanish, German I'm doing and I understand Italian.

I love to cook, so if you come at the right time, I may have been baking and you'll get to share with a cup of tea or coffee or vietnamese coffee.

Xuong:
I am Vietnamese, I arrived in Switzerland in November 2012. I'm learning French at the moment I'm not working.
I love Vietnamese food, play tennis on PS3, cinema, sea, meet people, the countryside, out with friends, traveling.
I speak Vietnamese, English, Mandarin, Cantonese and I started the French.

We've had guests of one kind or another occupying my spare rooms for most of life - I enjoy having guests, and love to entertain, but we can appreciate giving people their own quiet space as we also need our own privacy.
We are happy to hear from people around the world to share and exchange with them. We try to introduce them to life in Switzerland.

GLBT Friendly

This - fully furnished & serviced - two bedroom apartment is located in Plainpalais, the vibrant and beautiful Geneva’s district.

description:
Hello Everybody,

It comprises a good sized double bedroom and a bathroom with shower/tub to be shared. Common areas are a bright reception room and eat-in kitchen. High speed Internet WiFi available. Bed sheet, duvet and towels are provided. Weekly and Check out cleaning mandatory;

Private garden that leads directly on to a park.
Furnished, with washing machine, dishwasher and WiFi.
Perfect for a small family relocating to Geneva and seeking medium-term accomodation.

The space
This ground floor furnished flat is within walking distance of the central railway station and close to supermarkets and public transport.
It is truly unique in that it has a large garden that leads directly on to a park, via a private path with locked gate.
The building is secure and the neighbours are quiet and calm.

neighborhood_overview:
Easy to reach by public transport, within walking distance of the station and 20 minutes by bus from the UN and the airport.
Busses 6, 10 and 19 stop within 2 minutes of the apartment
Buses 9, 11, 7 and tram 14 stop 5 minutes walk away.
Several food stores with long hours within a few minutes walk.
The apartment is just minutes away from several nice cafés and restaurants. The Café de la Limite is a classic Geneva restaurant, just at the end of the street. Also Portuguese, Argentinian, Italian, Ethiopian, Thai, Mexican and other restaurants within 5 minutes walk.
There are several large parks and easy access to the rivers (Rhône and Arve) for those who like an easily accessible bit of nature, for jogging or walking.

The Pâquis district is folksy and authentic. The district hustles and bustles with multicultural vivacity – a wonderful melting pot where the world’s people meet and socialise.
Here you'll find Geneva’s popular roots. Meet residents of all nationalities and cultures, a unique mixture you won’t find elsewhere in town. From the Rue de Lausanne down to the lakeside, stroll to the Bains des Pâquis and explore restaurants and shops reflecting this multiculturalism. The district of a thousand flavours also represents the multicoloured Geneva!

name: Beautiful attic center town
description:
Two bedrooms (king and queen-size beds), beautiful spacious living room, open kitchen. Huge terrace along the whole apt. 8 mins walk from train station, 2 mins from lake, 3 tram stops from UN. Quiet, very animated and characteristic area (restaurants, bars).

The space
You will feel at home! The environment is very welcoming and warm.
It is well heated and the rooms have access to the big terrace through window doors. It's on the 6th floor and exposed to South so it receives sun all day long. It's therefore full of light.
There is a king-size bed in the bedroom and a queen-size bed in an upper room.
The living room is spacious and charming.
The kitchen is completely furnished and it has a dishwasher.
The bathroom has a shower and a bath tab.
There is an elevator.

Wifi.

Guest access
The appartement is situated
neighborhood_overview:
The apparment is situated in a quiet street in the most colorful district of Geneva, Paquis. Les Pâquis is also one of Geneva's most appealingly multicultural districts with a diversity and distinctly urban feel. It's popular both for good shopping and for its boho bathing spot on Lake Geneva, the Bains des Pâquis. You'll find an attractive array of boutiques, bistros, ethnic eateries, and nightclubs.
You'll come across interesting clothing and music.
host_about: I love interacting with people to create new ideas, (Website hidden by Airbnb) change the world. I love to let people surprise me and reveal aspects of life I did not know before. I love art and working with artists for my job. I love adventure, unknown and learning. I love to see myself and people grow and overcome the limits we thought we had.

name: Beautiful modern apartment in Champel
description:
Fully furnished contemporary apartment located in Champel.
3 bed rooms apartment in a small residential building, completed in 2011 with all amenities including a large terrace and an exculsive garden. Close to the city center in the greenery.

The space
• Fully fitted kitchen (dish washer, washing machine, fridge and cooker, Nespresso coffee machine)
• Stone flooring
• En-suite bathroom with modern walk in shower for the master bedroom.
• Bedroom with double deck bed for children
• Guest room with a comfortable sofa bed.
• Bathroom with double sink, bath and shower
• Guest toilet
• Open space kitchen, dining room and living room
• Private access to the elevator to the apartment
• High quality finishings
• 1 parking bay in a garage
• Cellar
• Large balcony (20m2)
• Private garden with children playing area
• CCTV in the building and alarm in the apartment

Guest access
neighborhood_overview:
Champel is one of the nicest and most sought after suburbs of Geneva, very close to downtown.
The apartment is in a peaceful and green surroundings on a hill overlooking the river Arve valley.
It is in a dead end street with no traffic.
Very close to the circular highway.
Close to several bus stops which will drive you all around the city.
host_about:
I'm swiss and lived most of my time in Switzerland. Since 2009, we are expat in Dubai and our first place has been the Marina which, my family and I, we love. 
I am a graphic designer and I love design + architecture. We have choosen the iconic Cayan tower because of its contemporary architecture and it's geographical situation. Beach, life, restaurant, bars, movement are all around. We belive it is a very nice place to stay in Dubai.

Vous trouverez à proximité immédiate tous les commerces nécessaires, ainsi que de nombreux restaurants et le lac à quelques minutes à pied.

Une belle salle de bain en marbre avec baignoire complète ce charmant bien.
Buanderie commune à disposition.
Immeuble sans ascenseur ( 4ème étage, petits étages).

description:

The space
In the surrounding environment of the flat, there are:
- several big supermarkets for food or more.
- lots of international restaurants among which delicious pizzerias.
- the jet of water only 3 minutes on foot.
- beautiful parks at a very short walking distance
- several bus lines round the corner of the building.
- the possibility to go to the city centre on foot (7-10 minutes)

Mon studio est calme et ensoleillé. Il est pratiquement au centre ville et on entend les oiseaux....

Il est à Malagnou, quartier haut de gamme de Genève, près du parc Bertrand qui est un parc agréable dans ce quartier calme et résidentiel. Vous pourrez profiter de ce parc avec sa grande variété de beaux arbres et de fleurs.
host_about: Suissesse, ayant vécu beaucoup à l'étranger, j'aime rencontrer des personnes d'origines diverses et conseiller quoi voir et quoi faire à Genève. Si la personne préfère la tranquillité, je donne les clefs et m'éclipse.

The space
Vous choisissez l'excellence ! Vue sur le fleuve (l'Arve), calme garantie, lumineux, en plein centre-ville, près de la vieille ville, le parc des Bastions, Carouge, Plainpalais, le lac Léman, le jet d’eau et la gare Cornavin.
Visite virtuelle sur youtube, cliquez sur;
Chambre Genève centre (Room for rent in Geneva Switzreland) .
possibilité de louer une chambre, pour un prix spéciale !!!

Notre quartier, est très lumineux, c’est le quartier des étudiants, artistes, personnalités politiques, acteurs de cinéma Suisse, employés de la télé
neighborhood_overview:
Situé au cœur de Genève, dans notre quartier une place de parking est loué jusqu’à 450 CHF / mois, donc louer chez nous, c’est une bonne affaire!
Côté Sud: le quartier de Carouge , parfait pour les sorties, on est pas loin des célèbre bars ; le Chat Noir, Bypass, Monte-Cristo, et du Stade de Genève, le centre Praille.
Côté nord: La vieille ville, les musées, quartiers des banques, grand théâtre, Hôpital universitaire, Parc des Bastions, rue du Rhône, le lac Léman, les bains des Pâquis, Genève Plage, Baby Plage, Cinéma Rialto et Rex . Jardin Anglais, Horloge fleurie. Le parc La grange organise des concerts gratuits tous les mercredis et vendredis de l'été.
Côté ouest: le quartier de Plainpalais, les plus célèbres galerie d’arts, marché aux puces ; tous les mercredis, samedis et dimanches. Palce du cirque, la plus grande piste de Skate en Europe ! description:
Chambre privé dans un appartement (55 m2), dans un quartier calme, plain centre de Genève, près de la vieille ville, parc des Bastion, Tram 12, 15 et 18. internet. Visite virtuelle, Youtube : Chambre Genève centre (Room for rent in Geneva Switzreland

The space
Vous choisissez l'excellence ! Matériaux et meuble de qualité, on aimes le luxe et on vous offre une chance de le partager avec vous ! Vue sur le fleuve (l'Arve), calme garantie, lumineux, en plein centre-ville, près de la vieille ville, le parc des Bastions, Carouge, Plainpalais, le lac Léman, le jet d’eau et la gare Cornavin. Visite virtuelle sur youtube, cliquez sur; Chambre Genève centre (Room for rent in Geneva Switzreland). Extrêmement bien situé, rive gauche, entre le quartier de plainpalais et carouge, un lieu très animé tout au long de l’année et très recherché, par les Genevois pour sa qualité de vie et son niveau sociale élevé! Notre quartier, est très lumineux, c’est le quartier des étudiants, a
neighborhood_overview:
Situé au cœur de Genève, dans notre quartier une place de parking est loué jusqu’à 450 CHF / mois, donc louer chez nous, c’est une bonne affaire! J'ai enregistrer sur ce site plusieurs adresse utile prés de l'appartement il suffit d'allez sur Guide (Map), elle seront disponible sur mon deuxième annonce (Genève Appartement centre 3 pièces).
Côté Sud: le quartier de Carouge , parfait pour les sorties, on est pas loin des célèbre bars ; le Chat Noir, Bypass, Monte-Cristo, et du Stade de Genève, le centre Praille. Côté nord: La vieille ville, les musées, quartiers des banques, grand théâtre, Hôpital universitaire, Parc des Bastions, rue du Rhône, le lac Léman, les bains des Pâquis, Genève Plage, Baby Plage, Cinéma Rialto et Rex . Jardin Anglais, Horloge fleurie. Le parc La grange organise des concerts gratuits tous les mercredis et vendredis de l'été. Côté ouest: le quartier de Plainpalais, les plus célèbres galerie d’arts, marché aux puces ; tous les mercredis, samedis et dimanches.

description:
Only for long-term rent! Spacious fully furnished 3 room apartment (plus kitchen) with washer/dryer, Wi-fi, flatscreen TV. 1 Bedroom with large double bed, living room & kitchen. Sleeps easily 4 or 6 (4 in bedrooms plus extra 2 on Sofa in needed). Everything at your doorstep: 6mins walk to the lake, 7mins tram to UN and the airport. Not to be missed!

The space
Perfect base to discover Geneva or for temporary living! Everything at your doorstep. A comfortable, quiet and super-centrally located 3 room flat.

Here are the details!
- Wonderful 3 'pieces'(rooms) apartment in the central neighborhood of Paquis
- Great location, 6 minutes walk to the lake and the boats/mouettes to Eaux Vives and 7mins walk to Cornavin Train Station, next to all amenities (Supermarkets Migros, Coop, pharmacy, Silhouette gym, bus stops #1, #25, Tram #15 are less than 5minutes away)

neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood of Paquis is bustling with energy - tons of bars and restaurants are as stone's throw away while the apartment is ideally located on the quiet side of rue de Berne. A 30km/hr speed limit means there's limited noise and traffic on the street. Public transport (Tram and Bus) can take you anywhere in the city. The Train station that gives you access to the rest of Switzerland is only 7 minutes away.
host_about:
Living in Geneva/Switzerland for the past 10 years, I love travelling, meeting new people and also hosting them.
You can also find me on (Website hidden by Airbnb) - as Kostas S. (and I dont charge for hospitality) :)
Check my references over there as well!

I have discovered AirBnb very recently and I think it's a brilliant way of being able to visit places in an affordable and different way. I am tired of hotels (I use them a lot with work) so this is a great way to travel!

My motto? Life is not a dress-rehearsal, you have one shot for this show!

Our place: My wife and I are renting out our place whenever we are out of Geneva. Come and enjoy Geneva and its surroundings using our centrally located place as your base!

neighborhood_overview:
Carouge is one of the municipalities of the Canton of Geneva (Switzerland) covering a surface of 2.7 km2. The highest elevation is 386 m (1,266 ft), in June 2014 the population amounts to 21,125 inhabitants and I am one of them!
I know, not everybody is interested in history, but I cannot do otherwise. During my two years living here I learned that the „Carougoise“ are very proud of their past. Here it comes:

In 1754 Carouge was „invented“ by the duke of Savoy envisioning it as a trading competitor to Geneva, which was just 2 km away, on the other side of the river Arve. Due to religous tolerance the small hamlet quickly (18 years) grew to a prosperous town of fourthousand and became a refuge for Catholics and Jews and for Protestants tired of the puritan mentality ruling in Geneva.

These days I like to stroll through the criss-crossing streets and attractive buildings develloped by Turinese achitects. The photo above I took during a guided tour through th

My studio is located in Paquis with all convenient stores and touristic places in walking distance. Best Japanese restaurant ? Just across the street. A cool English Pub ? Just on the left. Sheesha you said ? again downstairs ! Supermarkets Migros, Coop, Denner within 90 seconds walk.

It has a combined dining and kitchen room and a big bed room which could be closed for privacy by a sliding door. Nice locality and a friendly host to help you here.

Photos are old, apartment looks better now.

The space
Jetd'eau view from balcony



If I am in the city I would definitely chill with the guests or leave them alone - as per their preference.

Even in the most peaceful city of the world, we have managed to have a bustling locality with sheesha places, bars and clubs, lake and the amazing restaurants ! It's a red light area of the city and hence complex personalities on streets leading to an interesting mix of people

Charmante chambre à coucher calme, salon et douche + WC dans une villa privée, entrée indépendante Idéal pour hommes d'affaires ou séjour de vacances. Possibilité 2 personnes,
La chambre est d'environ 20m2 mt. Equipée avec TV et pour se préparer le petit déjeuner dans la chambre.

name: 18th century apt. in Old City
description:
Very charming 1710 building, overlooking greenery, very quiet, 3.5m meter ceiling height.
Very large living room with fireplace, dining room, functional kitchen, two bedrooms.

host_about:
Professor of innovation management at IMD, Switzerland. For several years, he was associated with the incubator  Generics (now Sagentia), in Cambridge, UK. 
He frequently acts as an adviser to companies on effective innovation management, new ventures and technology commercialisation.
Georges was born and raised in Lyon, France. After obtaining a PhD in Chemistry & Materials Science from the University of Toronto, Canada, he joined the contract research organisation Battelle, becoming manager of a 35 staff business unit. His clients were multinational companies; several of his eight granted patents have been licensed to create new activities in the client companies.
He has written five books; after “From science to business” (see: (Website hidden by Airbnb) on technology transfer, his latest book is on innovation in China: “Created in China - How China is becoming a Global Innovator”(Bloomsbury, London, 2016).Release of the Chinese translation end of 2016 with CITIC Press, in Beijing.

Gabriel

Il y a quelques bons restaurants autour et des petits super-marchés. Un dépanneur/tabac très gentil en bas de l'immeuble si vous manquez de quelque chose.
Pour ceux qui veulent vraiment bien commencer leur séjour à Genève, je vous conseille vivement les Bains des Pâquis, sur le lac et vue sur la ville et le Jet d'eau ;), lieu populaire et atypique ouvert de 7 à 22h, on s'y baigne, on s'y ballade, on y mange bien et vraiment pas cher, en hiver c'est sauna, massages et fondue. name: Spacious Geneva luxury apt - easy access to UN
description:
Spacious, bright, beautifully apartment (85sq meters /1bdr) in luxury building from 1890 with fireplace. Central location in Geneva. Very safe neighborhood. 1.2km walk to downtown train station. 12 minute bus ride from airport. Walking distance to lake (400m), grocery stores (20m), shops & restaurants. Direct bus to UN Palais, WTO, UNICEF, WMO, UNHCR, ITU, WIPO, GAVI, Campus Biotech, HUG Hospital Universitaire de Genève, CICG Congress Centre.

The space
Here for work? You are 12 minute walk from the downtown train station. 15 minute bus ride from airport. There is a direct bus to UN organisations including: WTO, UNICEF, OWM, WIPO, UNHCR, ITU, UN Palais. There is also a direct bus to Deloitte, PWC, the banking district including UBS, HUG Hospital Universitaire de Genève, CICG Congress Centre. Walking distance to lake, shops & restaurants.

Bright, beautiful and zen with a real European feel, the apartment is the perfect pied-à-terre for any one visiti
neighborhood_overview: Centrally located, it is a residential neighborhood where you can find neighborhood restaurants, grocery stores, small cafés. There is a also Les Tilleuls Ateliers featuring art studios.
host_about: Originally from Canada, I've been living in Geneva since 2012 and working for the University Hospital Lausanne Foundation. Prior, I worked for an international NGO that conducts medical research on tropical diseases. I lead a team of fundraisers in Geneva, Tokyo, Rio, New York and Berlin responsible for in raising funds from governments and private donors such as the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation in Seattle.  I love my place, I  love living here and made a lot of new friends from around the world.  I'm also completed my MBA at the University of Geneva.  And when I have time off, I enjoy travelling, skiing, hiking, swimming in the lake and meeting new people.  I've been told by friends who visit how they enjoy spending time in my place - and describe it as being zen, always clean, comfortable, beautiful, inviting and welcoming.  If you are coming for a holiday, my home is an ideal pied-à-terre for sightseeing. If you are here for work and need a place till you find your new home, it's ideally located to get to UN organisations such as the UN, UNHRC, ITU and countless NGOs.  I look foward to meeting you and welcoming you to my home.  Merci et au plaisir!

neighborhood_overview: The place of Bourg-de-Four is a place of the old city of Geneva in Switzerland. Former location of markets and fairs, it is today a tourist place. You will find several examples of 16th century architecture, the fountain that occupies its center and surrounded by shops, restaurants, art galleries, bookshops and upscale boutiques. The biggest church in Geneva, St. Peter's Cathedral, is nearby: a stolen passage, called "Degrees of Chickens", leads in the form of a staircase between and under the buildings.
host_about:
Ce que j'aime : voyager dans le monde entier + rencontrer des nouvelles personnes tous les jours + s'adapter à toutes les cultures du monde + pratiquer le plus de sports différents + manger toutes les plats, même les plus bizarres + photographier et partager avec mes amis. 

Je suis un bon hôte car : j'aime recevoir + je vous mets à disposition tout le confort dont vous auriez besoin + je vous prépare votre séjour en ville comme en montagne en vous mettant à disposition des bons plans et bonnes adresses en fonction de la saison où vous venez + je suis à disposition pendant tout votre séjour. Vous pourrez communiquer avec moi en tout temps, je réponds relativement vite. 

Ma devise dans la vie : Faites ce que vous voulez.... maintenant et sans hésiter.

The space
Called "Les Grottes", this calm neighbourhood is very central and offers many quiet spots, small streets, various restaurants and a nice park (called "Parc des Cropettes"), where once a year in June a Jazz Festival is held (25th to 28th June 2020).

Located right behind the Geneva Railway Station (called "Genève Cornavin"), this flat is very central and convenient, especially for the Geneva International Motor Show (5th - 15th March 2020).

Motor Show, CERN, United Nations and other International Organisations are very easily accessible by public transport:
- Palexpo (Mot
neighborhood_overview: The building is located behind the railway station, in a neighbourhood called "Les Grottes" (french for The Caves), a nice, quiet and interesting little spot, with some good restaurants, sub-culture art places, bars and a weekly food market. Nextdoor is a refreshing park called "Les Cropettes", where once a year a free jazz festival takes place (around June).

host_about:
Keys'n'Fly - Airbnb Management Solution That Suits You
My name is Marc with Keys'n'Fly Vacation Rentals, a full service property management company based out of Geneva, Switzerland. My team and I strive to make every experience a seamless one, no matter where your trip may take you. As hospitality professionals experts, we are dedicated to provide superior customer service with attentiveness to inquiries and our guests while they are staying with us.

Public transport is right around the corner and gets you all over Geneva. Bus 1, 8, 5 & 25 are 2 minutes walk, the 8 will get you from the train station in about 12 minutes. From the airport #5 takes about 40 min.

The space

This 2 bedroom getaway is a delight for a family of 4 traveling through Geneva; accommodates 2 couples or 4 people traveling together. Lots of cupboard space.

Kitch

name: Cosy apartment near the lake
description:
Luxury one bedroom apartment only 10 min. from the city center and the lake. The homely and modern flat has one king size double bed as well as two sofa beds in the living area, an open plan kitchen with a breakfast bar, free Wifi

The space
A modern one bedroom apartment has an open plan and fully equipped kitchen. The space is functional and nicely furnished and has everything you need (dishwasher, washing machine, microwave - oven....), enclosed balcony that can be opened 2/3 on hot summer's day. The area is surrounded by trees and greenery with two outside swimming pools (one for adults, one for kids) as well as a playground, there is no vis-à-vis.

Guest access
Guests have access to our inside & outside swimming pool as well as the garden area & sauna.
There are parking spaces for tenants in front of the building.
neighborhood_overview:
The neighbourhood is residential and green. The bus stop is literally in front of the building and takes you directly to the city center (less then 10 min bus ride), train station, the lake and the surrounding parcs. You can walk to the lake (20 min walk) if you like to exercise. There is a grocery store (Migros) 30 meters down the road, an ATM cash machine, a little café and a petrol station. Also, there is a sports center across the road with inside and outside tennis courts (available for non members), squash courts, badminton..... with a fantastic restaurant (Le Passing). The access to Geneve Plage (50 meter outside swimming pool next to the lake, open from May-Sept.) is within walking distance as well.
The World Economic Forum is a couple of bus stops away or 20mn walking distance.

Je ne suis pas du genre à écrire des tartines sur moi, donc je peux communiquer personnellement si vous voulez en savoir plus.

Et parfois, nous jouons de la musique, même pour vous...

name: Great apart near Int. Org 100m lake 300m train st
description:
Two Bedroom in a renovated flat located in central Geneva. Close to the lake and train and easy access to UN, Palexpo and the city. Equipped with one Large double bed (180cm) and one double-bed, closet space and a fully equipped modern kitchen. Towels and toiletries provided. Super Fast Wifi and TV with all the international channels. Perfect for a business or weekend Geneva getaway. Suitable for 2 couples or one couple with 2 children

The space
Two bedrooms in a renovated flat located in central Geneva. Great closet space and clean kitchen. Very central location and close to bars and lake. walking distance to UN WIPO and WTO and one train stop from Palexo.

Guest access
The entire flat.
neighborhood_overview: This is the most diverse part of Geneva. Just like the Greenwich village in 1970's New York or Soho in London, the Pâquis quarter is one of Geneva's most colourful, and exciting neighbourhoods. There you'll find an attractive array of boutiques, bistros, ethnic eateries, and nightclubs. It is one of the most vibrant "neighbourhoods" of Geneva, and there you will meet people from all continents, scents from far and near, busy streets and quiet parks only a few blocks away from the lake. We are 2 mins from the famous Bains de Paquis and the Jet D'Eau.
host_about:
We own a startup with offices in Geneva and London and that keeps us busy and on the move. Airbnb gives us the opportunity to meet some amazing people  both as hosts and travelers and have made some great friends. We speak French and English. Rom speaks French and English and I speak French and some Spanish and we both are committed to making an impact on the world around us. We are minimalists and as hosts we are committed to providing you with a super clean, safe environment during your stay. We treat you the way we like to be treated and are committed to living our lives in a calm and mindful way.
We look forward to meeting you.

name: Bienvenue! Spacieuse chambre dans un 6 pièces!
description:
C'est avec plaisir que je vous accueille pour un court séjour ou une plus longue période, et mets à votre disposition une spacieuse chambre dans un appartement ancien de 6 pièces, meublé avec un design de qualité et situé au coeur de Genève. Le quartier où vous habiterez est dynamique, jeune et sympathique, avec des restaurants, le marché au puces, proche de l'université, du quartier des musées et des galeries. Le centre ville est à 10mn, avec magasins et transports sont juste à côté.

The space
L'appartement est dans un immeuble ancien situé sur un place au coeur de Genève. L'appartement est spacieux et meublé avec des meubles design de qualité. Il est composé d'un salon, d'une bibliothèque, d'un bureau, de 2 chambres (la vôtre et la mienne) d'une cuisine, d'une salle de bain et de toilettes, ainsi que d'une petite pièces servant de laverie.

Guest access
Vous avez accès à toute les pièces, à l'exception de ma chambre .
neighborhood_overview: L'appartement est dans un quartier qui est un des centres névralgiques et un des plus intéressants de Genève. Il est situé à deux pas de l'Université et de son magnifique parc des Bastions, ainsi qu'à deux pas de la vieille-ville. En 10mn à pied ou 5mn en tram, vous atteignez le centre ville et ses commerces. De l'autre côté, de l'immense place qu'est la Plaine de Plainpalais vous trouverez le quartier des galeries des musées et centre d'art, appelé le "Quartier des Bains". Vous y trouverez plein très bon restaurants, ainsi que tout autour de notre immeuble. Le quartier est animé, avec à disposition des commerces de proximité et également 2 fois par semaine sur la Plaine de Plainpalais un marché aux légumes et 1 fois par semaine le marché aux puces. Bref un quartier qui est un des centres névralgiques et un des plus intéressants de Genève.

description:
Our apartment offers a gorgeous open-plan living room, a fully equipped bespoke kitchen and a spacious bedroom with an ensuite marble bathroom. All the interiors are bespoke and of the highest quality, with state of the art technology.

The space
Located on the third floor of the NEST building, this magnificent apartment features a very spacious living area, a bedroom with a king-size bed, and a separate walk-in dressing area.
The bespoke kitchen, with its unique stone island, looks onto an open-plan living area. Parquet floors, original moulding, and a granite fireplace are just some of the features that make this space so welcoming.
Design aficionados will also love the Cassina coffee table and the iconic Carl Hansen chairs.
It too comes with all the NEST trimmings: Aesop bathroom amenities, original art on the walls and impeccable service, including twice-weekly housekeeping service.

The space
Large and bright house (170sqm) in a residential and quiet neighborhood, 10 minutes away by car/bus from the city center.

The room offers a large private bathroom equipped with all amenities (30 sqm). Floor and stairs are also private. In the room, there is a living room area with a sofa, flat TV, digital satellite TV and free wifii.

Common areas
Large american style kitchen on the ground floor, washing machine and dryer in the laundry in the basement at your disposal.
Large private garden (800 sqm) with a terrace and private parking at your disposal.
The house is 10 minutes away from the city center by bus (in front of the house) or by car.

Guest access
neighborhood_overview:
The house is located in a quiet and residential area, in front of the bus station n°8. Bus n°8 runs every 7-10 minutes every day (from 6 am to 1 am)

Veyrier offers the advantage of being located in a quiet neighborhood, in the country side, but only 10 minutes away from the city center (Rive or Carouge), which is the central point to visit Geneva or to go out.
It is also 5 minutes away from the Saleve (small mountain where you may admire the panoramic view of Geneva with a cable railway) or just to hike in the area. It is 20 minutes away from the airport by car or 45 minutes by bus.

host_about:
Bonjour 
Voyageur des premières heures, nomade sans frontières, entrepreneur digital, vaste culture égrenée au cours de grandes épopées, naviguant par air mer et terre sur cette toute petite planète, si petite mais si généreuse, animé de passions de découvertes, d’émerveillement et d’apprentissage. Partisan du mieux vivre ensemble comme celui du mieux vivre tout court, entrepreneur sans limite.

name: Beautiful room in luxury apartment
description:
Luxury designer apartment of 115 square meters, very well located in the heart of Geneva, 5-10 minutes walking distance from the lake, very cosy, with high ceilings, fire place and beautiful antic and modern furnitures.
Public transports in front.

The space
Very cosy, quiet and confortable, you will benefit from a lot of storage space, a flat screen tv in your bedroom , a colonial leather desk, and a confortable couch.

Guest access
You will also have access to the kitchen and living room.
neighborhood_overview:
Located in one of the best areas of Geneva, the flat is ideally set in a quiet street facing ambassadors residences and their beautiful gardens.
You can conveniently walk to the lake or main shopping street Rue du Rhone in 5-10 minutes, or take the tramway right in front of the flat. You can also walk to the old town in 10 minutes. The most beautiful parks of Geneva are situated few steps away ( 5-10 mn walking distance ). A shopping center is located just down the road as well as grocery stores and supermarket, coffee places and delicatessen across the street.

name: Calm spacious renovated unit, garden and parking
description:
My unit is a large independent suite (40 sqm). You will receive a set of keys and come and go as you wish.

Our place is located in a quiet residencial area close to beautiful Carouge and its market. The city center is easily accessible by bus and tramway. See Getting around section for more information.

The bus stop is 2' walking distance, aprox 150m.

The space
The unit consists of a bright and very calm space that can confortably accomodate up to 4 persons, two in the double bed, and two others in a sofa that opens to a double bed with two separate matresses.

The unit also includes the TV area, with numerous channels, in several languages, as well as a table area with tea and Nespresso coffee making facilities. A quiet fridge has been installed.

Please note that there are no cooking facilities in our unit, no oven or microwave.

We provide a simple breakfast on previous request, if you like. Just contact m
neighborhood_overview:
A bakery and tea room serves fresh croissants, bread, sandwiches and is only 3 to 5 minutes walk. The place also serves salads and pizzas at noon and in the evenings.

There is as well a convenience store at walking distance (indications are in the information book in the unit).

A big shopping center with restaurants, shopping, supermarket and cinemas is 1.4km away, reachable also by bus in 7', or by car in 10'. The shopping center provides a cheap delivery service with electrical bycicles right to the house door. You can take advantage of it! I will explain to you how it works, it is very easy, and I use it all the time.

We can lend one bicycle to you from our household, if you like.

Very large choice of good restaurants in close Carouge and Geneva. I will make recommendations for you.

The unit is 2 minutes walk from bus stop. It takes approximately 10 minutes ride to Carouge, 18 minutes ride to town center.

Welcome!!
host_about:
I do not have role models, but if i would follow somebody, it could well be the Dalai Lama. I see myself -and I hope that I live up to it- as a progressist humanist. I am positive that it is possible to find nice, interesting persons and people that correspond you all around the world, in every country, race, religion or cultural setting.
My family is an international one, and I am proud of it. I use the free portion of the revenue generated by my airbnb activity to fund activities for my children that will help them be better citizens of our precious world (like language lessons, first help courses, exchange with other nationalities,...).
I couldn't live without: travelling, good books, good food and wine, music and love.
When i travel, i try to read a book from an author from this particular country or city of destination. I enjoy the reading nearly as much as the journey itself...
Welcome to Geneva! :)

description:

This apartment is on the first floor and has its own private bedroom, sitting room, kitchen, bathroom and coat room. Only the main entrance, hall and staircase are shared with the other apartments. In-house cleaning and ironing service - (30CHF/hour). Lovely boxer dog in common areas.

Friendly boxer dog in main entrance hall

Both are open 7 days a week and will serve you food at any time.

name: Spacious room U.N. & CENTRAL area
description:
Private Bedroom in luminous and charming flat in the best area of Geneva (Called Grottes: train station, UN, restaurants, transport, lake etc. at less than 10 min. walking distance). 1 Double Bed and 2 single bed, direct access to balcony, quiet.

The space
This cosy and charming room can accommodate up to 2 people. The room is well furnished, with living room area, storage, a desk and free wifi.

The spacious kitchen is equipped with gaz cooker, oven and all the necessary utensils. It is nice and calm with a view an a park.

There is a comfortable bathroom with a bathtub, towels and a hair dryer and iron/ironing board.

This room is perfectly suitable for both couple, families and business travelers.

Guest access
Apartment is at the 3rd floor without a lift.

Other things to note
If you are in Geneva to party, our place is not the right one. We only receive calm people.
neighborhood_overview: The flat is situated in the very center of Geneva in the neighborhood called Les Grottes. This is a very trendy area but we are located in a quite street. Restaurants, bars, supermarkets and a huge park are around the corner.
host_about: We are two sisters that live together. Malika works for an NGO and Zelia is a student in Occupational Therapy, she is the best host ever and will help you out! We are quiet, friendly, clean and easy-going. Oh we forgot Nikita, our little dog. She is quite and likes to have visitors. We are often not at home during the weekends.

Evgeni

name: Cosy & comfortable, central Geneva
description:
Lovely one-bedroom apartment, great location: 300m from the train station and 500m from the lake. Fully equipped kitchen, spacious living room, separate bedroom. Full of charm, plants, books & good energy. Remarkably quiet!

It's often a Flat With a Cat - sometimes the apartment comes with a well-behaved, affectionate, shy indoor cat. When I need to leave him, I reduce the rate in return for someone to feed & love him while I'm away. Those times, the apartment is for cat lovers only!

Other things to note
When I need to travel, the flat comes with a cat: a sweet boy called Lily (my friend named him before she knew he was a boy, ha!). In that case, I would only rent to cat lovers who are willing to look after him during their stay.
(But if I’m staying nearby in the mountains, then I take him with me.)

Even if I brush him every day, there could be some cat hairs in the apartment – the apartment is thus not suitable for someone who
neighborhood_overview:
Pâquis is the most lively quartier of Geneva. Yes, there are drug dealers & prostitutes – they’ll be the ones standing around … They are completely harmless. The neighbourhood is very safe: in nearly ten years living here, I haven’t had the slightest bit of trouble.

When you go out –
- Please do lock both locks – as they say, “trust in God, but lock your doors.”
- No need to close the windows, you can leave them open if you like; even when it’s raining, it’s ok.

The lake is a 5-minute walk: to the left as you leave the building.

host_about:
Tech entrepreneur and designer. Born in 1985 I speak english/french and been residing for over 11years in Switzerland (Lausanne, Geneva, Aigle), previously lived for 4years in France (Evian, Chamonix, Lyon, Nice), 13years in Canada (Montreal, Toronto, Vancouver, Edmonton, Quebec), 1year in the US (New York, San Diego) and with a love for Japan.

I like international environments, design and it's simplicity, modern architecture, fine food, extreme sports, creative technologies, electronic music and arts. My ideal appartment/housing would be minimal and straightforward, yet functional and luminous.

I am fun and passionate person to be with, with an international background and ambitious for creative stuff. My belief is treat others like you want to be treated, same applies for the spaces you use. :D

name: Chambre rétro dans"un jardin nourrissier en Ville"
description:
La chambre se situe dan un appartement avec un jardin, dans une villa formée de trois appartements, au centre-ville. L'appartement est composé de 3 chambres et d'un bureau. Deux chambres se louent sur Airbnb, ainsi que l'appartement en entier. Mon logement est proche des restaurants, des activités adaptées aux familles, la vie nocturne, les transports en commun. Veuillez entrer par le jardin et passer par la terrasse, comme indiqué dans "entrée dans les lieux".

The space
La chambre individuelle se trouve dans notre appartement, au rez-de-jardin. La salle-de-bains privée est située juste à côté de la chambre. La chambre est meublées d'un lit double, d'un dressing, et d'un bureau. Il est possible d'ajouter un berceau. Lors de la réservation de cette chambre vous n'avez pas accès à la cuisine. Pour pouvoir accéder à la cuisine vous devez réserver "Chambre romantique avec accès à la cuisine +++"

Guest access
Il est possible de se parquer gratu
neighborhood_overview: C'est un ancien quartier industriel, entouré de villas, de commerces. Il se situe à 10 minutes à pied de la gare. Plusieurs transports publics se situent à 2 minutes du logement.
host_about:
Fraîchement retraitée, j'ai du temps pour recevoir mes hôtes dans quatre chambres doubles, avec salles de bains, dans le cadre de "Mon jardin en Ville". Il est aussi possible de louer les chambres avec accès à la cuisine et au reste de l'appartement ou de louer tout l'appartement-souplex. Après quelques missions humanitaires, d'où j'ai ramené meubles et décorations, j'ai aménagé un souplex-loft dans une zone industrielle, sur la rive-droite de Genève, proche de toutes commodités. Avec mon conjoint, nous prenons plaisir à recevoir des personnes de passage à Genève. Comme j'aime m'occuper de mon jardin, j'en profite aussi pour préparer des confitures, sirops, pâtes de fruits avec des fruits du jardin. Une deuxième résidence à Collex (canton de Genève), est également mise en location avec 5 chambres dans une villa mise en colocation pour des périodes de longue durée, voire â l'année. Un troisième logement, situé en bord de mer, en Catalogne, à Ametlla-de-Mar, est également mis en location. C'est un appartement de 4 chambres pouvant accueillir 6 personnes.
Ma devise: "La vie est une œuvre d'art très difficile, et, parti de rien, c'est déjà beaucoup que d'en réussir quelques parties, en travaillant et en économisant ". 
Citation de Henry Becque ; Les pensées et notes d'alb (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)

name: magnifique 4 pièces au centre ville
description:
Spacieux 4 pièces de 100m2 au centre de Plainpalais, proche de toutes commodités/transports. Restaurants, galleries, bars branchés sont a deux pas, de meme que le fameux parc Bertrand et ses 4 réformateurs.
Le quartier est vivant mais calme.

The space
Bel appartement de 4 pièces composé d'une entrée, d'une cuisine américaine entièrement équipée ouverte sur le living/ salle à manger, bar, cave a vin, d'une chambre principale avec son grand dressing et sa salle de bains balneo attenante, d'une 2ème chambre et d'une salle de douche / wc.

Other things to note
Early/late check in before 9am after 9pm-21:00/extra charge 20chf.-/hour. if your flight lands after 21:00/9pm please ask me first If i can accommodate your check in. Please note this apartment is mainly rented long term and listed on Airbnb in between tenancies. I live in London so The key collection is done by my cleaner therefore an exact time of arrival needs to be provided. The
host_about: I settled in London 8 years ago. Attracted by the vibrant life of East London, i now call London fields my home. Travelling a lot for my job i am often away from my cosy flat. . When i am not away i enjoy all the facilities of my favourite area in London. I have my thai boxing gym next door, yoga at Stretch Broadway Market is perfect to release all the stress from your day . A 5 min walk to the the food market on Broadway Market to eat a large bowl of Pho, delicious pork belly sandwich or  a german Bratwurst is a must on Saturday's. For the hungover ones, Dove pub makes the best Bloody Mary's.  Walking down  the canal to Victoria Park or buying flowers on Columbia Road market on Sunday is my weekly routine. For the less sensitive, you could enjoy great oysters and warm cider. Pub on the Parc and barbecues on London fields are also difficult to avoid living in the area. "Everithing in moderation, including moderation " used to say Oscar Wilde. I would love to share with you more of my favourite restaurants, bars, shops and tips if you stay at my home sweet home.

Wooden-modern atmosphere within 1 Living Room (with quality furnitures (leather sofa, green plants, 42 inch TV, 1 Bedroom (high standard Queen Size bed & mattress (160cm X 200cm), 1 office space nicely & fully equipped, 1 big kitchen, 1 bathroom, 1 WC.

neighborhood_overview:
Really village-style district with good, nice & friendly restaurants (50 meters). 3 Parks (100-200 meters). Supermarket (20 meters).
Taxi (5 mins) or walking (100 to 400 meters) to UN and most of NGOs in Geneva.

You will find the best of Geneva's downtown and lakeside within 25 minutes direct public transportation. But you will enjoy accommodation's formidable small town-style (Birds are singing all around !) neighborhood with good, nice & friendly restaurants/cafés 5 mins walk away such as Café du Commerce with its best cheese fondue in town, Chez ma Cousine (best roasted chicken !), Café du Soleil (lively with plenty expatriates, traditional simple cuisine), Luigia (Best italian fresh food in Geneva) or Intercontinental's Hotel restaurants. 3 greeny parks, Supermarket, pharmacy, florist, bank & post office, taxi station across the street.

UN and most of NGOs in Geneva are 20 minutes nice walk away or 5-10 minutes by taxi or bus.
