name: Deluxe duplex in the Old Town
description:
A brand new contemporary duplex set in the iconic Maison Dumont in Geneva Old Town which comes with all the services you need.

The space
Talk of the town, this brand new set of apartments, all housed in the iconic copper structure known as the Maison Dumont, offers one of the most exclusive stays in Geneva.
Designed to the highest standards, it has characterful, exposed-brick walls, a full façade of glass, and a warm resin floors.
Benefitting from its own private terrace, a gorgeous open-plan living room, a fully-equipped designer kitchen, and indulgent walk-in showers, it is the perfect sanctuary for those seeking privacy and exclusivity
And for the design lovers, the spaces have been entirely designed in partnership with renowned Swiss furniture house, Vitra, famous for their iconic designers such as Jean Prouvé, Isamu Nogochi and Charles& Ray Eames.
They also come with all the NEST trimmings: Aesop bathroom amenities, original art on the wa
neighborhood_overview: All our apartments are beautiful, homely apartments in the centre of historic Geneva Old Town.  As such, they are in a perfect location that is easy to access, and gorgeous to live in, with bars, cafes and local culture on the doorstep.
host_about:
Hi, my name is Christoph Wondraczek
I very much look forward to welcoming you to one of our beautiful apartments in Geneva Old Town.

Christoph

The bathroom with bathtub & shower option. Throughout the apartment t
neighborhood_overview:
Carouge is a Mediterranean style hamlet, with lots of warm and cosy cafes, bistros, art and antique shops.
Described by a British publication as Geneva's “Greenwich Village", the Old Carouge with its quaint streets lined with restaurants, bars, ice cream shops gives you impresion that you are not in Geneva but in a Sardinian village.

name: Beautiful 5-Star Rated Private Room Central Geneva
description:
Married superhost couple offers a spacious private room in a modern apartment in the popular popular Planpalais neighborhood for a professional woman aged 23+ who is working full-time outside the residence from 09:00-18:00. It is not suitable as a "Work from Home" office. The room faces to a quiet courtyard, has a comfortable real double bed, hardwood floors, lots of closet space, floor-to-ceiling mirrors, great natural lighting, and a desk and chair (not pictured.)

The space
The room is rarely available and has 100% 5-star reviews here on Airbnb. Additional services (e.g. cleaning, laundry, shopping, etc.) can be included free of charge, if requested and agreed in advance. We encourage you to read past reviews and contact past guests for further information and credible recommendations.

The room specifically -- and the living environment in general -- is suited to a mature professional woman aged +/- 24 or older who is employed outside the residence,
neighborhood_overview:
The Augustins neighborhood of Geneva, bordering on Champel, Plainpalais and Carouge, is a popular district with all types of shops, cafés and restaurants. It is generally safe at all hours of the day and night, and the distance between the tram stop and the building door is only 75 meters, where easy public transport to everywhere in Geneva is conveniently located and runs every three minutes during peak hours.

There are no less than 4 supermarkets within a 200-meter radius of the apartment (Lidl, Denner, Coop & Migros). Depending on the day of the week, some are open as early as 7:30 am and as late as 8:00 pm.

There are also numerous convenience stores within 100 meters of the apartment, some open as late as midnight, every day.

There are also numerous restaurants, some with sidewalk terraces (during the summer), all around the apartment, including Italian, Thai, Indian, Chinese, Vietnamese, Korean, Portuguese and traditional Swiss, just to name a few.
host_about:
Hello everyone!

We are an intercultural married professional couple in Geneva without children in the home.

We are non-smokers and light drinkers. In addition to being multicultural, you will find us to be friendly, outgoing, easy-going, extremely open-minded and very accommodating. Our home is a safe environment in every sense of the word, but also an adult environment. Although the home is large by Geneva standards, it's a compact layout where everyone is inevitably in the lives of the others. It's not well-suited to shy, introverted, or prudish persons, or to those who spend the majority of their time in their room.

We both have postgraduate degrees and a fair amount of life experience gained living and working in different places around the world. Rick now works independently and works from home when not traveling. Kelly works in private banking, in the front office for a Top-5 world-class private bank. Weeknights find us home enjoying dinner together. Friday and Saturday evenings, if at home, we may open a bottle of wine or two and enjoy a movie. Weekends are usually spent shopping, traveling, entertaining or visiting friends in the city.

We only rent to women. We prefer working professionals who either need a room while they conduct an apartment search, those on a limited housing budget or short-term contract, and those who simply do not want to live alone in a new city.

English, German, French, Portuguese and Spanish is spoken.

We encourage you to read our reviews (both given and received) and even contact past guests confidentially before reserving, and look forward to hosting you during your stay in Geneva should we be fortunate enough to share each others' company!

Warm Regards,
Rick & Kelly

The studio apartment is well located (opposite a park, near the lake and close to many international organizations) and offers a great view of the park, the lake and the Alps. The apartment is ideally suited for business travelers, diplomats and civil servants working for the UN but is also well suited for students or travelers wishing to spend a comfortable and carefree stay in Geneva.

The space

The studio apartment is fully furnished and equipped to also work or study, including fast wireless internet connectivity and a work table.

Guest access

The apartment is located opposite parks and near the lake (2 minutes walking through the park). With nice weather, the nearby park and botanical gardens offer pleasant opportunities to unwind and are also excellent locations for jogging. In summer, various associations organize activities in the park, including dancing evenings and outdoor sports events.

The location of the apartment is in the vicinity of many international organizations and also offices some multinationals corporations.

neighborhood_overview:
The village in which stands the apartment, known as Pregny-Chambésy, is a charming place that is best known for its beautiful nature sites (lake, forests, botanical parcs), while being at direct proximity to the center of the city.

Furthermore, the apartment is located in the area of all the International Organisations (UN, ICRC museum, etc), where cultural activities can take place.

Besides, not less then 4 renowned restaurants are at your disposal in the village : Le Relais de Chambésy (awarded in the Guide Michelin!), L'Auberge des trois coqs, L'Auberge de la Fontaine, Café 9.

The apartments surrounds various places where sporting activities will take place (biking, swimming, tennis, walking, strolling by the lake, mountain climing).

At last, we clearly recommend this apartments for a quality leisure or cultural vacation, or sportive destination.

name: Charming flat - central & close to lake
description:
In the City center (Eaux-Vives) close the Eaux-Vives train station, the jet d'eau, lake, many restaurants and Parc la Grange. Easy access from Airport/train station. It's quiet and gives onto inner court. Little grocery shop next door. Beautiful old built: high ceilings and very bright. Comfortably accommodates 4. Tram and train stop 2 minutes away.

The space
Great location from which to discover Geneva or go to your conference or meetings. It's close to everything you would want to see in the Geneva: Jet d'eau, lake, old town, Carouge, parks and museums, etc.
The apartment is in a quiet spot and has charming old-built characteristics such as high ceilings, old wooden floors, big windows and plenty of built-in closets, which make it appear spacious even though it's a one bedroom apartment.

Guest access
Guests have free access to wifi and a fully equipped kitchen. Bikes can be borrowed against a deposit in several places around town (G
neighborhood_overview: In Eaux-vives you will find great restaurants with food from all over the world, trendy bars and charming cafes. The park, which you'll reach in 5 minutes has an amazing view on the lake and is a popular place with genevans, expats and visitors alike. There's a playground for the kids, a public BBQ place and during summer there are free concerts at the park several evenings every week.
host_about: I love to live in other countries to be able to really grasp the local culture, mentalities and perspectives. Recently, I lived and worked in the Sahara desert for an international organisation. However, from time to time I also just like to travel somewhere and meet friends and discover a place more as a visitor and this is where I think airbnb might be a good option for accommodation. After several good experiences with Airbnb I now started to also host people coming to Geneva.

name: Grande Maison familiale proche du centre Genève
description:
Au rez-de-chaussée, une grande entrée, une belle cuisine ouverte sur la salle à manger et un salon lumineux qui donne sur la terrasse et le jardin.
Une grande suite parentale avec ses deux salles de bain et son dressing complète cet étage.
Au-dessus, 5 chambres à coucher et 3 salles de bains autour d'un salon TV.
Le sous-sol dispose d'un grand vestiaire et d'une salle de sport.
A l'extérieur, une piscine de 15m et une grande pergola complètent le tout.

The space
Maison très agréable à vivre avec de très beau volumes.
Les enfants ont leur étage et les parents le leur, au même niveau que les pièce de réception.
La pergola avec son système de chauffage permet de diner à l'extérieur d'avril à octobre.

Guest access
accès complet à toutes les facilités de la maison
neighborhood_overview: Situé dans la commune de Vandoeuvres, la maison est très proche du centre ville de Genève. Pour les courses alimentaires de tous les jours, des commerces se trouve à moins de deux minutes en voiture. L'école internationale est à 3km et 7 min en voiture.
host_about: Françoise et moi formons une famille recomposée avec nos cinq enfants. Ils ont grandi et sont désormais le plus souvent loin de la maison. Le bon côté de cette situation, c'est que ça nous laisse davantage de temps pour voyager.

name: CharmanteSuite dans"un jardin nourrissier enVille"
description:
Mon logement est proche de Centre-Ville, Gare, arrêts de bus pour l'Aéroport, ONU, organisations internationales, Palexpo, les restaurants, les transports en commun. Vous apprécierez mon logement pour l'accueil en plusieurs langues, l'emplacement (un jardin en Ville) proche de toutes les commodités, son calme en pleine Ville.Mon logement est parfait pour les couples et les voyageurs en solo. La suite parentale est meublée d'un lit double.Sur demande, un lit simple ou un berceau peut être ajouté.

The space
La suite parentale (salle de bains et dressing intégrés dans la chambre) se situe en rez de jardin, dans mon logement (souplex de 4 chambres) dans une villa de 3 appartements, de construction récente (2012), bien entretenue, lieu tranquille et sécurisé en plein Centre-Ville. Elle est meublée d'un lit double. Sur demande, il est possible d'ajouter un lit simple ou un lit parapluie pour un bébé. Lors de la réservation de cette chambre vous n'avez pas accès à la cu
neighborhood_overview: Le quartier des Charmilles a été durant de nombreuses années un quartier industriel et de villas. Les voitures Hispano Suiza étaient construites juste en face de notre logement. Cette zone à laissé peu à peu la place à des logements et à des petits artisans. Ainsi qu'à un centre commercial à 2minutes du logement
host_about:
Fraîchement retraitée, j'ai du temps pour recevoir mes hôtes dans quatre chambres doubles, avec salles de bains, dans le cadre de "Mon jardin en Ville". Il est aussi possible de louer les chambres avec accès à la cuisine et au reste de l'appartement ou de louer tout l'appartement-souplex. Après quelques missions humanitaires, d'où j'ai ramené meubles et décorations, j'ai aménagé un souplex-loft dans une zone industrielle, sur la rive-droite de Genève, proche de toutes commodités. Avec mon conjoint, nous prenons plaisir à recevoir des personnes de passage à Genève. Comme j'aime m'occuper de mon jardin, j'en profite aussi pour préparer des confitures, sirops, pâtes de fruits avec des fruits du jardin. Une deuxième résidence à Collex (canton de Genève), est également mise en location avec 5 chambres dans une villa mise en colocation pour des périodes de longue durée, voire â l'année. Un troisième logement, situé en bord de mer, en Catalogne, à Ametlla-de-Mar, est également mis en location. C'est un appartement de 4 chambres pouvant accueillir 6 personnes.
Ma devise: "La vie est une œuvre d'art très difficile, et, parti de rien, c'est déjà beaucoup que d'en réussir quelques parties, en travaillant et en économisant ". 
Citation de Henry Becque ; Les pensées et notes d'alb (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)

name: Charming old town apartment_Geneva Center (CHA2)
description:
Renovated apartment: 1 bedroom, 1 living room and separated kitchen, in the very heart of Geneva. It is a very practical, spacious and comfortable with fully furnished kitchen (big fridge, microwave, oven, etc.). Yard side, very calm. Close to art and culture, great views, restaurants and dining, parks, and the beach of Geneva lake. You’ll love it because of the coziness and location which is absolutely in the center. All was installed with attention and care to host you.

The space
Well preserved medieval houses, curved, little streets with fountains, cathedral and town hall offer striking surroundings for world-class entertainment in Geneva’s old town. It is the best place to stay if you are visiting the city seeing that all attractions are located around it: museums, art galleries, best restaurants, bars, clubs and cafés, cozy little shops of chocolate as well as best splendid shopping places, parks, elegant squares, and the lake with countless entertainments i
neighborhood_overview: Geneva's Old Town is an ancient maze of small streets and picturesque squares, filled with homey cafés, restaurants, galleries, museums and historical sites, lined by historical buildings adorned with beautiful masonry facades. You’re whisked a thousand years back into the times of ancient Geneva. The altitude of Old Town is some 25 meters higher than the lake therefore from there you can enjoy Geneva’s landscape from above perspective to both directions: lake side and opposite, Salève mountain side.

Grande chambre meublé en sous-location à Meyrin à 2min à pied de l'arrêt du tram 14, à 15 min de l'aéroport et à 20 min de la gare cornavin. Les commerces sont en proximité quartier très riche en tant que zone industrielle. Cuisine équipée machine à laver ect..

The space
C'est un appartement de 55m2 dont une cuisine équipée une salle de bain avec baignoire toilette lavabo et machine à laver, une petit entrée, une chambre à coucher avec balcon où il y a une fille italien discrète et respectueuse, et pour finir le salon qui est libre où il y a un lit une place et demie, deux armoires, des étagères, un canapé, et une table bas.
L'appartement est muni de line wi-fi.

Guest access
L'appartement est composé d'une cuisine équipée une salle de bain avec baignoire toilette lavabo et machine à laver, une petit entrée, une chambre à coucher avec balcon où il y a une fille italien discrète et respectueuse, et pour finir le salon qui est libre où il
neighborhood_overview:
Le quartier de Meyrin est assez calme mais aussi bien proches des transports publics, dans les environs vous avez nombreux centres commerciaux.
À proximité de l'immeuble vous aurai beaucoup de vert.

name: An 18th century villa next to the city centre
description:
Update: An additional bathroom, a freshly renovated bedroom and lots of additional improvements have been brought to the house during our summer renovation works - with an unchanged price ! Check the updated pictures.

"La Gradelle" is a typical 18th century Geneva countryside villa set in a quiet garden at the shadow of centennial trees. Built in 1788, it is furnished with fine antiques and decorated with contemporary taste, while retaining a sober and warm countryside house feeling.

The space
The ground floor offers an entrance hall, a cloakroom, the kitchen, dining and living rooms. On the first floor lay the library, a studio and two bed rooms. The attique offer two additional bedrooms. There are three full bathrooms and two half bathrooms. Linen bed sheets and towels are furnished. The 2000m2 garden is set with teak furniture and large umbrellas, and has a swing and a trampoline.

Guest access
Guests have access to the full ho
neighborhood_overview: The neighbourhood is named after our house, La Gradelle, when it was the Master's house of a vast farm. It has transformed over time in a quiet upmarket residential area.  There is not much to do in the immediate vicinity but the village of Cologny, a few minutes away hosts the world famous Biblioteca Bodmeriana, a private museum deploying among other treasures a Gutenberg bible. There is a fuel station with a grocery and a Migros supermarket at walking distance.
host_about: We are a multiple origins couple with roots in Africa and Europe. Maliza is a designer and an artist and Alexandre advises peace processes in Africa. We have three beautiful children who spend the week in a boarding school in the Rift Valley and the week end with us in our family farm in Naivasha.

name: Luxury Studio Geneva Center - St Gervais quarter
description:
Would you need a temporary housing short term or furnished apt for long term mission, my apt situated rue Rousseau 30 is for you. Design, fully equipped, my studio offers high-end technologies, furnished in modern style and located close to station and lake in the quarter of St Gervais, the heart of Geneva, in front of big shop Manor. Clean up and total disinfection by certified enterprise for no virus after each tenant.

The space
Unique par sa décoration et son emplacement. Au coeur de Genève ! À deux pas de la gare quartier saint Gervais en face de Manor big shop
host_about:
J'ai 59 ans, mariée et grand-maman de 7 petits enfants, je vis à Genève.
Cet appartement est en premier lieu notre résidence secondaire et par conséquent il est aménagé avec un maximum de soin et de confort. Nous y recevons des hôtes fidèles depuis de nombreuses années et c'est toujours une joie de savoir qu'ils se sentent chez eux.

name: Comfortable & Cosy Single Room - Geneva Heart
description:
Friendly & welcoming, boutique Hotel in Geneva heart.
Room is equipped with cable TV, high speed internet, A/C, radio, alarm clock and direct dial telephone.
Ideally located in the city center, the hotel is close to the lake, the Old Town, the main business and shopping centers.
Quick access to all parts of the city with public transport, free for our guests throughout their stay.
The rooms were refurbished in October 2016 and some ongoing maintenance is to be expected in the coomons

The space
You will find in this cosy bedroom:
- An extra comfortable bed of 90cm
- A small desk
- Cabled TV
- A private bathroom

The room is approximately 9sqm.

Daily cleaning is provided and towels and sheet are changed every week for long stays.

Pets are welcome for an additional fee of 30.-CHF/day

Washer and dryer are available on site for an additional fee of 5.-CHF per usage

Free tra
neighborhood_overview:
Eaux-Vives is the trendy and calm area of Geneva. Fine dinning restaurants, boutiques are nearby and 3 minutes away from famous Rue du Rhône.

>> The apartment is located: 4 min walk from the Lake

>> 4 min walk from the central town (shopping area) and the old town
host_about:
Keys'n'Fly - Airbnb Management Solution That Suits You
My name is Marc with Keys'n'Fly Vacation Rentals, a full service property management company based out of Geneva, Switzerland. My team and I strive to make every experience a seamless one, no matter where your trip may take you. As hospitality professionals experts, we are dedicated to provide superior customer service with attentiveness to inquiries and our guests while they are staying with us. 
Our beloved hosts trust us in managing their properties on their behalf and we hope you will trust us with your stay.

name: Large and cosy room close UN and railway station
description:
The room overlooks a courtyard and is very quiet. Walk 8 min to the Cornavin railway station, 15 min to UN building and not far from downtown and the lake. Public transport is nearby. A large dog is part of the household ! TV in the room with more than 190 national and international channels. Free Wifi. I speak French, German and English.

The space
The room is very well equipped! There is a large desk that can be locked as well as a wardrobe and hangers available. The room can be locked too. With its 15m2 it is a big room.

Guest access
- Access to fully equipped kitchen
- Space reserved in the fridge
- Acces to the balcony which serves as smoking area
- Bathroom and separate toilet
- Possibility of doing the laundry (including dryer) for CHF 5.-, laundry products included

Other things to note
- Bathroom and separate toilets, to be shared with the host
- Towels, shower-gel, hairdryer at you
neighborhood_overview:
- Nearby Cornavin railway station and lake, shops, restaurants and parks
- Piscine de Varembé: In- (33m) / Outside (25m) swimming pool about 10 min walk or 2 stops with Bus N° 8
- The botanical garden is about 20 min walk or you can take the tram from the Cornavin railway station
host_about:
I was born in 1964, my zodiac sign is Cancer, I’m easy going, open minded and not complicated. 

I'm working as an Office Manager for an NGO  fighting impunity for international crimes and supporting victims in their quest for justice.. 

Addicted to coffee, chocolate and TV... otherwise quiet normal (I think...)!

name: COZY & WARM  STUDIO | Vésenaz
description:
Hello,
Our place it’s very cozy and located in a very nice area of Geneva.
In a safe and quiet area right next to the lake. You have restaurants and dining, for all your preferences like fondue, pizzas, burgers, sushi and much more.

This location it’s great for couples, friends, adventurers, families, located at 2min from the comercials centers like Coop, Manor and Migros.
Right Next to the bus station E and G - Vesenaz Village station at just 15 min to the centre of Geneva!
See you soon! :)

The space
Right next door you can enjoy a great fondue at the restaurant Le Chateau d´If, really delicious burgers from Beef Burgers which I recommend you to try, pizzas, pastas or as you wish at the Italian restaurant Dai Tre Fratelli Scalea - Vesenaz, kebab or sushi at Wasabi sushi Vesenaz.
You have all this options right next to the location for your lunch and dinner and also a delicious bakery inside the building for a nice breakfa
neighborhood_overview: Vésenaz it’s a very quite and safe area.

name: Geneva, unique river loft in former watch factory
description:
The fully equipped loft style flat is located in a unique and exclusive spot - right on the Rhone river bank with a stunning view over the river into the green (with a terrace at the river side) and only a few steps away from Geneva's city center.
The apartment meets also perfectly the needs of business travelers.

The space
The apartment (122 m2) has the following layout :
- big space for living / dining / working area
- open walk-in kitchen from the dining area
- terrasse of 9m2 on the river
- separate bedroom with attached bathroom (big shower, WC, laundry area)
- separate guest WC

Guest access
All areas of the apartment are at your disposal.

Direct access to the Rhone river just in front of the building for swimming, floating, etc. during the summer months.
A perfect location as well for running on the river banks.

Parking : 1 private parking lot can be rented at additional cost.
neighborhood_overview:
Jonction used to be an industrial area of Geneva and is located between Geneva's two rivers, Rhone and Arve. It is a lively neighborhood, especially during summer time when people enjoy to be outside close to the water.
The Jonction area has changed very much during the past years (especially infrastructure wise) and has become one of the hippest places to life in Geneva. The "Quartier des bains" has also become the cultural center of Geneva with many galeries, shops, bars, etc.
The fact that many parts of Geneva's university are close makes the area also animated and young.

It has a large closet in the entrance with plenty of hanging space and drawers and a large room with 2 single beds, a fully equipped kitchen and a living room area with flat TV screen and wifi, dining table for two and a couch.

The space
The kitchen being open on the living room gives coziness to the place and the view you have from there is stunning. It is also very quiet, so one sleeps well.

Guest access
There is a laundry room in the building, accessible any time any day (but sunday)
neighborhood_overview: One block away is the mytical parc Bertrand with plenty of trees and a running path, as well as a playground and bassin for children. A delight. On the other side of the park, you will find at least 4 excellent restaurants open on week-ends too.
host_about: Suissesse, ayant vécu beaucoup à l'étranger, j'aime rencontrer des personnes d'origines diverses et conseiller quoi voir et quoi faire à Genève. Si la personne préfère la tranquillité, je donne les clefs et m'éclipse.

description:
Modern, newly renovated one bedroom apartment in villa located in a quite and residential area of Geneva.

Geneva city center is 15 minutes away and there are several bus lines departing frequently to the center. There are also direct bus lines to/from Geneva airport and the Geneva train station.

The apartment is located in the basement, but with full day light thanks to a one side of the house being fully excavated providing the living room / kitchen with a 2 m (height) x 4 m (length) window.

The space

Bedroom with double bed and a big wardrobe.

name: Mussard | Central, Stylish, 80sqm | Cocoon Homes
description:
In a beautiful early 19th century newly renovated building, we offer a large (80m2) furnished, fully equipped one bedroom apartment with a nice little covered terrace for temporary and extended stays in the heart of Geneva (sleep 4). Our apartment is defined by unique design, houseplants, custom artwork, original antique hardwood flooring — to create a sense of coziness, warmth and soul. Our design choices bring together comfort and style with a home feeling.

The space
The bedroom has a comfy queen-size bed (160x200) and a wardrobe. In the living room, two design sofa-beds can accommodate two extra guests. They can be used separately or put together to form one king-size bed. Extra 'memory' mattresses ensure maximum comfort, and curtains separate the living room from the rest of the flat to offer privacy. The balcony has a table and lounge chairs and is big enough to have breakfast or lunch outside, or simply enjoy the open air. The modern open kitchen is fully e
neighborhood_overview: The flat is situated in Eaux-Vives neighbourhood, in a quiet area yet close to the vibrant attractions of this part of the city. Heading down towards the lake, you will find plenty of cozy and trendy cafes and restaurants, as well as art galleries and small shops. You are 10min walking-distance to the famous Geneva "jet d'eau". The area is very well connected with public transportations, and you can find supermarkets, pharmacies, parks, etc. nearby.
host_about: Married, live and work in Geneva with our 4 year-old twins. We Love travelling, good food and wine, interior design...

name: Duplex de300m2,jacuzzi en été, billard, ping-pong
description:
Appartement de 2 x 150m2, entièrement meublé, dans un quartier semi-industriel, au centre-ville, à deux pas de toutes commodités. Ce n'est pas un hôtel, vous logerez chez des personnes qui vivent là toute l'année et qui sont ravis de laisser leur logement quelques jours pour accueillir des voyageurs. Merci de respecter leurs affaires.
Veuillez entrer par le jardin et passer par la terrasse comme indiqué dans "entrée dans les lieux".

The space
Le souplex se situe à 10 minutes de l'aéroport, à 5 minutes de la gare et de l'hyper-centre-ville, à 100 mètres d'un centre commercial et des arrêts de bus. Mon logement est déal pour 2 à 4 couples, peut aussi convenir avec enfants, ou pouvant accueillir une grande famille.

Guest access
L'appartement entier, rez-de-jardin et rez-inférieur, est mis à disposition pour les voyageurs. En rez de jardin: 2 chambres, dont 1 suite parentale (avec sa salle de douches), avec lits doubles + possibilité 1 lit
neighborhood_overview: Ancien quartier industriel, entouré de villas ouvrières, au début du XXème, il est devenu résidentiel et artisanal. Proche des organisations internationales, de la gare et de toutes les commodités.
host_about:
Fraîchement retraitée, j'ai du temps pour recevoir mes hôtes dans quatre chambres doubles, avec salles de bains, dans le cadre de "Mon jardin en Ville". Il est aussi possible de louer les chambres avec accès à la cuisine et au reste de l'appartement ou de louer tout l'appartement-souplex. Après quelques missions humanitaires, d'où j'ai ramené meubles et décorations, j'ai aménagé un souplex-loft dans une zone industrielle, sur la rive-droite de Genève, proche de toutes commodités. Avec mon conjoint, nous prenons plaisir à recevoir des personnes de passage à Genève. Comme j'aime m'occuper de mon jardin, j'en profite aussi pour préparer des confitures, sirops, pâtes de fruits avec des fruits du jardin. Une deuxième résidence à Collex (canton de Genève), est également mise en location avec 5 chambres dans une villa mise en colocation pour des périodes de longue durée, voire â l'année. Un troisième logement, situé en bord de mer, en Catalogne, à Ametlla-de-Mar, est également mis en location. C'est un appartement de 4 chambres pouvant accueillir 6 personnes.
Ma devise: "La vie est une œuvre d'art très difficile, et, parti de rien, c'est déjà beaucoup que d'en réussir quelques parties, en travaillant et en économisant ". 
Citation de Henry Becque ; Les pensées et notes d'alb (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)

name: Anne’s Tiny House
description:
I welcome you in my lovely tiny house, which is situated in a calm and nice neighbourhood of Petit-Saconnex in Geneva. Downtown and the train station are only 12 min away with the bus and UN (United Nations), Palexpo are 15 min away. The tiny house is an extension of my familial house, but has its own entrance, which gives on a private lush garden of 25 m2

The space
The outdoor is 25 m2 big.
The indoor is 22 m2 big, and has:
•A comfortable kitchen/dining room space, fully equipped, with a table (can be extended) and seats for 2-6 persons. A nice window gives a view on the garden. During the night, this space becomes a bedroom thanks to the bed/wardrobe, which in a few seconds is transformed in a “real” 140cm-bed with high quality bedding. There is also a wardrobe of 150cm large, free for your use.
•A living room space with a big bay window, which gives access to the private garden. There is a comfortable couch (which on demand only can be transform
neighborhood_overview: It is situated in a very peaceful and great neighbourhood with several restaurants, many of them with terrace (Swiss, French, Italian, Thai, Japanese and fast-food), tea-rooms, stores, market at the farm and big parks very close. The biggest mall is 1.5km away. A foothpath throughout several parks leads directly to the train station and city centre (35-40 min). La Ferme de Budé is the last active farm in the city of Geneva, which is only 400m away. It has a big organic market for all gourmets.
host_about: Nous habitons Genève et aimons rencontrer de nouvelles personnes et cultures. Nous voyageons le plus souvent en bus VW avec notre tandem et nos chaussures de marche. Ouverture, chaleur humaine et bonne humeur nous caractérisent le plus souvent

Niché seul au 8eme étage, il se compose d'un grand hall d'entrée, un salon avec magnifique bibliothèque sur mesure et grand canapé très confortable, cuisine ouverte avec bar, WC visiteurs, master bedroom et salle de bains.

La terrasse qui fait le tour de l'appartement possède un coin relax av

name: The yurt, nature in the heart of the city
description:
Spend a night in a yurt.

Discover an incredible place in a beautiful private garden. Find yourself in the wild, under the benevolent attention of our century trees.

Our yurt is only two minutes away from the tramway stop, minimarket, restaurants, all this only ten minutes away by car from Geneva airport.

The space
"Pearing through 100 year old branches at clear blue sky.
I see buzzards circle high above.
A pollen covered bee falls in giddy delight at my side
as we share a corner of paradise
preserved from the backwards encroachment of progress."
Written by Andy Hamilton

Practical things to know :

Be aware that there are toilets in our garden, but not in the yurt. Neither is there a shower. On demand we can share our private bathroom and shower according to its availability, however, we cannot guarantee that it is going to be available according to your schedule.

Guest acces
neighborhood_overview:
Do you know that you're only a few steps away from the biggest scientific experience in the entire World !! The CERN is only two tramway stops away from our yurt. What are the great questions of contemporary physics? What is the Higgs Boson and what does it tell us about the origins of the Universe? What is the role of CERN, its focus and objectives? What are the experiments conducted on its premises?
CERN invites the public to discover the mysteries of the Universe and the work of the world's biggest physics laboratory through free of charge guided tours and permanent exhibitions. Universe of Particles is the exhibition installed in the Globe of Science and Innovation. Dedicated to CERN main missions it allows to explore the world of particles by immersing the visitor in a unique and spectacular ambiance.

Get info on CERN website (visit.cern)

name: Haven in the city
description:
Ideal flat downtown Geneva, cosy and beautiful. Superbly located close to everything but in a quiet street. Lake, old town, restaurants, museums, shops etc all within walking distance.

2 bedrooms, living room with open kitchen, dining table, piano and balcony. Entirely refurbished with top of the line equipment and furniture.

The space
Luxurious flat in the heart of Geneva.
- Living room: lounge, dining table, piano, balcony
- Open kitchen with dishwasher, steamer-oven, induction cooking and all the basics
- Bedrooms: super comfy 180cm bed in main bedroom, 90cm sofa-bed in second bedroom
- 1 bathroom with bathtub and washing machine
- 1 separate toilet

Quiet street with rooms overlooking a courtyard, and anyways the windows are double/triple glass ;)

Secured building. 3rd floor.

I only use eco-friendly cleaning products.

No TV.

Portable Wi-Fi device: you can go around to
neighborhood_overview:
Great lively yet safe neighborhood, full of restaurants, bars and shops. Have your coffee at Starbucks across the street, take a stroll at the market around the corner or hang out in the Parc des Bastion under the old city walls and Mur des Réformateurs. Walk up to the old town (10mn) and visit St Peter's cathedral, the charming streets and art galleries. Walk to the lake (10mn) or rent a bicycle and stroll around the shore. Check out the museums (watches at Patek Philippe Museum, art and history at MAH, ethnography at MEG or local history at the Museum of the Reformation), all within 10-15mn walk. Shop until you drop on Rue du Rhône and Rue du Marché, again 10mn away on foot. Visit the old Carouge and its lovely boutiques (10mn tram).

The UN, Red Cross Museum are about 20mn away with the bus.
host_about: World traveler, animal lover, adventure seeker, sailor, skydiver, proud vegan.

The apartment is located 500 meters from the Main Station. It is 6 minutes walking distance

host_about:
If you can keep your head when all about you;
  Are losing theirs and blaming it on you,
 If you can trust yourself when all men doubt you,
  But make allowance for their doubting too.
 If you can wait and not be tired by waiting,
  Or being lied about, don't deal in lies,
 Or being hated, don't give way to hating,
  And yet don't look too good, nor talk too wise:

 If you can dream—and not make dreams your master;
  If you can think—and not make thoughts your aim;
 If you can meet with Triumph and Disaster,
  And treat those two impostors just the same;
 If you can bear to hear the truth you've spoken
  Twisted by knaves to make a trap for fools,
 Or watch the things you gave your life to, broken,
  And stoop and build 'em up with worn-out tools:

 If you can make a heap of all your winnings
  And risk it on one turn of pitch-and-toss,
 And lose, and start again at your beginnings
  And never breathe a word about your loss;
 If you can force your heart and nerve and sinew
  To serve your turn long after they are gone,
 And so hold on when there is nothing in you
  Except the Will which says to them: "Hold on!"

 If you can talk with crowds and keep your virtue,
  Or walk with Kings—nor lose the common touch,
 If neither foes nor loving friends can hurt you,
  If all men count with you, but none too much;
 If you can fill the unforgiving minute
  With sixty seconds' worth of distance run,
 Yours is the Earth and everything that's in it,
  And—which is more—you'll be a Man, my son!

The park shelters several sculptures as well as two places of games for children.

2 bathrooms; one with a bath and one WC by the entrance hall.

name: Studio modern XXL all-in-one/S10-contrat de bail
description:
Un logement truffé d'aménagements malins. Il a tout d'un sweet home, ce studio d'exception n'a rien à envier aux grands appartements. On y trouve tous les éléments de vie nécessaires; soit: une kitchenette avec micro-ondes, machine Nespresso, bouilloire, une chambre à coucher modulable, un salon modulable, un espace bureau et encore de la place pour une garde robe! En plus de votre appartement privatif, il y a encore un accès supplémentaire, soit un lounge combinée d'une partie chill out.

The space
Un lieu contemporain et un concept unique de par sa multifonctionnalité, un dispositif d'eau filtrée et d'eau gazeuse écoresponsable offert aux hôtes. Une bouteille en verre se trouve dans le logement pour remplissage à volonté. Sans oublier le bâtiment alimenté principalement à l’énergie solaire photovoltaïque. Les studios sont insonorisés au niveau du plafond, du sol et des murs! La tranquillité assurée comme au milieu d'un champ :)!

Guest access
neighborhood_overview: Construite au XVIIIe siècle sur ordre du roi de Sardaigne pour concurrencer Genève, la Ville de Carouge est aujourd'hui une charmante cité pleine de cachet où il fait bon vivre et offrant une multitude de services , efficaces et accessibles pour toutes et tous.

name: Comfy room ★ Direct connection to PALEXPO |Parking
description:
Join our co-living space for an ideal blend of privacy and sharing experience! A perfect place to meet and interact with new people.

Located in the industrial neighborhood of La Praille, we offer coworking and co-living spaces for young professionals and entrepreneurs.

Fully-furnished rooms and well-equipped common spaces to be shared with our vibrant international community.

Our community manager will make sure you have a wonderful experience during your short- or long-term stay in Geneva :)

The space
We offer co-working for startups and entrepreneurs on our first floor, and a co-living space on our second floor.

Each is equipped with a double bed (130 cm) fully prepared with a duvet, pillows and bed linen. On your bed you will find a towel and a little brochure containing information regarding the space and area around it.

Each room offers storing options such as drawers and hangers, as well as a night tab
neighborhood_overview:
We are located in the vibrant industrial area of La Praille, just 2 min away from the Commercial Center of La Praille, where you can do your groceries, visit restaurants or go shopping, go to the cinema or play bowling.

The space is right next to the picturesque neighborhood of Carouge, commonly referred to as the "Greenwich Village of Geneva" or "Little Italy", for its many boutiques and studios where artisans and craftsmen of every ilk can be observed plying their trade. The bohemian vibe carries on into the night with a plethora of cafes, jazz bars and nightclubs.

name: Appartement 2 P Genève au coeur de Genève
description:
Deux pièces, idéal pour un couple (4 couchages néanmoins possibles : un lit double + un sofa (dans la même pièce).
En vacances ou en week-end à Genève, plein centre, proche tram, commerces et commodités. À deux pas de la vieille ville, il est très bien situé pour parcourir ou découvrir la ville de Genève non loin des théâtres. Il dispose d'un ascenseur.

The space
Deux pièces avec un lit double 180 x 200. Il comprend aussi un canapé lit 2 places. Ces couchages se situent dans la chambre.
Côté cuisine, elle comprend un plan de travail qui sert aussi de bureau.
Nespresso pour le café, bouilloire, tout le confort si vous souhaitez aussi cuisiner.
L'appartement est doté d'un wifi très rapide (fibre Swisscom très haut débit).

À l'extérieur, le quartier est animé à deux pas des musées et théâtres et du parc des bastions. Il y a de nombreux restaurants très sympas dans le quartier (japonais, burgers, salon de thé, italien, etc ) et des
neighborhood_overview:
Ambiance chaleureuse, quartier commerçants et proche de la vieille ville de Genève avec Plainpalais à proximité, il est idéalement desservi par les transports tram et bus. À quelques arrêts de la gare de Cornavin par le tram.
A proximité à pied du grand théâtre et des différents théâtres et musées.
Il est non loin aussi du Musée d'art contemporain et du quartier des bains (peintre et artiste).

Love travelling 
Very open minded.

name: "Blue room", next to GVA airport/UN
description:
For guest minimum age 25 years old. Pretty room + private shower, TV, next to Palexpo, Arena, shopping centre 120 shops, intl org.. Kitchen all equiped. 1 cat. Free wifi. Food not provided. Flat : 107 sq.m. Supermarkets: Huge Migros + Aldi 2 min. walk
Bus/tram : 11 min. CERN, 16 min. UN, 6 min. airport, 10 min. center town.
Min. 3 nights max 70. Strict cancell. policy.
Check-in Mon-Fri 6-7:30 p.m. strict. Flexible week-ends.
NO luggage deposit. LGBTIQ+ welcome. offer -30% if you book 9to12sept

The space
Some artworks from a local artist in the room, very quiet room, TV in the room, a few green plants in order to a have a bit of oxygen, a huge and very comfortable bed, this is what I offer to you. And my daughter and I are willing to help. For tourists : we are 2 min. walk from the biggest shopping center in the whole French part Switzerland. For business trips : we are not far from airport, international organisations (UN, WHO, ILO), Palexpo
neighborhood_overview:
Les Avanchets sont une cité dortoir historique car sa conception à l'époque et ses couleurs bigarrées étaient révolutionnaires.
En face de l'immeuble pourtant, une mare aux canards, des oies, et plein plein de lapins ! Beaucoup de verdure (de très grands arbres), et une vue à 360° du Jura et du Salève si on regarde par toutes les fenêtres de l'appartement.
host_about: I speak English and French and live with my 13 years-old daugther. We will be happy to share a coffee, a tea or a glass and chat for a while, we are be happy to meet a know new people. The past 15 years I travelled all around Europa and now my job is only in Geneva, and I happy with Airbnb to meet new people without travelling ! We have 2 huge nice quiet cats. Looking forward to meeting you !

name: Green room with a view
description:
Vous vivrez avec nous, une famille, dans un grand appartement appartenant à une résidence aisée.

Le quartier est très calme, nous sommes à 500m du lac, 2min en voiture de l’aéroport de Cointrin, 1min de la gare ferroviaire la plus proche: le train vous emmène au quartier de sécheron et des organisations internationales en 3min, à la gare cornavin en 5min.

C’est le logement idéal pour un stagiaire dans une OI, un doctorant ou un étudiant cherchant le calme pour étudier. 2 chambres avec vue.

The space
L’appartement comporte trois étages: cuisine au rez-de-chausseé, votre chambre et celle de l’autre locataire au premier, salle de bain avec toilettes et baignoire pour les deux, une autre chambre avec salle de bain indépendante, et au dernier étage, le grenier.
Vous pouvez utiliser la cuisine pour stocker vos provisions, réchauffer vos plats ou préparer des mets froids.

Guest access
Depuis la gare des Tuileries, pr
neighborhood_overview: L’appartement est situé dans une copropriété possédant un grand parc et une piscine. Le quartier est calme, principalement composé de grandes maisons. La gare de Genève est à 7min avec le train qui part de la gare des Tuileries, à 2min à pied de l’appartement. Le lac se trouve à 500m et la station balnéaire la plus proche à 10min à pied. La campagne n’est pas loin et il y a beaucoup de petits chemins pour les amateurs de footing et ballades.
host_about: Je suis étudiante à l’Université de Genève en relations internationales et parle français, anglais, espagnol et italien.

name: Cosy Private room in a spacious shared place
description:
Join our co-living space for an ideal blend of privacy and sharing experience! A perfect place to meet and interact with new people.

Located in the industrial neighborhood of La Praille, we offer coworking and co-living spaces for young professionals and entrepreneurs.

Fully-furnished rooms and well-equipped common spaces to be shared with our vibrant international community.

Our community manager will make sure you have a wonderful experience during your short- or long-term stay in Geneva :)

The space
We offer co-working for startups and entrepreneurs on our first floor, and a co-living space on our second floor.

Each is equipped with a double bed (130 cm) fully prepared with a duvet, pillows and bed linen. On your bed you will find a towel and a little brochure containing information regarding the space and area around it.

Each room offers storing options such as drawers and hangers, as well as a night tab
neighborhood_overview:
We are located in the vibrant industrial area of La Praille, just 2 min away from the Commercial Center of La Praille, where you can do your groceries, visit restaurants or go shopping, go to the cinema or play bowling.

The space is right next to the picturesque neighborhood of Carouge, commonly referred to as the "Greenwich Village of Geneva" or "Little Italy", for its many boutiques and studios where artisans and craftsmen of every ilk can be observed plying their trade. The bohemian vibe carries on into the night with a plethora of cafes, jazz bars and nightclubs.

Ideal location just 2 min. walk to the lake, 5 min. to the main train station Cornavin (where you can get to the airport in just 8min!) and 10 min. stroll to the UN offices and Palais des Nations. Well connected by bus or tram to the rest of the city and a 2min walk to the international bus station that bringing you to the beautiful mountains in the Swiss and French Alps as well as several European cities (Flix Bus Station).

name: Genève : Magnifique appartement près du lac
description:
Magnifique appartement au cœur du quartier des Eaux-Vives, décoré avec soin, à proximité immédiate du centre-ville, du lac et du parc de la Grange

The space
L'appartement est idéalement situé dans le centre ville, à quelques pas de la vieille ville, à 100 mètres du lac et directement sur le parc de la Grange.
Il se trouve au deuxième étage d'un immeuble très calme donnant sur le parc verdoyant dont vous pourrez admirer la vue depuis les deux balcons.

Le salon est très confortable et cosy, décoré avec de nombreuses œuvres d'art de qualité.
Vous trouverez dans la cuisine toute équipée tout ce qu'il vous faut pour préparer de bons petits plats. Elle jouit d'une grande table pour 4 convives.
La chambre est spacieuse, au calme sur la cour de l'immeuble.
L'internet Wifi est disponible dans tout l'appartement.

Guest access
Entrée de l'immeuble sécurisée avec un digicode, ascenseur disponible.
neighborhood_overview:
Le quartier des eaux-vives est un des quartiers les plus animés de Genève.
Disposant de nombreux bars et restaurants il jouit d'une atmosphère très latine.
Vous trouverez très certainement dans la célèbre rue Henri Blanvalet à quelques minutes à pied celui qui vous plaira!
C'est également le quartier idéal pour profiter du lac se trouvant à moins de 100m de l'appartement.
Pour les sportifs ou flâneurs, le parc de la Grange offre de très belles balades.
Enfin, l'accès à la vieille ville et aux boutiques se fait très facilement à pied ou en transport en commun.

name: Bright Attic Penthouse at Lake Geneva
description:
A central, airy, spacious, roof apartment, a 3 minute walk + 5 minute train ride to the airport. It is a stone's throw from Lake Geneva and boat transport to Eaux Vives, 10-min walk to Central Station, next to lots of great bars and restaurants, and 1 km from the Geneva Old Town and Financial district.

The space
This newly renovated apartment is in a building from the late 1800s and does not have an elevator, so we would advise against reserving with us if stairs are a concern.

Guest access
We're on the top floor, guests have access to all parts of the house and are welcome to use what is available in the kitchen.

Other things to note
It is a great space for quiet time, no parties or loud gatherings.

The apartment comes with cleaning robot that can dust and mop in case of any spills.

That said, there are several great bars and restaurants, supermarkets, and the  within a 100m radius. Jardin Botanique is also a 5 minute walk, and is great for runs.

name: 1st charming room in Geneva
description:
Our home is extremely charming, it's part of a 5 villas group that were all built during the year 1898, all located in a private and quiet road. The tram is 100 meters away from the house which makes it super easy to access the city center.

The space
We have a small garden surrounded by a lot of greenery.

Guest access
Shared spaces are: the kitchen & the garden, as long as you clean up after using them.
Our maid comes one time per week, on Friday.

Other things to note
This house is smoke free, you can smoke in the garden.
neighborhood_overview: Our neighborhood is called Grange Canal, it's in between the village called Chêne-Bougeries and Geneva. It's a residential neighborhood where a lot of villas also are from the same period, circa beginning of last century.
host_about: J'aime beaucoup la présence de visiteurs qui, s'ils choisissent ma maison, auront certainement du plaisir à y vivre et à y rencontrer d'autres voyageurs ou locataires à plus ou moins long terme. J'ai en tout  6 chambres à disposition dont une est déjà louée et deux sont pour moi. Beaucoup d'amis ou de clients passent au rez-de-chaussée et nous faisons parfois, hors-mis des séances de travail, aussi des diners et des fêtes, surtout en été. Si vous aimez le calme absolu vous ne devez pas choisir ce logement. Ici on aime la vie et on se régale!

name: The Green room in farmhouse
description:
Nice and comfortable bedroom in farmhouse from the 18th century. It comfortably fits one and is centrally located in the hearth of Geneva while enjoying nice woods and calm. Enjoy a nice kitchen, access to the garden and easy access to all bus lines.

The space
Near UN, ITU, WTO, WHO and numerous embassies, consulates and NGO. Ideally, the guests are interns working for UN or international organizations for at least 3 months. Preference is given to long term stay.
In summer, access to 2 barbecues, one on the terrace, one in the garden.
The farmhouse is located in very quiet surroundings, though in the middle of the City.
The City Center is at walking distance. 6 bus stops nearby: 3, 9, 11, 14, 18, 22.

Guest access
The guests have access to
- the kitchen, the terrace, the garden and its 2 barbecues, very nice and friendly to use during 8 months per year. Oil, vinegar, spices, tea, coffee, onions and garlic are provided
neighborhood_overview:
The farmhouse is ideally located in Servette/Petit Saconnex district, on the straight road from the train station to the airport.
In the area La Servette, you find all opportunities for grocery (Migros, Coop, Denner, Aldi) and for laundry (just before Migros or just after), and also Hair dresser, Backery, La Poste, etc.

If you need to have an official address in Geneva, if an official domiciliation is required by your employer for example, it is possible, but a special contract must be signed. This official address is not included in Airbnb contract.
host_about: Passionate about Geneva’s history, I like to tell stories for a good understanding of Geneva, an International City of only 199’000 inhabitants. The farmhouse was built in 1712, the very same year Jean-Jacques Rousseau, who was a philosopher, musician, botanist and novelist, was also born in Geneva. Apart from taking care of the guests, the house, the garden and the animals (cats, dog, hens), I am an entrepreneur and author. I write books on collaborative management, creativity, heutagogy and collective intelligence. My companion Cristobal is a “grand format” portrait’s painter. His studio is also located in the farmhouse. Our values : support, pleasure, integrity, creativity, listening, autonomy.

name: Cool flat + 4 BIKES to Explore GENEVA
description:
Stylishly designed 5th floor flat within a quiet residential neighbourhood close to the city centre. A great base from which to explore Geneva and very convenient for the United Nations. Rooms offer comfort and amenities, free wifi, bed linen, toiletries, tea & coffee, TV, and a DVD player. A fully equipped kitchen, to enjoy your cooking, and a designated dining area. Or enjoy a coffee on the balcony.
Best of all you will have 4 bikes to discover Geneva!

The space
The flat is bright and spacious, and well equipped with all necessities, a full kitchen and bathroom, and comfortable beds with ironed sheets. The flat is a comfortable haven with internet, between your Geneva explorations, with less than 2km to the UN. The bikes that come with this flat are all provided with locks in order to explore Geneva’s hidden gems.

Guest access
Guests can access the whole apartment.

Other things to note
If you need anything at a
neighborhood_overview: This neighbourhood is very central, close to the train station, close to downtown Geneva and the old town, it is surrounded by parks and offers very easy access to the airport. It is a lively area with many restaurants, cafés, stores, a weekly market, cinemas, and a variety of fun activities. There is a large Manor store only 10min away by foot as well. Various trams and bus lines come through this area and the proximity of the train station is perfect for trips outside of Geneva.

Satigny is an essentially agricultural and wine village. It is the largest wine-growing town in Switzerland, located near the river Allondon. Two bakeries, a market every Tuesday and Thursday, restaurants, a grocery store, a tobacconist, a butcher, a pharmacy, a post office and a bank in the village. Les Vergers is an outdoor swimming pool at 10 min by walk.

The space
Amazing quiet location in the heart of the vineyards in the village of Satigny. The location is near Palexpo, United Nations and CERN. The airport is at 10 min by taxi and the public transportations are at 3 min by walk from the residence. A very spacious and fully equipped luxurious duplex apartment completely renovated. One bedroom with a large bed, one mezzanine bedroom with stairs, a bathroom with a bath, an open kitchen with appliances, and a living room with a balcony.

name: Apartment in the center of Geneva, only for ladies
description:
Logement très bien situé, au centre ville de Genève, située à la pointe sud du lac Léman. Entourée par les montagnes du Jura et des Alpes, la ville offre des vues exceptionnelles sur le majestueux Mont-Blanc. Siège de l'Office des Nations Unies et de la Croix-Rouge, elle est un centre mondial de la diplomatie et du secteur bancaire. le quartier des universités, au caractère international affirmé. Tout à proximité des transports publics, à quelques minutes de la gare routière et de l’aéroport.

The space
Au centre ville, royalement desservi par les transports publics, à proximité de toutes les commodités, centres commerciaux, restaurants, pubs,...Tout en passant par des jardins verdoyants et des parcs qui s’associent à la détente et aux loisirs de la population et les visiteurs.

name: Charming, Luxury apartment, Old Town
description:
Ideal base for your business meetings or romantic stays.
Extraordinary apartment in the heart of the Old Town of historical Geneva, 600m to the lake.

The space
Extraordinary apartment in the heart of the old town of historic Geneva. Luxurious decoration and artistic atmosphere in a 17th century classified house.
Very quiet at night. Forbidden traffic. The place is lively in the daytime: antique dealers, decorators, art galleries, restaurants, cafés, bars, bakery, grocer's shop, exhibitions, museums, etc.
With bus 5 (since the stop " Palais-Eynard " located a few meters away from the apartment), you will be at the Cornavin station within 7 min., 10 min. at the United Nations Organization and 20 min. at the Cointrin airport, the international airport of Geneva! A taxi station is also a few meters away from the apartment.
Whole apartment with elevator and intercom.
In the daytime the apartment can serve as office for professional meetings:

name: Homeboat - your house on the lake
description:
We guarantee you a total displacement aboard our exceptional boat in the heart of the city. Only 10min walk from the train station the tranquility is rigorous with a breathtaking view of the Mont Blanc, the Alps and the "Jet d'eau". A stay on HomeBoat is a sensation of freedom with a comfort like at home. The wooded interior, the charm of another time will not leave you indifferent.

The space
Incomparable hospitality, professionalism, dedication and attention to detail are the values of HomeBoat in order to ensure the happiness and satisfaction of each host.

Guest access
The boat is fully privatized and the check in is managed independently. No need to make an appointment and be on time. You arrive when you want and benefit from video support for a simplified and efficient check-in.
neighborhood_overview: The district of Port Wilson is lively in the summer with lots of bars, restaurants and shops (bakeries, laundry "5 à sec", food "Migros, Denner, Coop", pharmacy, bank BCGE, Western Union, tobacconists, hairdressers, petrol station, parking) available. Only 10 minutes from the train station, this district is the top 1 activity for walks along the quays. The atmosphere is peaceful and pleasant.
host_about: En tant que capitaine, skipper et animateur, je souhaite transmettre ma passion pour les bateaux et le lac à nos hôtes. HomeBoat est une société indépendante Suisse qui crée des émotions uniques pour ses hôtes et transmet sa passion pour le lac à travers ses loisirs variés et insolites.

name: Lit-canapé dans supersouplex loft.
description:
Dans un super-souplex, dans un quartier industriel en centre-ville de Genève. Nous mettons à disposition un lit-canapé pour deux personnes (c'est un espace refermé par des rideaux anti-bruit, voire les photos) avec accès à la salle de douches (en partage). Veuillez entrer par le jardin et passer par la terrasse comme indiqué dans "entrée dans les lieux".

The space
C'est un appartement avec un jardin, dans une villa formée de trois appartements, au centre-ville. L'appartement est composé de 4 chambres et d'un bureau. Deux chambres se louent sur Airbnb, ainsi que l'appartement en entier. Le lit-canapé que nous proposons ici se situe dans la partie souplex, organisé en loft. Le lit canapé est un lit d'appoint car il n'est pas situé dans une chambre fermée mais dans un espace nuit du loft, refermé par des rideaux anti-bruit. Les bruits des autres locataires peuvent être entendus.

Guest access
Les voyageurs ont accès au lit-canapé situé dans la
neighborhood_overview: Ancien quartier industriel et de villas d'ouvriers, le quartier est en train d'évoluer vers la modernité. Situé proche des organisations internationales, le logement se situe à 10 minutes en bus de la gare et de l'aéroport.
host_about:
Fraîchement retraitée, j'ai du temps pour recevoir mes hôtes dans quatre chambres doubles, avec salles de bains, dans le cadre de "Mon jardin en Ville". Il est aussi possible de louer les chambres avec accès à la cuisine et au reste de l'appartement ou de louer tout l'appartement-souplex. Après quelques missions humanitaires, d'où j'ai ramené meubles et décorations, j'ai aménagé un souplex-loft dans une zone industrielle, sur la rive-droite de Genève, proche de toutes commodités. Avec mon conjoint, nous prenons plaisir à recevoir des personnes de passage à Genève. Comme j'aime m'occuper de mon jardin, j'en profite aussi pour préparer des confitures, sirops, pâtes de fruits avec des fruits du jardin. Une deuxième résidence à Collex (canton de Genève), est également mise en location avec 5 chambres dans une villa mise en colocation pour des périodes de longue durée, voire â l'année. Un troisième logement, situé en bord de mer, en Catalogne, à Ametlla-de-Mar, est également mis en location. C'est un appartement de 4 chambres pouvant accueillir 6 personnes.
Ma devise: "La vie est une œuvre d'art très difficile, et, parti de rien, c'est déjà beaucoup que d'en réussir quelques parties, en travaillant et en économisant ". 
Citation de Henry Becque ; Les pensées et notes d'alb (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)

name: Stunning, Renovated Duplex - Old Town
description:
This light and spacious renovated attic apartment is a real “Coup de Coeur” in central Geneva! It offers a fully equipped and luxurious alternative to a cramped hotel room. A perfect place to relax or stroll through leafy parks up to the old town

The space
This spacious, modern and renovated 45sqm studio is luxuriously equipped to host a couple with children or friends (max 3 adults, or 2 adults and 2 children).
On entering the apartment the first thing to hit you is the distinctive wooden beams, real wooden flooring throughout and the beautiful staircase.

Guest access
Guests will have access to all amenities on site

Other things to note
The washer and dryer will only be available on request for guest staying more than 3 weeks
neighborhood_overview: This studio is ideally located close to many points of interests such as the lake, the Jet d'Eau, the Flower Clock, St Peter's Cathedral, the Tavel House, the Grand-Théâtre, Park Bastions, the Russian Church and many other beautiful sites. The main shopping street is also a 3-minute walk away.
host_about:
Keys'n'Fly - Airbnb Management Solution That Suits You
My name is Marc with Keys'n'Fly Vacation Rentals, a full service property management company based out of Geneva, Switzerland. My team and I strive to make every experience a seamless one, no matter where your trip may take you. As hospitality professionals experts, we are dedicated to provide superior customer service with attentiveness to inquiries and our guests while they are staying with us. 
Our beloved hosts trust us in managing their properties on their behalf and we hope you will trust us with your stay.
Please let us know how we may help you with your next trip.

name: Charming one-bedroom apartment in central Geneva.
description:
I am renting a very nice one-bedroom apartment in the very central "Eaux-Vives" area, a stone's throw from the lake and with a beautiful view on the Fountain from the living-room.

2 supermarkets very nearby, as well as a bus stop (10mn to the train station). Also very closed to beautiful parks ("Parc des Eaux-Vives" and "Parc de la Grange"), as well as the Old City.

You will have full use of the apartment. Furnished kitchen, bathroom and bedroom but no dishwashing machine nor washing machine.

The space
Beautiful view. Very charming flat in old building with high ceilings and wooden floors.

Guest access
Entire flat (except one tiny room for storage) : living-room, kitchen, double-bedroom, bathroom.

Other things to note
The flat is only for 2 people, ideally a couple (one bedroom only). I ask my guests to be quiet and discrete.
neighborhood_overview:
The area is perfect for dining and going out. I highly recommend to go to "Henri Blanvalet" street : plenty of bars ("Bottle Brothers", "Atelier Cocktail"...).

The Old City is also a very nice place to visit and have dinner. If you like to explore, go to "Carouge" : a beautiful and typical old area, perfect for a daily as well as for going out.

If you want to relax and have a bath, do as the locals and go to "Bains des Pâquis". There are little boats living (2 CHF ticket) 5mn from the flat, where you cross the lake to go on the other sied (5mn). The food is fresh, amazing and very cheap!

name: Stellar Stay in Wonderful Studio - Old Town
description:
This great little apartment has been furnished to an impeccable standard.

It’s the ideal retreat for a fully facilitated & up-scale stay, located in the absolute heart of Geneva. We believe it’s the ultimate location to experience the city center the way it should be.

At 70 m from St. Pierre Cathedral and 800 m from Jet d'Eau, the flat is the heart of Geneva's old town. Get ready to get inspired! All in all, guaranteed enjoyment and relaxation. Settle in a professionally cleaned home.

The space
This superbly styled apartment makes for a perfectly convenient getaway. Ideal for couples looking for a “home away from home” or a romantic break. It also suits solo-travelers, small groups of friends looking for the go-to central location who want to immerse themselves in the old town & shopping heaven. Great for people looking for an exquisite ‘Genevan’ experience. Perfect if you want to be close to Geneva’s Calvinist story. Overall it’s a quiet
neighborhood_overview:
You’ve probably heard all the stereotypes about Geneva. But it’s only when you come that they can be challenged. Yes, there’s wealth, fondue, chocolate and watchmaking. But Geneva is also charged with diversity and creativity, in neighbourhoods like Les Grottes or the Italian-flavoured Carouge. Get the Geneva Pass for free access to museums, several tours, cruises and transportation!

Lake Geneva and its iconic plume of water will draw your eye on promenades and lush waterside parks, while Mont Salève is a slice of the Alps in the background. Geneva is still a beacon of diplomacy, where organizations like the United Nations and the Red Cross convene. Loads to do for all tastes, from outdoor adventures for local explorers to total isolation for those who prefer the homely and the comfy!

Geneva's Old Town, in French called Vieille Ville, is an ancient maze of small streets and picturesque squares, filled with homey cafés, restaurants, galleries, museums and historica
host_about:
Hi!
My name is Augustin. I’m a 31-year-old entrepreneur with a passion for hospitality and travel, always looking to create amazing guest experiences. I really enjoy the ability to share the experience of living in this great home. 

Definitely check with me for amazing sunset locations, where to go for superb walks, and where to have mindblowing culinary experiences! 

I have lived in Switzerland, Paris, Shanghai and Panama, and Medellin, Colombia for work and love to discover new cultures and landscapes myself.

Whether I’m cycling 5000km trails, climbing for 2 months in a fjord far away in Greenland, or freediving down to 35m deep, adventure and I are friends, to say the least!

I will always try to meet your expectations and even go beyond the expectation of your stay. If you have any suggestions for me, please let me know!

Some great features I have are due to the inspirations of other guests that stayed with me and had interesting ideas. So please don't hesitate to let me know your thoughts. 

Feel free to communicate with me!

Hope to see you soon,

Augustin

name: Magnifique appartement calme
description:
Bel appartement authentique de 80m2, entre ville et campagne. Idéal pour un séjour à Genève, à 9 minutes en taxi de l'aéroport et de Palexpo. Salon agréable, lumineux, bibliothèque, piano, plantes vertes, et un chat merveilleux et très câlin (peu allergène). Ambiance harmonieuse, tranquille et reposante. L'endroit parfait pour séjourner plusieurs jours de suite et ainsi profiter de la tranquillité suisse.

The space
Situé au troisième et dernier étage d'un petit immeuble de campagne, l'appartement donne vue sur la montagne du Jura, enneigée en hiver. Il est décoré avec amour, plein d'objets uniques et chinés dans Genève. Son salon est lumineux et agréable à vivre. L'atmosphère y est très tranquille et reposante, et les livres y sont en quantité. Une terrasse est à votre disposition, avec vue sur les montagnes. Le lit est très grand (180×200) type futon.

Guest access
Tout l'appartement est accessible durant votre séjour. Une chambre à lessive
neighborhood_overview: Quartier très calme, petit village en bordure de la ville. Boulangeries, poste, supermarché à 3 minutes à pied. Arrête de bus à 3 minutes, qui vous amène au tram: direct jusqu'en ville en 25 minutes. Vie tranquille et jolies ballades dans le coin (forêt à 7 minutes à pied, colline et vue panoramique à 15 minutes)
host_about: Passionnée et vive, j'enseigne le yoga et la méditation. J'aime le voyage et les rencontres.

name: Family duplex with private garden near town center
description:
Contemporary 3-bedroom duplex apartment with private garden, perfect for families. The ground floor comprises of a large open space living area and a new fully equipped kitchen with large windows that give direct access to the private garden. The first floor contains two bedrooms with a shared bathroom that are currently set up as a children's and guest room, plus a third master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom.

The space
The whole flat is set up with children in mind, so parents can relax and enjoy their stay. There are plenty of toys and books, the staircase can be protected with toddler security gates and the outdoor private garden has a large Springfree trampoline, designed with child safety in mind (http://www.springfreetrampoline.com/). A large gas BBQ is also available for use by our guests.

Guest access
The whole appartment
neighborhood_overview: Duplex is situated in a quiet residential area, with  easy access downtown (10 minutes by direct tram line number 12). The pedestrian area just behind our building has many amenities, including a small convenience shop with fresh pastries every morning, a pharmacy, a pizzeria, a cafe, a hair dressers and a dry cleaners. A short 5 minute walk away is Geneva's largest park with children's playground, summer splash-pool, and an open-air theatre. The beautiful lake-front is 10 minutes walk through the park.

description:

Located in the industrial neighborhood of La Praille, we offer coworking and co-living spaces for young professionals and entrepreneurs.

Fully-furnished rooms and well-equipped common spaces to be shared with our vibrant international community.

Our community manager will make sure you have a wonderful experience during your short- or long-term stay in Geneva :)

The space
We offer co-working for startups and entrepreneurs on our first floor, and a co-living space on our second floor.

Each is equipped with a double bed (130 cm) fully prepared with a duvet, pillows and bed linen.

Each room offers storing options such as drawers and hangers, as well as a night table by the bed and a full-size mirror.

Guest access
The coliving space is composed of 10 rooms lo
neighborhood_overview:
We are located in the vibrant industrial area of La Praille, just 2 min away from the Commercial Center of La Praille, where you can do your groceries, visit restaurants or go shopping, go to the cinema or play bowling.

The space is right next to the picturesque neighborhood of Carouge, commonly referred to as the "Greenwich Village of Geneva" or "Little Italy", for its many boutiques and studios where artisans and craftsmen of every ilk can be observed plying their trade. The bohemian vibe carries on into the night with a plethora of cafes, jazz bars and nightclubs.

neighborhood_overview:
The Eaux-Vives district is home to the Jet d’Eau and evokes a calm way of life.

The Eaux-Vives district is proud of its Jet d’Eau, landmark of Geneva. Here you have a wide choice of well-priced restaurants in a friendly setting. The splendid Parc des Eaux-Vives with its terrific view of the lake and its gourmet restaurant is the place to recharge batteries in one of nature’s most beautiful settings. No less magnificient is the adjoining Parc La Grange, home to Geneva’s most beautiful rose garden. In summer, this park dances to the sound of free concerts.

name: Appartement aux portes de Genève/St.-Julien
description:
Cet appartement se trouve à deux pas de la douane de Perly/Genève. Le bus D s'arrête devant l'immeuble et va directement dans le centre de Genève (20 minutes). Le centre de St.-Julien est à trois minutes et vous trouverez banque, poste, magasins, supermarchés, boulangeries, coiffeur, etc. à proximité. L’aéroport et PALEXPO sont à 12 minutes en voiture. L'autoroute est à 3 minutes.

The space
L’appartement se trouve dans une résidence sécurisée avec des codes d’entrée au dernier étage, parking gratuit devant la résidence, également sécurisé. L’immeuble a été construit récemment. C’est un immeuble moderne et technologiquement à la pointe. C’est un appartement de 48 m² avec un grand balcon. Cuisine américaine donnant sur le salon, vue imprenable et très lumineux. Chambre à coucher. Salle de bain avec douche italienne. Vous y trouverez une machine à laver le linge. La cuisine est complètement équipée, micro-ondes, four, machine à vaisselle, machine à café, etc.
neighborhood_overview: Cette appartement se trouve à 2 pas de la douane suisse. Vous trouverez tous les commerces et supermarchés accessible à pied. I y a une pizzeria en bas de l'immeuble ainsi que un bar branché.
host_about: Je suis artiste peintre et j'aime voyager. Les voyages me permettent de m'évader, de m'enrichir et surtout de partager. J'adore le contact avec les autres. Je suis une personne spontanée, optimiste et je m'adapte facilement.

name: 2ème chambre charmante à Genève
description:
Notre maison est extrêmement charmante. Elle fait partie d'un petit groupe de 5 maisons identiques, dans un chemin sans issue, construites en 1898.
Son emplacement à 100m du tram, sa quiétude ainsi que sa proximité au centre-ville sont ses atouts principaux.

The space
Nous avons un petit jardin entouré de beaucoup de verdure.

Guest access
Les espaces communs sont: la cuisine et le jardin à condition que vous nettoyiez après votre passage. Notre fée du ménage ne passe qu'une fois par semaine, le vendredi.

Une petite boîte avec un code 9497 permet de prendre une clef et ouvrir la porte. mais la plupart du temps il y aura une personne à la maison qui accueillera le nouveau voyageur

Other things to note
La maison est non-fumeur, vous pouvez fumer dans le jardin.
neighborhood_overview: Notre quartier s'appelle Grange-Canal et se trouve entre le village de Chêne-Bougeries et Genève. C'est un quartier de villas dont beaucoup datent du début du siècle dernier.
host_about: J'aime beaucoup la présence de visiteurs qui, s'ils choisissent ma maison, auront certainement du plaisir à y vivre et à y rencontrer d'autres voyageurs ou locataires à plus ou moins long terme. J'ai en tout  6 chambres à disposition dont une est déjà louée et deux sont pour moi. Beaucoup d'amis ou de clients passent au rez-de-chaussée et nous faisons parfois, hors-mis des séances de travail, aussi des diners et des fêtes, surtout en été. Si vous aimez le calme absolu vous ne devez pas choisir ce logement. Ici on aime la vie et on se régale!

name: Spacious and elegant 2 bedroom apt next to river
description:
This elegant & spacious 2 bedroom(140m2)apartment right next to the Arve river in Geneva is the perfect choice for families,couples or groups of friends traveling for business or pleasure.
The area where the building is located is perfect: you can listen to the sound of the small waterfall in the Arve while going for a run or a walk along the river, close to the 12 and 15 tram stations, beautiful parks and grocery stores. Only a 15-20 minute walk to the center of Geneva, Old Town and Lake Leman.

The space
You can use everything but the storage room at the end of the corridor in the apartment, which has some personal belongings.

Guest access
Guests can use everything in the apartment, including the clothing iron in the storage room and the umbrellas provided in case there is rain.
The only area that is private is the storage room at the end of the corridor which has some personal belongings.

Other things to note<
neighborhood_overview:
The building of this great apartment faces the Arve river where you can walk alongside it and enjoy the beautiful and raw nature right in Geneva.
The apartment is 3 min walk from Carouge (right side of the main entrance as you are walking out)- a neighborhood full of cafes, boutiques, great restaurants and art.
The highly rated restaurant L’artichoke is 3 min walk from the apartment in the direction of Carouge. I suggest you give it a try. If looking for something more casual, the italian restaurant at the corner of the road on the Acacias direction is a great choice. (Only 2 min walk)
host_about:
Hello,
I am Floriana, an former TV show host in Albania now running Bona Fide Business in Geneva, a business circle dealing with exclusive business opportunities. 
I love traveling and enjoying the best of what other places have to offer, therefore i keep that in mind in welcoming my guests in Geneva. 
I hope you love your stay in my apartment!
