name: Presigne: campagne de reve
description:
Réveillez-vous dans un beau studio de campagne, très calme, dans la campagne genevoise. Situé à 15-20 minutes de la ville de Genève et a 6-7 minutes du premier supermarché, ce studio est parfait pour un week-end au calme ou une semaine revitalisante de marche. Il est parfait pour accueillir un couple ou une personne seul souhaitant est isolé dans la nature.

Y accéder en transport publique est difficile, nous recommandons donc à nos potentielles hôtes d’être motorisés.

The space
Studio située en campagne genevoise, faisant partis d'une grande ferme rénovée.
Cadre dépaysant, entouré par des écuries, un potager et une grande piste hippique d'une hectare. Étant à la lisière des bois de Jussy, beaucoup de magnifiques marches en foret sont possible. A 10 minutes de voiture des Voiron marches de montagne finissant avec une vue panoramique de Genève sont également envisageable.

Guest access
Le studio à une entrée indépendante.
neighborhood_overview:
La superficie de la commune de Presinge est de 471 hectares et sa population est actuellement de 677 personnes (fin 2016).

Durant des siècles, les habitants de Presinge, les Presingeois, tirèrent leur revenu du travail de la terre. Aujourd'hui encore, la commune est vouée à l'agriculture et à la viticulture. On y trouve aussi deux restaurants et de magnifiques sentiers de promenade.

name: Pink room with a view
description:
Vous vivrez avec nous, une famille, dans un grand appartement appartenant à une résidence aisée.

Le quartier est très calme, nous sommes à 500m du lac, 2min en voiture de l’aéroport de Cointrin, 1min de la gare ferroviaire la plus proche: le train vous emmène au quartier de sécheron et des organisations internationales en 3min, à la gare cornavin en 5min.

C’est le logement idéal pour un stagiaire dans une OI, un doctorant ou un étudiant cherchant le calme pour étudier.

The space
L’appartement comporte trois étages: cuisine au rez-de-chausseé, votre chambre et celle de l’autre locataire au premier, salle de bain avec toilettes et baignoire pour les deux, une autre chambre avec salle de bain indépendante, et au dernier étage, le grenier.
Vous pouvez utiliser la cuisine pour stocker vos provisions, réchauffer vos plats ou préparer des mets froids.

Guest access
Depuis la gare des Tuileries, prendre les escaliers q
neighborhood_overview: L’appartement est situé dans une copropriété possédant un grand parc et une piscine. Le quartier est calme, principalement composé de grandes maisons. La gare de Genève est à 7min avec le train qui part de la gare des Tuileries, à 2min à pied de l’appartement. Le lac se trouve à 500m et la station balnéaire la plus proche à 10min à pied. name: Studio sleeping 4 to 5 people
description:
A great clean and furnished apartment in a nice neighbourhood.
It is located in a residential and green area close to the center of Geneva and all amenities.

The space
A lovely, airy and luminous studio apartment on the third floor. The large windows provide beautiful view and a copious amount of natural light.
The apartment has a small separate equipped kitchen.
In the main room, there is a dining table, 6 chairs, a large TV, a work desk with chair, an armchair that can be turned into a single bed, a double sofa bed, a folding bed and a mattress that can be put on the floor.
In the bathroom, there is a bathtub.
People leaving in the condo are mostly retirees and working professionals.
neighborhood_overview: Although very close to the city centre, the neighbourhood exudes calm and tranquility. This chic area is renowned for its bourgeois buildings and villas. The area also boasts one of the largest green spaces in Geneva, the Parc Bertrand, and is very close to the university hospital (HUG).  It is worth visiting on a Thursday to take advantage of the quaint local market that is just next door.

Please don't hesitate to ask for advice, help or/and assistance.

The space

Building is almost next to WIPO and United Nations (walking 10 minutes), on the way to and from the Geneva Airport (bus # 5, stop Intercontinental), and very easy to the lake, downtown and all interesting spots in Geneva.

neighborhood_overview: Geneva in general is a green city, with beautiful walks around lake (swimming in which is great). Our neighborhood is very quiet, we are surrendered by parks. There are two bakeries/coffee  stores next to us, one open on Sunday having a great breakfast deal (6 CHF for coffee/pastry). name: Charming place in Geneva, close to the lake
description:
Charming apartment with a lot of character, bright and spacious, ideally located in the heart of the city, close by the old town. Ideal for a couple, can host up to four people.

The space
Composed of a large entrance, a dining room and a living room, a large and a small bedroom, kitchen and bathroom.

The living rooms overlooks a very clear view with trees, and from which it is possible to see the jet d'eau (though not directly). The rooms and kitchen side are on the quiet side and benefit from a beautiful light, huge interior court and no direct vis à vis.

Guest access
Everything is accessible within the apartment itself except for clearly indicated PRIVATE SPACES - please respect those.
In order to do the laundry, the communal laundry room is located on another floor.

Other things to note
Our cat Jouja will keep you company during your stay. She is very curious and will approach you. We count on you
neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood is halfway between the old town, the shopping district of Rive and the lively Eaux-Vives, all very close by. Check our recommendations for more info! You will be perfectly located to check our the fantastic Museum of Natural History.
Shopping, restaurants, everything is within walking distance.
Ideally located to reach Chamonix in winter.

name: GVA 1- 12 mnth sublet - light apt view Eaux Vives
description:
GVA furnished apt - Sublet - Lovely open, airy, elegant apartment - central location in Eaux Vives, close to all transport. Dec 1 on 1-12 months possible. No pets. View, balcony with two chairs to enjoy view de la Mairie des Eaux Vives & top of jet d’eau! One bedroom with double bed, open plan sitting room and dining area. Separate kitchen. Guest loo + separate bathroom. Fully equipped. Wifi, TV with all the cable channels, towels, sheets etc.

The space
Fabulous location near the lake and the fresh fruit market in Eaux Vives. Also safe to walk around at night etc. Eaux Vives is the best area with all the hippest coolest cafes, bars and restaurants + park and easy lakeside access.

Guest access
Full apt, except for one cupboard.

Other things to note
Hi, this is available to rent by the month and for longer term stays. Do get in touch.
neighborhood_overview: Eaux Vives is one of the nicest and most central neighbourhoods in Geneva.  Five minute walk from the iconic Jet d`Eau water fountain and lake.
host_about: Mountains or sea - just the best! In the Alps, Verbier is fabulous for those who do ski and for those who don`t - for those who like to ski hard or cruise to lunch; to party or take it easy. On piste and off piste - for raclette with friends or for a peaceful snowy walk with deer and marmottes - plus the food and log fires are great. By the sea, the Antibes apt is a great place to base oneself to visit and enjoy la Côte d`Azur. Antibes is low key chic, with a beautiful old town and super yacht port. Plus the pool is fab to swim in and there is tennis, a breathtaking view and parking. Enjoy!

La chambre est spacieuse, munie d'un grand lit double (une ou deux personnes), de deux armoires, un petit bureau et un coin lavabo. Petit réfrigérateur, coin café/thé. TV sur demande.

Pour amateur de vieilles demeures et de tranquillité et de verdure. La chambre est dans une villa individuelle.L'étage où se trouve la chambre n'est pas occupé par d'autres personnes.

name: 3 bedroom apartment in the center of Geneva
description:
Very bright and central apartment , located in a lively part of Geneva, with supermarkets, lots of restaurants & bars, flea & food markets and the Rhone river if you fancy a swim.

Our flat is 50 meters from a tramway and bus stop, it takes 15mn to go to the train station and 25mn to the airport with public transports.

The space
The apartment is located on the 2nd floor (with no elevator). It has 3 bedrooms, a living room, a kitchen, a bathroom, separate toilets and a long balcony. It can accommodate 4 to 5 persons. It is perfect for a family with kids.

COVID-19 cleaning protocol: We pay even more attention to cleaning than we were before. We use bleach to sanitise floors, kitchen, bathroom, toilets and door knobs. Supplies such as disinfectant spray, hand sanitizer, hand soap are available for guests.

name: House to Rent
description:
Fully furnished, 3 bedrooms = 1 double-bed room, with king-size bed, 1 double-bed room, with queen-size bed, and 2 single beds room, with a large cozy space / playroom. Close to ski slopes and golf courses. The Palexpo and UN organizations are just 10 minutes away. The lake is down the road, with places to swim. Minimum 3 people. For fewer number, book through Room for Rent. CHF125.- for the first person and only CHF25.- more per person, thereafter. For stay =>2 months, request for prices.

The space
Rental does not include basement.
Write to inquire.
neighborhood_overview:
Friendly Swiss neighbors. No parking in front of their door. Noise down, after 22h00, like the rest of Switzerland. However, very helpful, if called upon.
This is a relatively large house. All parts of the house, generally used by guests are cleaned. Washed & ironed linens and towels are provided for each guests. Do not hesitate to request for additional cleaning, washing or ironing, if required. The additional cost for house hand is CHF25.- an hour, which would be at the cost of the guests. Do not hesitate to reach me, either in person or via messages, to address your need and not wait after your departure to express your needs.

This 5 rooms, 2 bedrooms apt is distributed around a main entrance, with natural light in all rooms.
This high-floor apt is extremely quiet, includes both an elegant dining and living, opening on a balcony with a view on the surrounding mountains.
A bathroom and separate toilet, and a large-size fully equipped kitchen are available for making yourself at home.
This gem apt is 6 stops away from the main train station, and just a 20
neighborhood_overview:
Just around the corner you will find among the greatest hand-made chocolate in Geneva as well as a mix of ethnic cuisine such as Vietnam, Ethiopia, Korea. Local shops are available for your grocery, newspapers stand with intl press, bookstores, with most museums being within a 700m walk.
The apartment is also just a 3' walk from the trendy old quarter of Carouge ( our local Notting Hill) with its authentic shops, tasty restaurants, pedestrian streets and great wine bars - a must see experience.
It is also a 3 tram stops away from the old city, the Victoria Hall and Grand Theater, the banking district and the Lake.
A 20' bus ride and you will reach the UN and 30' Palexpo.
host_about:
Working and living in Geneva for more than 10 years after having traveled the world for work from Asia to the Middle-East, and Africa.
I enjoy swimming, ski, hiking and diving. Quality food and wines are part of my way of life together with a great appetite for arts and culture.

The space

L'appartement est composé de 3 chambres et d'un bureau, au rez supérieur. Deux chambres se louent sur Airbnb, ainsi que l'appartement en entier. neighborhood_overview: Ancien quartier industriel et de villas d'ouvriers, le quartier est en train d'évoluer vers la modernité. Situé proche des organisations internationales, le logement se situe à 10 minutes en bus de la gare et de l'aéroport.
host_about:
Fraîchement retraitée, j'ai du temps pour recevoir mes hôtes dans quatre chambres doubles, avec salles de bains, dans le cadre de "Mon jardin en Ville". Il est aussi possible de louer les chambres avec accès à la cuisine et au reste de l'appartement ou de louer tout l'appartement-souplex. Après quelques missions humanitaires, d'où j'ai ramené meubles et décorations, j'ai aménagé un souplex-loft dans une zone industrielle, sur la rive-droite de Genève, proche de toutes commodités. Avec mon conjoint, nous prenons plaisir à recevoir des personnes de passage à Genève. Comme j'aime m'occuper de mon jardin, j'en profite aussi pour préparer des confitures, sirops, pâtes de fruits avec des fruits du jardin. Une deuxième résidence à Collex (canton de Genève), est également mise en location avec 5 chambres dans une villa mise en colocation pour des périodes de longue durée, voire â l'année. Un troisième logement, situé en bord de mer, en Catalogne, à Ametlla-de-Mar, est également mis en location. C'est un appartement de 4 chambres pouvant accueillir 6 personnes.
Ma devise: "La vie est une œuvre d'art très difficile, et, parti de rien, c'est déjà beaucoup que d'en réussir quelques parties, en travaillant et en économisant ". 
Citation de Henry Becque ; Les pensées et notes d'alb (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)

name: Spacious & Cosy King Room - Geneva Heart '3
description:
Friendly & welcoming, boutique Hotel in Geneva heart.
Room is equipped with cable TV, high speed internet, A/C, radio, alarm clock and direct dial telephone.
Ideally located in the city center, the hotel is close to the lake, the Old Town, the main business and shopping centers.
Quick access to all parts of the city with public transport, free for our guests throughout their stay.
The rooms were refurbished in October 2016 and some ongoing maintenance is to be expected in the coomons

The space
You will find in this cosy bedroom:
- An extra comfortable king size bed
- A small desk
- Cabled TV
- A private bathroom

The room is approximately 19sqm.

Daily cleaning is provided and towels and sheet are changed every week for long stays.

Pets are welcome for an additional fee of 30.-CHF/day

Washer and dryer are available on site for an additional fee of 5.-CHF per usage

Free
neighborhood_overview:
Eaux-Vives is the trendy and calm area of Geneva. Fine dinning restaurants, boutiques are nearby and 3 minutes away from famous Rue du Rhône.

>> The apartment is located: 4 min walk from the Lake

>> 4 min walk from the central town (shopping area) and the old town
host_about:
Keys'n'Fly - Airbnb Management Solution That Suits You
My name is Marc with Keys'n'Fly Vacation Rentals, a full service property management company based out of Geneva, Switzerland. My team and I strive to make every experience a seamless one, no matter where your trip may take you. As hospitality professionals experts, we are dedicated to provide superior customer service with attentiveness to inquiries and our guests while they are staying with us. 
Our beloved hosts trust us in managing their properties on their behalf and we hope you will trust us with your stay.
Please let us know how we may help you with your next trip.

name: Charming and stylish flat in the heart of Geneva
description:
A beautiful one-bedroom apartment in the Eaux Vives neighborhood. Just two blocks from the charming Park la Grange, and the magical waterfront and J'et D'eau. Plenty of great cafes and restaurants within walking distance, and you are within a 4 minute walk of 3 bus stops serving the city. There are several busses that go between this area and the Cornavin bus station in less than 15 minutes. The building is secure, and in a beautiful neighborhood.

The space
The apartment is charming and full of character, while still being fully up to date with a washing machine, dishwasher, and the building has an elevator and secured entry. Modern, bright mid-century modern living area, with a separate dining room area.

The living room closes off completely from the dining area with french doors, that allow for total privacy from the shared space, should you want to use the sofa bed. The main bedroom has a queen sized bed. There is a standing shower (no bath) and t
host_about:
I'm from Seattle, WA and work for a health-focused international organization in Switzerland. I'm also a part-time student. I travel for work quite often, but also enjoy traveling for pleasure as well. On my days off I enjoy reading, practicing yoga, being outdoors, and baking. 

As a guest I'm pretty easy going and tidy - it's usually just me staying in your home, and I'm often out working, so I'm the best kind of guest to have :)

Let me know if you have any q's

Dans le réfrigérateur vous trouverez de l'eau minérale plate et gazeuse Henniez®, du coca-cola® et du jus d'orange Michel@.

Dans la salle de bain, vous avez une douche, un séche cheveux, un miroir grossissant et divers produits d'accueil tel savon, gel douche, lait pour le corps, shampooing, trousse de couture, kit dentaire, kit de rasage.

name: Appart. de 150m2, Jacuzzi en été, dans un jardin
description:
Appartement de 150m2, entièrement meublé, dans un quartier semi-industriel, au centre-ville, à deux pas de toutes commodités. Il s'agit dun souplex de 300 m2 divisé en deux appartements de 150 m2 chacuns. Ici, c'est la partie supérieure (rez-de-jardin)qui est proposée.Les deux appartements sont séparés par une porte en haut de l'escalier. Le logement est près de tout. Un centre commercial se situe à 100 mètres, tout comme l'arrêt des bus6-10-19 qui vous déposent en 10 minutes à la gare ou aérop

The space
Idéal pour deux couples (musiciens ou affaires) peut aussi convenir avec enfants ou pouvant accueillir une grande famille (jusqu'à 7 personnes). Veuillez entrer par la terrasse, comme indiqué dans "l'entrée dans les lieux". Ce n'est pas un hôtel, vous logerez chez des personnes qui vivent là toute l'année et qui sont ravis de laisser leur logement quelques jours pour accueillir des voyageurs. Merci de respecter leurs affaires.

Guest access
neighborhood_overview: Ancien quartier industriel, entouré de villas ouvrières, au début du XXème, il est devenu résidentiel et artisanal. Proche des organisations internationales, de la gare et de toutes les commodités.
host_about:
Fraîchement retraitée, j'ai du temps pour recevoir mes hôtes dans quatre chambres doubles, avec salles de bains, dans le cadre de "Mon jardin en Ville". Il est aussi possible de louer les chambres avec accès à la cuisine et au reste de l'appartement ou de louer tout l'appartement-souplex. Après quelques missions humanitaires, d'où j'ai ramené meubles et décorations, j'ai aménagé un souplex-loft dans une zone industrielle, sur la rive-droite de Genève, proche de toutes commodités. Avec mon conjoint, nous prenons plaisir à recevoir des personnes de passage à Genève. Comme j'aime m'occuper de mon jardin, j'en profite aussi pour préparer des confitures, sirops, pâtes de fruits avec des fruits du jardin. Une deuxième résidence à Collex (canton de Genève), est également mise en location avec 5 chambres dans une villa mise en colocation pour des périodes de longue durée, voire â l'année. Un troisième logement, situé en bord de mer, en Catalogne, à Ametlla-de-Mar, est également mis en location. C'est un appartement de 4 chambres pouvant accueillir 6 personnes.
Ma devise: "La vie est une œuvre d'art très difficile, et, parti de rien, c'est déjà beaucoup que d'en réussir quelques parties, en travaillant et en économisant ". 
Citation de Henry Becque ; Les pensées et notes d'alb (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)

There is a large corridor in the entry where I have added an other convertible bed (to note that the corridor is not a room itself, it might only be used to sleep at night if needed). All furnished.
I'm renting my apartement because I'm going on a long journey, but if necessary I will let you a contact in case of necesity.

neighborhood_overview:
A 10 minutes en tram du centre ville, 25 minutes de marche. Bien desservi par les transports en commun.
Tous les commerces à proximités.

host_about:
Musica, escritora, 38 años, viaje mucho y hoy en dia soy sobre todo mama. 

Suiza y Argentina, vivo en Ginebra.

Alquilo mi casa 60 noches maximo al año, que es lo que la legislacion de mi ciudad permite. Siempre alquilo cuando nos vamos de viaje por largas temporadas. Mi casa es acogedora, tiene el encanto de las casa antiguas, ademas de quedar cerca del centro, esta rodeada por parques. Apta para niños, apta para músicos.

Cuando viajo, busco alojarnos en lugares aptos para niños, con eso no quiero decir algo tranquilos, limpios, simpáticos, con acceso fácil a los lugares de interés.

Risa y armonia son dos palabras que me gustan mucho.

name: jolie appartement à 400 mètres de la gare et lac
description:
Situé au coeur de Genève, à 400 mètres de la Gare et du lac de Genève. 15, 20 minutes à pieds des diverses organisations internationales tel que l'ONU. Nombreux transports en commun, commerces, café, bar, restaurant à proximité. Fibre optique pour une connexion ultra-rapide. L'appartement est situé au 3ème et dernier étage de l'immeuble qui n'est pas équipé d’ascenseur. L'appartement donne sur une ruelle plutôt calme même si le quartier des Pâquis est un lieu assez animé de jour comme de nuit.

The space
Situé au cœur de Genève, vous trouverez absolument tout le nécessaire à proximité (commerces, bar, restaurant, transport en commun, etc.) L'appartement est équipé de tout ce qu'il vous faut pour votre confort. Fibre optique pour une connexion ultra-rapide I Salle de bain avec baignoire, sèche-cheveux, produits de douches, grandes et petites serviettes, machine à laver le linge I Toilettes séparées I Grande armoire haute avec de grands miroirs à l'entrée pour vos
neighborhood_overview:
À DEUX PAS DE LA GARE, LE QUARTIER DES PÂQUIS DONNE VIE À UN GRAND MELTING-POT ETHNIQUE.

C'est dans le quartier des Pâquis que vous découvrirez le visage populaire de Genève. N'hésitez pas à aller à la rencontre de ses habitants de tous les horizons. De la rue de Lausanne au bord du lac, en passant par les Bains des Pâquis (un lieu très animé tout au long de l’année), découvrez les restaurants et les commerces représentatifs de cette multiculturalité. Dans ce quartier aux mille saveurs, vous apprécierez une Genève de toutes les couleurs !

Beautiful, large (100sqm) apartment in a central, vibrant and picturesque neighbourhood of Geneva.
It is a very spacious apartment and can accommodate 1-3 people.
Plainpalais is the best neighbourhood of Geneva, with great restaurants, bars, art galleries, markets and many public transport connections close by.
The apartment is fully equipped and furnished. It gets great light and the windows are great in summer.
We can give you lots of recommendations for activities and places to go.

The space
You're free to use all the equipment in the apartment. We will store our belongings in the storage cupboards and will leave space for you to store your things. If you have any questions you are welcome to contact us anytime!

name: Comfortable, central apartment
description:
My apartment is ideally situated in the center of Geneva, near the old town and in a lively neighborhood with plenty of art galleries and restaurants. Easy access to public transportation brings you to the airport, train station, UN and Palexpo.
This 90 m2 apartment has two bedrooms, a full bath and a WC. The living and dining room are ample and the kitchen, with washing machine and dishwasher is luminous.

The space
This apartment is ideal for a family vacation or business trips. The kitchen is fully equipped (microwave, pots and pans, moka coffee maker, kettle etc). There is a washing machine and dishwasher in the apartment and a dryer in the building. Iron, ironing board and hair dryer are all provided. Wifi and TV are both provided. There is a parking spot available in the building.
neighborhood_overview: This is a lively neighborhood near plenty of art galleries and restaurants.  It is within walking distance of the Geneva old town, the lake and river, shopping and the bank district.  Geneva's main museums and concert halls are just a short walk away.  The proximity of several tram and bus lines makes accessing the UN area, Palexpo, airport and trains station easy. Grocery stores such as Migros and Coop are just a 5 minute walk.

name: Private room in friendly flatshare @ Jonction
description:
We live in a 4-bedroom shared flat in Jonction, as central as it can get in Geneva, close to all types of amenities, cultural institutions, business, etc.

Offering a private room, going out to the inner court yard, with private bathroom (showe, no WC). Kitchen and living room are shared.

We are youngish, working in arts, music, social work and policy, primarily french-speaking. If you are open and considerate, and like staying with other people, we are looking forward to having you :)

The space
You will be staying in my personal room, that features an onsuite bathroom (with a shower and washing basin, no WC).

My room is very cozy with several light sources, vintage furniture and some Japanese references. I have a tatami style bed, and the mattress can be rolled to one side, which gives you space to do yoga on the tatami itself. There will also be an empty drawer that you can use to put your stuff, and space on a clothes hanger
neighborhood_overview:
Jonction is a young and fun neighbourhood right in the centre of town, walking distance to the main train station.

We are situated right next to various nice bars, restaurants, cafes and clubs, and just next to the Rhone (the local river), just downstream of the lake.
host_about:
I am a passionate traveler and love to discover new places and meet new people. 

I am easy going, respectful and social. I enjoy cooking, food and good chats over a drink. I am into culture and enjoy getting to know the cultural scene in respective places. Other than that, I enjoy sports: I dance (ballet, contemp. afrofusion) and surf. I used to do acrobratics and am into yoga/pilates. 

I love good books and arthouse movies. I listen to  alternative rock and folk music, sometimes classic and a lot of deep house/ electro, especially for going out.

name: Central Studio (30m2
description:
Location Location Location! This small charming studio is situated 5 mins walking from the famous Geneva Fountain ( Jet d'eau ) in Rive Gauche otherwise the "rich side".
Big floor to ceiling windows flood light in, a small kitchen and bathroom with bathtub. If you don't feel like going out, a smart TV with netflix is available just log on with your account and chill.

The space
Ideal for 1 guest, cozy for two, queen size bed with pure 100% Egyptian cotton sheets, coffee corner with coffee machine, bathroom also has and powerful hair dryer, kitchenette is fully equipped , smart TV and WiFi, even a wireless mobile charger just in case you forgot yours :)

Other things to note
Coop supermarket 3 mins up the road, self-service laundry mats 5 mins walking distance ( there is one also in the building but fairly busy), and a small shop with all sorts of groceries open till later than normal supermarkets is just down the street.
neighborhood_overview: The south bank, known to locals as Rive Gauche, is the oldest part of the city (south from the lake) and was once surrounded by protective walls. Although the walls are no more, the old town still remains, built on the tallest hill in the city and topped by St. Peter's Cathedral. North of the Old Town is the main shopping district known as Rive and the adjoining suburb of Eaux-Vives ( where the studio is located ). Shops bars & restaurants are just downstairs. Fancy a cocktail, the famous "Atelier" cocktail bar open till 01 am just 3 mins away or perhaps a Pizza " Da Paolo" restaurant will fill up your stomach.

Very charming room in an historical house of Geneva dated 1860.
The two rooms is located on the top floor, are bright and with amazing view over the Jura mountains.
The private parking is just next to the house.
The house is located 15 min walking distance from main UN agencies; 13 min walking from Palexpo; 10 minutes by bus from the airport (3 stops), and is close to the train station and downtown. Public transportation, shops and restaurants are very close by.

The space
The house has two floors with no elevator and a beautiful garden with centenary lime and a Lebanese cedar trees.
The ground floor and first floor of the house are occupied by our family (2 adults and 2 children) and are private.

The 2 rooms for the guests being located on the top floor are very indipendent and private.
The room #1 is about 20 m2, has a double bed (140X200 cm), a TV, two closets. There is original antique wood floor throughout.
Th

name: Charming studio in a barn w/ terrace &  parking
description:
Hello, experience country life within Geneva. Bus stops 11, 21 at 100m, bus line 3 at a 5min walk. Close to lovely Carouge, surrounded by nature (walks and sports).
The studio has an independent entrance, it is clean and modern. If you come by car you can park in front.

We can lend you a bicycle to get around.

The space
Your independent studio is within our home. It is done with high quality materials.
The ceiling is a 3,25 meter high. The double bed is up on a mezzanine which you access by climbing the stair ladder. The headspace in the mezzanine is 1,10m.
You have an office table to work from. There is also a living area with couch and sofa and table.
The bathroom includes shower and toilet.
The kitchenette comes with a fridge, two electric stoves, a microwave oven, dishes etc.
Please note there is strictly no smoking inside the studio. Smoking is possible just outside the studio.

Guest access
neighborhood_overview:
We are located in a residential area. Close to nature and the Arve river from tjs Mont Blanc running by. There are big sports facilities nearby, track and tennis being one example. But you can also go for walks or bike rides. The beautiful Carouge is within 5 min by bus.
Cornavin train station from home takes about 25min by bus, 15min by taxi.
The airport by taxi is 25 min away, by public transport about 50 min.
The HUG are 20 min by public transport, 10 min by bicycle.
host_about: I am a photographer and photography gallery owner, my wife is a biologist at Geneva university. With our 3 children we enjoy travelling, the arts, our friends, meeting people.

Cosy room with double bed and desk in bright & modern, 110 m2 apt on 4th floor with lift. I prefer to host guests who have used Airbnb before and have received positive reviews.

Welcome to Carouge!

The space
I am a single professional living in Geneva. I would be delighted to have guests to stay in my large spare room.

It is an ideal location to stay if you are attending a conference or exhibition at the Palexpo or want easy access to the airport, whilst still being able to enjoy central Geneva. Guest can enjoy a large terrace and a spacious lawned back garden.
The quiet and pretty village of Soral also offers play areas for the children, a restaurant, a brewery, wine shops and numerous walks.

The space
This is our primary residence and we let it out when we are on holiday. We have a cat living in the house. We expect our guests to look after the cat and water the garden in exchange for a very reasonable rental price. Familes are especially welcome. We have all the necessary baby equipment and lots of toys and books/DVDs for children. Please no stag/hen parties.
neighborhood_overview: We live in a quiet and well kept winemakers' village. There is an excelent restaurant just meters away from the house as well as two play grounds, a football ground and tennis courts.

name: Beautiful apartment in the old town
description:
Apartment of 70 m2 renovated recently with beautiful materials. A unique location, right in the heart of Geneva's old town, located a few meters from the magnificent Saint Peter Cathedral.
This apartment is on the 3rd floor of a building counting 4 floors.
It opens onto a large entrance, it is equipped with a bedroom overlooking the courtyard (very quiet), a bathroom with Italien shower and a living room filled with natural light.

!!PARTIES FORMALLY PROHIBITED!!

The space
Ideal for people traveling alone or as a couple. Can also be suitable for family with a child (has a mattress 90x200)

Other things to note
NIGHTS FORMALLY PROHIBITED, the building is very quiet and we ask you to respect your neighbors.
neighborhood_overview:
Traveling around Geneva's Old Town, one of the largest in Europe, is a journey through and discovering the city's 2,000-year history, its many art galleries, antique shops, museums, fountains and many other wonders.
Explore the winding streets of the Saint-Pierre cathedral and the International Museum of the Reformation, at the Hôtel-de-Ville as the headquarters of the cantonal and municipal political life for over half a millennium, passing through the Maison Tavel , the Zoubov Foundation Museum, the birthplace of Jean-Jacques Rousseau and the very old Place du Bourg-de-Four, where you can still stroll today.
host_about:
Hospitality professional, we are dedicated to provide superior customer service with attentiveness to inquiries and our guests while they are staying with us. 
The owners of the different apartments / houses trust us in managing their properties on their behalf and we hope you will trust us with your stay.

We will be happy to help you before and during your stay to find the best restaurant, bar and museum.
We speak French and English, we have some Russian notions.

So do not hesitate one second, we are here for you !

Looking forward to welcoming you soon

Best regards.
Philibert and Benjamin

PS : you come for your business trip ? Contact us to check our availability for early c/in  and late c/out ;)

name: Cosy, design and bright 115m2 flat next to UN
description:
The flat is located in a modern buildling from 2011. It is very spacious (115m2) and offers great quality of life.
It has a big living room with open kitchen ( 50m2) and 1 very large bedroom with king size bed.
It is located near the UN & NGO's and is close to the train station ( 8mn) and the lake ( 10mn). It is perfectly connected to public transportation .

The neighbourhood is quiet and there are plenty of parks only a few minutes away.
host_about:
We are a married couple living in Geneve. 
We love travelling! Last time was in Iran, we discovered a wonderful country. We also loved India, South America and Myanmar. 

We want our hosts to feel like home et to have a great stay at our place. Feel free to ask us anything to make your journey unforgettable.

Chambre 2: 14m2 avec terrasse et vue imprenable sur le Jet d’eau.

Grand attique au dernier étage avec vue magnifique sur les Eaux-Vives et le Jet d’eau. Un arrêt de bus dessert l’entrée de l’immeuble.
L’appartement offre 2 chambres visiteurs situées dans l'aile gauche. Une salle de douche, 1 salle de bain avec WC à partager.

Accès en commun à partager avec la famille: cuisine équipée et la terrasse.

Au plaisir de vous accueillir!

The space
Joli pied à terre en plein centre ville pour les séjours de courte ou longue durée. Lieu idéal pour profiter des charmes de Genève, se balader au bord du lac, visiter le centre ville et sa vieille ville. A bientôt!!

Guest access
2 Salles d’eau pour les visiteurs, à partager. Accès total à la terrasse.
Cuisine en commun à partager

name: Geneva Conviviality, Cleanliness, Cosiness+ Wine!
description:
Our home is a fully renovated traditional village house split into 2 flats. Old stones with all modern facilities, under floor heating, real log fire, free wifi . Cosiness, comfort and giving you a warm Swiss welcome and experience (I am a yodeller!) are a priority. Our village is 10 km from the town centre and one of the prettiest in the whole canton. Regular bus services with bus stop a few steps from front door. If you want a late city night life, check timetable as buses less frequent.

The space
Your room will be private but our 230 m2 of space are all yours for you to enjoy. I can cook evening meals on request for a fee or organise your groceries by prior arrangement. Breakfast is provided and I will get a nice spread for you week-ends but you sort yourself out on week days. I will happily do your laundry if required but I don't do ironing (can't stand it!)

Other things to note
I am bilingual French / English and speak German fluently
neighborhood_overview: Our village is super clean, very Swiss and listed for its many traditional buildings. Gorgeous views all round, fantastic restaurant and bakery across the road.  Nice, friendly bar on village square as well as hairdresser and reflexology centre... where you can get a massage AND buy locally made cheese! Where else but in Switzerland! Lots of cycle paths and lovely walks through our country wide famous vineyards and forest.

name: Big room with the most amazing view
description:
COVID 19 measures - Desinfectant is provided for hands, as well as in the bathroom, toilet and kitchen.

Big room with a cupboard and drawers just for you in a 100 sqm flat. A unique view from your bed: the Mount Blanc, the Old city of Geneva, the Rhone river and a beautiful park under your feet.

Couples with children are mostly welcome. We've got wonderful games and toys and a baby chair.

One thing: I have 3 cats!

The space
Also at your disposal : dishwasher and washing/dryer machine; a big screen and plenty of DVDs (no television connection). You're welcome to cook at home.

Other things to note
Please let me know previous to your reservation if you need to arrive later than 10 PM.
Also, if you have to arrive / leave / wake up before 7:30 AM that would NOT be possible.
I thank you for your understanding.
neighborhood_overview: 5 minutes walk to the main station Cornavin and 7 minutes by train from the station to the airport. Everything is within walking distance: shops, restaurants, the Geneva Leman lake, the Old city, the museums. It's impossible to be more central, though in a quiet and beautiful neighborhood.

name: Carouge | Stylish, Big, Central | Cocoon Homes
description:
In an elegant old-façade building in central Geneva we offer a spacious, furnished and fully equipped two-bedroom apartment. This premium boutique apartment is defined by unique design — bringing together comfort and style with a sense of cozy home feeling. Our flat is equipped for families with little ones.

The space
The apartment is on the first floor with elevator and has a particularly stylish flair, with its large parquet tiles, black window frames and big open living space. It has been completely refurbished recently.

Both bedrooms have king-size beds, which can be separated in two single beds to make twin-bedrooms depending of sleeping arrangements. Each room has a big integrated closet, a working space and a dedicated bathroom with shower. Bedrooms are located in the back of the building and are both very calm.

In the living room, there is a big cozy and relaxing sofa as well as a lounge chair. The high-end open kitchen has all the
neighborhood_overview:
Quartier des Augustins is an interesting fraction of Plainpalais which has a real local neighborhood feeling, is very well connected with easy public transportations to all parts of the city, and where characterful small shops and cafés have been bursting the past few years. Places like Les Enfants Terribles, one of the city’s coolest design concept store, or Chez Marius, a former butcher shop turned into a popular wine and tapas bar with hanging hams, reflect the vibes of Augustins quite accordingly. Located near the University Hospitals of Geneva (HUG), the University of Geneva and Carouge, the flat is in the heart of the city. Wondering around you’ll find bobo-chic second hand boutiques, a vintage record shop and café, design stores, etc. Close to the apartment you’ll also find a great choice of food stores, making the area very easy-to-live on the day-to-day.

name: Charming Geneva style appartment by the lake
description:
MINIMUM STAY 1 MONTH: Lovely ancient building nicely furnitured with modern high quality furniture. Small balcony to the street and bedroom to the calm inner court.

The space
Appartment with heigh ceilings with fully equipped kitchen, bathroom and WC (separate), one bedroom and decent size entry hall and a dining and living room (connected) with a small working space and working desk. Access from dining room onto a small balcony.

Other things to note
For business reasons, I will need to leave Geneva between 1st of October and 31st of December (potential extension) and will sublet the appartment for a minimum duration of 1 month. For guests who will rent the appartment for longer than 1 month, we can agree a discounted monthly budget.

The appartment will be clean and disinfected before you would be moving in and the cleaning lady will come weekly to keep the place clean.
neighborhood_overview: Lovely breakfast place at 2 minutes from the appartment and 10 minutes away the classic 'Bains de Paquis' for breakfast, lunch, dinner and hanging out by the lake.

French guy, curious, social and enthousiast.
Travel and culture addict.
Living in Switzerland for more than 10 years.

I go to theatre, opera and exhibitions in Paris and Lausanne, love cinema, paragliding and sailing.
I listen to jazz music, enjoy concerts and dance in rock caves in London and Zurich.
I go hiking, skiing and paragliding in the Alps.
I sail in all seas, lakes and oceans wherever I can.

But overall, I love sharing my passions this with people I meet, wherever they live or come from.

name: Perfect for a family - 5 Bedrooms, 220 m²,  garden
description:
They say home is where the heart is and this couldn't be more true for us. This is our primary residence and home to our family of four. It was designed by us and built from the ground up with love, care, and endless attention to detail. It's perfect for an adventurous jet-setting family (like us)!

Within a 2-minute walk, you have access to public transport, free bike rentals, farmers market, organic specialty grocery store, pharmacy, restaurants, tennis club, and three beautiful public parks.

The space
Our certified Minergie, a registered quality label for new low-energy-consumption, eco-friendly buildings, home was built in 2014 with modern amenities and state-of-the-art German tech. At a spacious 220 m², it boasts the following:

- 5 bedrooms (4 upstairs and 1 downstairs)
- 1 of 5 bedrooms is a home office that you're welcome to use. Great for business travellers!
- 3 full bathrooms with showers, large tub, etc.
- TV roo
neighborhood_overview: Our home is located in Onex Village, in the canton of Geneva, and is 5 km from the city center. Geneva is an international hub in Switzerland which hosts the United Nations and 37 international organizations. There are countless free museums, festivals, farmers markets, and outdoor activities in/around Lake Leman. Bonus: La Gavotte, only 5 - 10 minute walk, is a charming farm great for family visits, feeding the animals, and pony rides.
host_about:
We're a young Swiss-American family with two daughters (5 & 2 years old). My husband is a computer science professor and I'm a former Chief of Protocol for the US Department of State turned full-time mommy and part-time freelance consultant. We're passionate about discovering new cultures, kitesurfing, and meeting interesting people. 

We've travelled extensively with AirBNB for over 9 years with only great experiences and wonderful reviews as guests. We would treat your home with the same love and respect that we do ours and hope you'll do the same (we're also hosts!). 

As mentioned in the home description, this is our primary residence - our pride and joy. We're not interested in making a profit, but are here for the human contact and exchanges based on the values of hospitality and generosity.

name: HOMEBOAT - your HOTEL on the LAKE
description:
We guarantee you a total displacement aboard our exceptional boat in the heart of the city. Only 10min walk from the train station the tranquility is rigorous with a breathtaking view of the Mont Blanc, the Alps and the "Jet d'eau". A stay on HomeBoat is a sensation of freedom with a comfort like at home. The wooded interior, the charm of another time will not leave you indifferent.

The space
This boat has been designed to enjoy a maximum comfort with several living areas: two huge terraces at the back of the boat and a front area for sunbathing. The larger bedroom located at the rear of the boat has a custom-made space all in wood and with nautical finishes. The front bedroom is an intimate space bathed in light. There is an independent and very comfortable bathroom. Separate spaces and sumptuous luminosity with spaces and easy circulation. A modern and equipped kitchen, as well as a large exceptional living room.

Guest access
The boat is

Only 10 minutes from the train station, this district is the top 1 activity for walks along the quays. The atmosphere is peaceful and pleasant.
host_about: En tant que capitaine, skipper et animateur, je souhaite transmettre ma passion pour les bateaux et le lac à nos hôtes. HomeBoat est une société indépendante Suisse qui crée des émotions uniques pour ses hôtes et transmet sa passion pour le lac à travers ses loisirs variés et insolites.

Relaxez-vous en couple, en famille ou entre amis, dans l'ambiance de ce spacieux et lumineux appartement de 65m2 . Entièrement équipé pour votre confort, il est décoré avec du mobilier contemporain accompagné de belles poutres en bois apparentes.
Au cœur de la plaine de Plainpalais, quartier animé, branché, populaire et cosmopolite.

The space

Très bien situé, proche de toutes commodités.

Proche de l'université de Genève UNIMAIL et de l'hôpital, collé a la grande plaine de Plainpalais ou vous avez un grand marché 3 fois par semaine avec une magnifique brocante, cet appartement a tout ce dont vous avez besoin pour passer un court ou long séjour à Genève.

Très bien équipé et très confortable !

The space
We have a small garden surrounded by a lot of greenery.

host_about: J'aime beaucoup la présence de visiteurs qui, s'ils choisissent ma maison, auront certainement du plaisir à y vivre et à y rencontrer d'autres voyageurs ou locataires à plus ou moins long terme. J'ai en tout  6 chambres à disposition dont une est déjà louée et deux sont pour moi. Beaucoup d'amis ou de clients passent au rez-de-chaussée et nous faisons parfois, hors-mis des séances de travail, aussi des diners et des fêtes, surtout en été. Two bedroom apartment - on 3 levels, with rooftop terrace - located in Carouge - a Mediterranean style hamlet, with lots of warm and cosy cafes, bistros, art and antique shops.

Trams #12 #18 & bus lines 41, 44, 45 provide direct access to the city center, in about 10 minutes ride.

The space
A fully furnished two bedroom apartment in Carouge with views on the mountains from every room.

- two bedrooms and,
- a cozy sitting room
- batroom and WC

2nd floor:
- an open plan kitchen

3rd floor:
- rooftop terrace (with views on Saleve & the Old Carouge).

The kitchen is fully equipped with a stove top, full size oven, fridge, dishwasher, all-In-one washer/dryer, Nespresso coffe machine,

The master bedroom (with king sized bed & a build-in closet) gives access to a balcony-terrace.
The 2nd bedroom (with queen size bed & a build-in closet).
neighborhood_overview:
Carouge is a Mediterranean style hamlet, with lots of warm and cosy cafes, bistros, art and antique shops.
Described by a British publication as Geneva's “Greenwich Village", the Old Carouge with its quaint streets lined with restaurants, bars, ice cream shops gives you impresion that you are not in Geneva but in a Sardinian village.

neighborhood_overview: Our neighborhood is called Grange Canal, it's in between the village called Chêne-Bougeries and Geneva. It's a residential neighborhood where a lot of villas also are from the same period, circa beginning of last century.
host_about: J'aime beaucoup la présence de visiteurs qui, s'ils choisissent ma maison, auront certainement du plaisir à y vivre et à y rencontrer d'autres voyageurs ou locataires à plus ou moins long terme. Beaucoup d'amis ou de clients passent au rez-de-chaussée et nous faisons parfois, hors-mis des séances de travail, aussi des diners et des fêtes, surtout en été. name: Location, Location, Location!! Upscale, Lakeside
description:
Big, bright, luxury furnished and decorated private bedroom with king size bed and a lounge/work-space area. Turn of the century restored and renovated 1900's heritage building with lots of old-world charm. High molded ceilings, original parquet flooring, shared large and fully equipped kitchen/dining room, shared living room with original wood-burning fireplace. Walk everywhere. Located 50 meters to the lakeside in Eaux-Vives and a short walk to the city centre, old town and shopping streets.

The space
Exclusively for single female or couple only, business/leisure traveler. Additional/optional dates can be arranged upon request. This listing is a non-smoking, large and bright, upscale furnished bedroom with high-quality furnishings including king-size bed that can sleep very comfortably and happily 2 people. This well-furnished and decorated bedroom comes with quality bed linens, towels, blankets, pillows, cable TV, lounge/work-space area with hi-speed fibre o
neighborhood_overview: Location, Location, Location! Why do I love living in Eaux-Vives so much and what can you expect from staying in my flat? You will love it too because it's lakeside in Eaux-Vives! You will be in the most awesome, vibrant neighborhood of Geneva, often referred to as Geneva's urban playground because it’s the trendiest, most lively, upcoming and ever evolving district in Geneva with all kinds of activities left, right and center.  You are surrounding by the lake and the mountains 360 degrees.  Eaux-Vives is home to lots of cool cocktail bars, the latest food trends  (around-the-world from A-Z, as well as vegetarian and vegan) hip coffee shops and three beaches. A few steps to the world famous 140 meter high fountain "Jet d’Eau", the Horloge Fleurie (Flower Clock), Jardin Anglais (English Garden), lakeside open-air cinema in the summer, lake cruise boats and lake activities. Pastry shops, trendy brunches and superfood cafés, the best home-made ice-cream shops, open-air farmers markets (on
host_about: Hi ! I am Hope, nice to meet you. I love living in Geneva and I look forward to welcoming you as my guest.  I hope to make your stay in our gorgeous city a great one.

name: Wonderful apartment in the heart of Geneva
description:
We sublet our pretty apartment in the heart of Geneva.

The apartment has one bedroom with a dressing area, a living room with a sofa and a little office, a fully equipped kitchen and a bathroom.

It is a 10 mins walk away from the train station, the old city and the lake. All the main transport lines pass at a 2 mins walking distance from the apartment.

Many restaurants, bars and grocery stores are just around the corner.

The apartment is located in the students and museums area of the city.
neighborhood_overview:
Lively neighborhood, all types of bars and restaurants, Coop and Migros for food shopping just next door, a 10 mins walk away from the main shopping street, the lake, the train station and the river.

Places to visit in Geneva:

- lakeside with botanical garden, jet d'eau (big fountain) and the different beaches (Bains des Paquis, La perle du lac, Plage des Eaux-Vives, Genève-plage, Tropical corner and many more)

- old city with the cathedral and a fantastic view all over the city

- UN headquarters and many other UN buildings (WTO, ILO, WHO etc.)

- flee and food market on Plainpalais

- Parc des Bastions with the reformation wall

- Museum of contemporary art, Museum of ethnography, Art and history museum, International red cross museum

name: Spacious 1 BD Apartment in Pâquis
description:
Comfortable 60 sqm2 fully equipped 1 Bedroom apartment, in Geneva city center just a few steps from the lake, the train station and shops. Perfect for an extended stay or business trip. It can comfortably welcome up to 4 Guests!

The space
The apartment is designed for a couple with kids. There is a queen-size bed, two convertible bed best suited for 1 adult. The kitchen is fully equipped with basics amenities. You can use the Internet for free (WIFI). The loft is 3 minutes walking distance from Geneva Cornavin station and only a few meters away from the lake. There are numerous restaurants, bars, grocery stores and supermarkets within less than 100m distance and only 10 minutes away by tram from the UN headquarters and other major international organizations. Should you have questions, please feel free to ask me. I wish you a nice stay in the studio!

Guest access
Guests will have access to all amenities on site.

Other things t
neighborhood_overview: Pâquis is one of the most vibrant "neighborhoods" of Geneva. Here is where you will meet people from all continents, scents from far and near, busy streets and quiet parks right next to the lake .

name: Industrial style in bright basement ★ Swiss Border
description:
► Apartment all bills included with free parking and free WiFi located on the border of France / Geneva, Switzerland.
The flat is furnished and has even bath towels & bed sheets, just bring your clothes and your grocery!

The location is very convenient for those who need to reach Geneva.
Easy access to the main International Organization headquarters:
UN, UNHCR, WHO, WTO, BIT, ICRC, Cern,...
***
The reservation is for the entire apartment, only for you and your guests (not sharing).
***

The space
❤ Unique and "Non-Smoking" flat located on the half-underground level with:
-High-speed Wifi
-4 bedrooms
-2 fully-featured bathrooms with WC (one with shower, the other one with bath), hairdryer, towels,...
-Fully equipped Kitchen (Side-by-side fridge / Microwave / Oven / Induction cooktop / Dishwasher / Nespresso coffee maker / Kettle / Toaster).
-Living room with TV including +100 channels.
-Storag
neighborhood_overview:
Located in the town of Ferney-Voltaire in French / Swiss border near Geneva and near to all amenities:
-Gym fitness: 6mn walking distance.
-Playground: Pool, Soccer and tennis field,...: just across the street! 1mn walking distance.
-Activities: Golf, Hiking, Biking, Skiing, Horse-riding, beaches on the lake, mountain,... all under 5-30mn around.
-Supermarket, Bakery, Restaurants, Post office, Banks, Doctor, Pharmacy,... : 5-10mn walking distance.
-Bus stop (line F, 66): 5-10mn walking distance.
-Geneva Airport / Train station / Palexpo / Highway access: 5-10mn car distance.
-Geneva Downtown / United Nations / Red Cross / Cern / WTO,... : 15mn car distance.
-French classes for foreigners: school at 5mn walking distance.
host_about:
I love staying in a home on my trips around the world rather than in hotels, we feel at home elsewhere. That's why I chose to welcome guests.

I focus on providing the best experience I would expect from a host. Showing kindness and responding to any requests is essential for having a wonderful impression of a visitor in our region.

name: Geneva Tree Tops
description:
Magnifique appartement tout confort, spacieux, lumineux et calme, proche du lac et du Jet d'eau. Bordé par le parc et un parc intérieur, avec des échappées sur le lac et la verdure. Cuisine entièrement équipée et belle terrasse pour des soirées détente. Le pied à terre idéal à Genève!


Beautiful cosy high-end apartment, surrounded by greenery, the park and the lake. Filled with light, very spacious, in a quiet area of a hip neighbourhood. The ideal cosy getaway minutes from the Jet d'eau!

The space
Two full bedrooms, one and a half bathrooms, lots of closet space, a very large living space, and two balconies with views onto the greenery. Fire place and all amenities, from washer and dryer to everything you need to cook.

We prefer no children under the age of 12, because of low balcony railings!
neighborhood_overview:
This is Geneva's ideal vacation spot. Access to parks and the lake, the Jet d'eau, the beach and public swimming pool, yacht club, lakeside spa, and summer concerts in the park! All of the city center, museums and monuments are easily accessible by bus and tram, or Geneva's lake boat service, and the Old Town can be reached on foot.

Many trendy bars and nightlife, especially in the nearby rue Henri-Blanvalet. Restaurants, shops, and two movie theaters are within walking distance.

name: Maisonnette pour deux avec place pour la voiture
description:
Ce bungalow situé au milieu des arbres est un logement atypique de construction ancienne, parfaitement équipé et meublé, avec WiFi, machine à laver, kitchenette (pas de four), micro-onde, frigo et petite salle de bains. Dispose d'une terrasse et d'une place pour la voiture. Endroit discret, entouré de verdure, mais proche de la ville, de l'aéroport , du CERN, du ARC Center, Nomadspace et des vignobles du Mandement. Genève est tout près. Accès facile en transports publiques ou en voiture.

The space
On a l'impression de se trouver isolé en pleine campagne, mais on est tout près de Genève. L'endroit est calme et discret, même si parfois on entend des avions passer. Mais la pluspart du temps on n'entend que les oiseaux. Idéal pour passer quelques jours isolé, sans vis-à-vis, en amoureux ou avec des enfants, mais vous surveillerez bien vos enfants. Chiens acceptés.

Guest access
Tout

Other things to note
N'oubliez pas q
neighborhood_overview:
Nous sommes près du CERN, de l'aéroport, de la frontière avec la France et à quelques minutes en voiture du centre ville.
Nous sommes près des vignobles du Mandement et vous pourrez aller déguster le vin.
Il y a un supermarché à 300 mts de la maison, ainsi que differents magasins et pharmacie.
host_about: Je suis une femme très active et occupée. J'ai deux fils que vous verrez parfois et qui m'aident, deux chiens et deux chats, ma passion est le cheval et je monte presque tous les jours. J'apprends l'éthologie avec le cheval. J'adore la nature et les fleurs, j'aime lire, la musique classique, les voyages, découvrir de nouvelles cultures. Ma destination préférée est la Grèce.

This studio is in the center of Geneva on the 5th floor. It provides you with a main room with bed, table, chairs and big cupboard, a separate kitchen, a bathroom (34m2). You can enjoy the sunny terrace of 5m2. from where you will see the Geneva town. Decoration is modern and smart. In the area, you will find restaurant, bars and markets and a beautiful park. This flat is very quiet and is very interesting for friends
host_about:
Né à Genève, je vous accueil pour faire de votre séjour une expérience agréable et sympathique...

Passionnés par les voyages, et ayant vécu deux ans en Chine, et avoir voyagé en Afrique, et en Asie, c'est après avoir testé AIRBNB en Espagne et en France que j'ai eu envie à mon tour de faire découvrir ma belle ville de Genève.

Je me passionne également pour le cinéma, et la moto.

Je vous propose de séjourner au Eaux-Vives, un quartier animé et vivant à deux pas du Jet d'eau. A 5 min en transport en commun du centre de Genève.

Je reste également disponible pour répondre à vos questions, vous conseiller en matière de restaurant, de sorties et activités genevoises multiples...

Romain

name: Souplex, jacuzzi en été, billard, ping-pong, jard.
description:
Appartement entièrement meublé, dans un quartier semi-industriel, au centre-ville, à deux pas de toutes commodités. Il s'agit d'un souplex de 280 m2 avec billard, sur deux niveaux. Les propriétaires logent dans le studio situé au rez-de-jardin, ils ont leur propre accès extérieur et n'interviennent pas dans le logement.Un centre commercial se situe à 100 mètres, tout comme l'arrêt des bus6-10-19 qui vous déposent en 10 minutes à la gare ou aérop

The space
Le rez de jardin (1 chambre + salle-de-bains + 1 w-c visiteurs +cuisine +salon + salle-à-manger), ainsi que la partie inférieure (grande pièce avec billard + 1 salle-de-douche + 1 grande chambre + 2ème chambre + salon et salle-à-manger)

Guest access
Tout le souplex est proposé à la location. Les propriétaires résident dans le studio du rez-de-jardin.

Other things to note
Les fêtes et soirées ne sont pas autorisées. Merci de ne pas faire de bruit après 22h.
neighborhood_overview: Ancien quartier industriel, entouré de villas ouvrières, au début du XXème, il est devenu résidentiel et artisanal. Proche des organisations internationales, de la gare et de toutes les commodités.
host_about:
Fraîchement retraitée, j'ai du temps pour recevoir mes hôtes dans quatre chambres doubles, avec salles de bains, dans le cadre de "Mon jardin en Ville". Il est aussi possible de louer les chambres avec accès à la cuisine et au reste de l'appartement ou de louer tout l'appartement-souplex. Après quelques missions humanitaires, d'où j'ai ramené meubles et décorations, j'ai aménagé un souplex-loft dans une zone industrielle, sur la rive-droite de Genève, proche de toutes commodités. Avec mon conjoint, nous prenons plaisir à recevoir des personnes de passage à Genève. Comme j'aime m'occuper de mon jardin, j'en profite aussi pour préparer des confitures, sirops, pâtes de fruits avec des fruits du jardin. Une deuxième résidence à Collex (canton de Genève), est également mise en location avec 5 chambres dans une villa mise en colocation pour des périodes de longue durée, voire â l'année. Un troisième logement, situé en bord de mer, en Catalogne, à Ametlla-de-Mar, est également mis en location. C'est un appartement de 4 chambres pouvant accueillir 6 personnes.
Ma devise: "La vie est une œuvre d'art très difficile, et, parti de rien, c'est déjà beaucoup que d'en réussir quelques parties, en travaillant et en économisant ". 
Citation de Henry Becque ; Les pensées et notes d'alb (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)

name: Geneva - High Standing flat w/ amazing view
description:
A very bright and modern flat located in Carouge, one of the most attractive area of Geneva (see : http://www.geneva.info/carouge). With easy access to tramway and buses (2min walk from the main tram stop). Supermarket down on the corner (1min). Free Wi-Fi. Ample Storage Spaces. Spacious terrace orientated south with stunning view on the mountains. 2 bedrooms with double bed plus 1 small bed in the TV-room. Two bathrooms - with the master bedroom having its own en suite and dressing.

The space
The property is finished to the highest standards. The open plan kitchen / dining area is a great space that is filled with plenty of natural light all day long.

The kitchen is fully furnished with all you'll need (dishwasher, fridge, freezer, microwave and washer/dryer) included a coffee & tea station. An initial supply of coffee, tea, washing up liquid, dishwasher tablets, washing powder, hand soaps, toilet paper, sponges and other cleaning items will be there
neighborhood_overview:
Right over river l’Arve lays the town of Carouge, a Mediterranean style hamlet modelled after Nice. This former trading town is now commonly referred to as the “Greenwich Village of Geneva” for its many boutiques and studios where artisans and craftsmen of every ilk can be observed plying their trade. The bohemian vibe carries on into the night with a plethora of cafes, jazz bars and nightclubs.

District of Carouge, which used to be a separated town (alternatively French and Sardinian) until 1816, is now a city district of Geneva, known mainly for its old town - “Le Vieux Carouge”, with it's specific old French-Italian architecture.

Carouge is located south from Plainpalais, behind the Arve river, slightly out of the way from the main attractions. Trams 12, 15, 18 and bus line 4 are among the many which provide direct access to the city center, in about 10 minutes ride.

Carouge is beautiful like Italy, many locals would introduce Carouge to You as a "sm

name: Diplomat's Pied-a-terre
description:
The Servette neighborhood is charming, convenient and quiet: very close to shopping, entertainment, transport and nature! There is a bakery downstairs so you can enjoy a fresh croissant or pain au chocolat first thing in the morning. Parc Geisendorf is great for taking a stroll or relaxing with a book.

The space
The apartment is composed of one bedroom with queen-size bed, one bathroom with shower and washing machine, one enclosed living room with sofa bed large enough for two, and one enclosed eat-in kitchen. Both the kitchen and bedroom have balconies for enjoying some fresh air, or even eating outside.

The décor has been curated over time to include plants and objects from travels around the world. There is a bookcase in the living room that guests are free to browse through and borrow from. The living room also has a small ‘table bar’ with liquors; guests are welcome to these on a sparing/moderate basis.

Strong WiFi is present througho
neighborhood_overview:
Servette is a quiet and extremely convenient neighborhood with everything close at hand (this is a gift compared to many residential neighborhoods in Geneva!). The UN and international organizations are at your doorstep, as are the central train station, lake area, airport and CERN. Supermarkets and pharmacies are around the corner, and many late-night bodegas service the area when main shops are closed.

Adjoining Servette is the young and hip 'Grottes' neighborhood, featuring a Thursday evening market that doubles as the city's most popular after-work hangout. Grottes' quirky bars and eateries are less than 10 minutes away on foot.

If interested, we have recommendations for excellent restaurants and bars in and around Servette/Grottes.

name: Beautiful and peaceful studio in Versoix
description:
Enjoy our beautiful and peaceful studio that backs up right against the Versoix forest and river (with walking paths), and only a 15 minute walk to Lac Leman. The studio has a queen bed, fold out sofa, kitchen, bathroom, and a separate entrance with free parking. We're also only a 15 minute walk to the Versoix Gare train station, and a 8 minute walk to the public transport "50" bus (which has direct transport to the Geneva airport).

The space
The studio is part of our house (where we live) but you'll have your own separate entrance and lots of privacy. Our backyard backs onto the Versoix forest and river, and a path from our backyard takes you to the river, a large park, walking trails, and a beautiful 7km running loop in the woods. So even on the hottest days in the summer, the studio stays cool and especially at night given that the windows open to the forest. And in the winter, three radiator heaters keep the studio warm and cozy.

Guest access
neighborhood_overview: Versoix is a commune on the shores of Lac Leman in the canton of Geneva, with direct transport links to the Geneva center core, the UN organizations, and the Geneva airport. We are not in central Geneva (though it is only a 15 minute train ride away), but if you are looking to be close to nature and a beautiful garden with a labryinth while still being close to Geneva, then this is the place for you!
host_about: We are an awesome family of four, with myself, my wife, and our two sons. We love traveling and  meeting people.

Great location in the quartier des Eaux-Vives, close to the lake and overlooking a very nice park. The place is fully furnished and equipped.

Guest access

Other things to note
As we still keep our belongings, please use only the amenities listed unless permitted.

The flat is on a quiet street, yet very close to public transport and the lively rue des Eaux Vives and its surrounding streets where you can find supermarkets, shops, trendy restaurants, bars, coffee shops, gyms etc.

name: Geneva Center - Villa 100m2 - Garden & Parking
description:
Villa individuelle meublée avec jardin arboré


Situation exceptionnelle au centre de Genève dans le parc paisible de la promenade Charles-Martin, proche de l’école Internationale et de la gare des Eaux-Vives.

Cette demeure profite d'un agréable cadre de vie arboré et silencieux : elle est entourée d’un jardin fleuri et bénéficie au sud d’une reposante terrasse et d’une grande pelouse bordée d’arbres.

Elle est idéalement située au bout d’un chemin privatif avec parking gratuit 5-6 voitures.

The space
Virus free: En ces temps de coranovirus, je purifie l’air et l’ensemble de la villa grâce à des sprays assainissants. 41 huiles essentielles de Puressentiel traitent ainsi les virus, bactéries et moisissures avec une efficacité démontrée cliniquement. Les huiles très actives sont le tea tree, eucalyptus, niaouli, et ravintsara.

La villa est réservée toute entière à un seul groupe d’invités. Vous serez donc seuls dans
neighborhood_overview:
Le quartier des Eaux-Vives est en pleine rénovation.

La maison se trouve à la Petite Boissière dans une zone encore préservée des promoteurs, un des derniers quartiers verts dans Genève centre. La maison se trouve dans une zone de villas très arborée de la Promenade Charles-Martin, qui est en fait un parc de verdure piétonnier avec des bancs et beaucoup d'arbres.

Commerces, jardin d’enfants et écoles à proximité immédiate.
Ecole Internationale et Ecole Le Corbusier à moins de 2 minutes à pied.
Accès aux autoroutes à moins de 5 minutes en voiture.

J'indique dans le “Guide” de mon annonce les commerces voisins pour vous aider à vous repérer.

A noter que la nouvelle gare des Eaux-Vives toute proche (250 mètres environ) qui a ouvert le 15 décembre 2019 inclut un supermarché Migros de 1'000 m2, et des commerces en plus de ceux listés dans le Guide. Ces commerces incluent un Sushi Shop, fleuriste, pharmacie, barbier/coiffeur, bar à café
host_about:
Je suis passionnée par les voyages, la science, les technologies vertes, et l'économie sociale et solidaire.
J'ai été chercheuse en Neurosciences et Pharmacologie (Strasbourg, Bâle, Los Angeles, Lausanne).
Je suis maintenant coach de développement professionnel et de carrière. 

La maison inclut des créations de mon grand-père qui était ferronnier d'art.
En dehors de ses lampes dans le salon (avec les bateaux du lac) et le hall de la maison, vous pouvez trouver certaines de ses créations dans Genève.

Mon grand-père a ainsi créé (entre autres) les grilles de l'ONU, le passage des Lions, la mairie de Cologny, et les lampadaires blancs près de l'horloge du pont du Mont-Blanc.

name: Luminous double room in the heart of Plainpalais
description:
Luminous and cosy apartment in the center of Plainpalais.
The accommodation is very comfortable and well equipped with internet, a fully furnished kitchen, working and eating area, washing machine and dryer.
The room has a double bed, and some
drawers for storing clothes.
I have a little and playful cat that will be very happy to welcome you!
neighborhood_overview: This quartier is a young and dynamic university area were you have access to many shops, restaurants, bars, supermarkets, pharmacies.
host_about:
Hello!!
My name is Carme, I'm a dentist from Mallorca, currently doing a postgraduate program in the university of Geneva. I like to travel, sometimes for work sometimes for pleasure!! That's why I like to share my apartment with you. 
I'm passionate about the ocean, diving and everything related with the sea :) I practice sports and I love to meet new people, to share experiences and to discover new cultures and languages! 
I have a very cute cat, her name is Flamme, she will be more than happy to have you as a guest in the apartment. She's playful, lovely and very social.
I'm really looking forward to meet you soon and to receive you in the beautiful city of Geneva!! xx Carme

name: Luxury appartment in the heart of Geneva Old Town
description:
*New on Airbnb* Stay in the absolute centre of Geneva, in the heart of the Old Town (the largest historical site in the whole of Switzerland!) when you book this beautifully high-end appartment located in a listed historical building. Just a stones throw away from all the shops, the cathedral, the lake, and major tram stop: "Bel-Air" directly outside the appartment will take you all around Geneva and to the airport.

The space
The freshly renovated apartment has everything you'll need to stay comfortably and safely in the heart of Geneva. The space is clean and practical, with phone chargers, storage, and lots of coat hangers in a walk-in closet. The appartment is a 3 bedroom but we will keep two bedrooms closed (so we keep all of our belongins there!).

Guest access
Guests have access to the whole first floor of the appartment: a bedroom with en suite walk-in closet and bathroom, the living room, kitchen and private elevator. The second flo
neighborhood_overview: One of the most unique places in the whole of Geneva (and Switzerland)! Cobble stone roads lead you to the most historical sites of the city as well as well as the best restaurants in Geneva. You are also a two minute walk from the lake and the Parc des Bastions, a beautiful park known for its monuments and palaces.

Ce quartier est plein de vit et situé dans le centre ville de Genève accessible à pied en 10min ou avec le bateau la mouette en 3min.
Le quartier des Pâquis est à la base un quartier populaire qui est devenu très prisé des diplomates car proches des organisation internationales. name: Lovely studio close to the lake and the UN
description:
Charming studio in the heart of Geneva.

The studio appartment is perfect for one person or a couple. It is nicely furnished with all the cooking supplies you need, bed linen, Wifi and even Netflix.

The studio is an 8' walk to the train station and another 8' walk to the Lake. You can find the botanical garden close by for a run. The neighbourhood is quite lively (lots of restaurants and bars) but the studio is calm because it's on the 6th floor and the windows are facing the courtyard.
neighborhood_overview:
Super lively!
Favorite spot: Les bains des Pâquis for a sauna (in the winter), a dip in the Lake (winter & summer), or a fondue with friends.
Vegans: don't miss out on "MuFood" right down the street. Their cuisine is exquisite!
Favorite bar? Try "Le Phare", an LGBTQI+ in the center, or "Livresse", a cosy bookshop / café close to Plainpalais.
host_about:
Hello everyone! 
New to AirBnB but willing to learn, improve and make the best out of it. 
Easygoing girl, curious about pretty much anything, love travelling, cooking, reading and acting! :) 
Bike rider and runner, sports is the best therapy. 
I would love one day to live in the countryside and own a pig. 
Yeah. 
You read it well. A pig.

name: Spacious, sunny 1-BR Apt close to UN w/ Balcony
description:
A very spacious, window surrounded, light drenched apartment with separate toilet and bathroom, within 10 minutes walking distance of the United Nations and international organizations. Also the main train station is 7 minutes walking distance away. Great public transportation within 2 minutes walk. Grocery stores, laundry mats, sports bars are all close by. Additionally, the Geneva Lake can be reached by bus, rented bikes (Geneve Roule, available at the train station), or by foot.

The space
This very central apartment is perfect for anyone working at the UN, international organizations, or just visiting as tourists, due to its central location. It is within a 10 minute walk from all UN agencies, the ICRC, and others. It has a spacious kitchen, bedroom with balcony overlooking it a quiet tree-lined walkway, separate toilet and bathroom, and living room with 32=inch satellite TV. Wifi available.

Guest access
The key will be placed ins
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is very quiet and walkable.  It is unique by being both close to the train station, the UN agencies and international organisations and a very cool neighborhood called Les Grottes, which has an eclectic selection of bars and restaurants.  It is also quiet and surrounded with single  standing lovely Geneva houses.  Grocery stores, an Italian Deli (opened on Sundays). and other conveniences all within walking distance. The lake is a stone throws away and accessible with a 15 minute walk or a 10 minute bus ride.
host_about:
Since I have traveled extensively, I know from a customer/guest point of view, what  necessary and convenient features are required in a property and make the difference for memorable stay.  This means offering all the  comforts of a home with the convenience of a hotel.  You'll only need to bring your suitcase, and leave the rest to us.   A full-time Manager is available to address any questions or concerns during your stay.  
We pass you on the savings from running it ourselves, with professionalism and care.
The easy key-less check-in/check-out feature gives you added flexibility, and avoids having to worry about coordinating key exchanges.  All 5 units are meant to make you feel comfortable and at home.  Enjoy your stay!

Cheers,
Ana

name: ★ n9 Private room in the heart of La Praille ★
description:
Join our co-living space for an ideal blend of privacy and sharing experience! A perfect place to meet and interact with new people.

Located in the industrial neighborhood of La Praille, we offer coworking and co-living spaces for young professionals and entrepreneurs.

Fully-furnished rooms and well-equipped common spaces to be shared with our vibrant international community.

Our community manager will make sure you have a wonderful experience during your short- or long-term stay in Geneva :)

The space
We offer co-working for startups and entrepreneurs on our first floor, and a co-living space on our second floor.

Each is equipped with a double bed (130 cm) fully prepared with a duvet, pillows and bed linen. On your bed you will find a towel and a little brochure containing information regarding the space and area around it.

Each room offers storing options such as drawers and hangers, as well as a night tab
neighborhood_overview:
We are located in the vibrant industrial area of La Praille, just 2 min away from the Commercial Center of La Praille, where you can do your groceries, visit restaurants or go shopping, go to the cinema or play bowling.

The space is right next to the picturesque neighborhood of Carouge, commonly referred to as the "Greenwich Village of Geneva" or "Little Italy", for its many boutiques and studios where artisans and craftsmen of every ilk can be observed plying their trade. The bohemian vibe carries on into the night with a plethora of cafes, jazz bars and nightclubs.

name: Cozy flat close to the lake with parking
description:
Hello!

Our flat is composed of the following :
- bathroom
- Kitchen
- living room with a canapé-lit
- balcony with (view on the lake in winter)
- sleeping room with double bed

There is a parking for visitors down the building where you can leave your car.

The flat is located 5mins from the lake by walk, very convenient for boat / Lake lovers.

Geneva City Centre is located :
- 15min by train (price is 3 CHF, TPG tickets are still valid in Versoix)
- car 15-20mins
- bike 30 mins

The space
Our flat is composed of the following :
- bathroom
- Kitchen
- living room with a canapé-lit
- balcony with (view on the lake in winter)
- sleeping room with double bed

Guest access
The building has an elevator and a parking in front of it.

Other things to note
If you are 3 guests, one will need to sleep on a canapé-lit i
neighborhood_overview:
Versoix is a quiet place close to Geneva and Airport. It is located by lake, with beaches and the port. It is also close to France (5 km)

There is a train running every 15mins to Geneva (15 mins journey) and a bus V going straight to the airport (30mins journey)
