description:
Very nice and quiet apartment, with cosy furniture and decoration. Free wifi.

Full of light on the top-floor: enjoy a cup of coffee in the loggia with a Geneva 270° view!

Very central and well located: 7 minutes from the very center and Cornavin Railway Station (trams 14 & 18). 10 minutes from the airport/Palexpo by bus. Very close from UN. Easy to park a car around.

Bakery, pharmacy, grocery shop (24/24) and “balexert" shopping center within walking distance. The area is quiet and very safe.

The space
Appartement au dernier étage, très lumineux et une superbe vue. Une cuisine toute équipée, une chambre privée avec grand lit, salle de bains, grand salon et une loggia. Wifi haut débit à dispostion & TV/Netflix. L'appartement est très bien situé (l'aéroport et la veille ville sont à 10 min en transports publics, en particulier un tram passe toute les 5 min à 100m de l'appartement).

The flat is composed of a kitchen fully

neighborhood_overview: La commune de Bernex est située à l'ouest de l'agglomération genevoise. Outre le village (5 900 habitants), la commune regroupe les villages de Lully (1 700 habitants), Sézenove (900 habitants), Chèvres (60 habitants) et Loëx (80 habitants). La majeure partie du territoire communal est consacrée à l'agriculture. Le point culminant de la commune, le signal de Bernex, domine la plaine de l'Aire à 509,8 m.

host_about:
Fraîchement retraitée, j'ai du temps pour recevoir mes hôtes dans quatre chambres doubles, avec salles de bains, dans le cadre de "Mon jardin en Ville". Il est aussi possible de louer les chambres avec accès à la cuisine et au reste de l'appartement ou de louer tout l'appartement-souplex. Après quelques missions humanitaires, d'où j'ai ramené meubles et décorations, j'ai aménagé un souplex-loft dans une zone industrielle, sur la rive-droite de Genève, proche de toutes commodités. Avec mon conjoint, nous prenons plaisir à recevoir des personnes de passage à Genève. Comme j'aime m'occuper de mon jardin, j'en profite aussi pour préparer des confitures, sirops, pâtes de fruits avec des fruits du jardin. Une deuxième résidence à Collex (canton de Genève), est également mise en location avec 5 chambres dans une villa mise en colocation pour des périodes de longue durée, voire â l'année. Un troisième logement, situé en bord de mer, en Catalogne, à Ametlla-de-Mar, est également mis en location. C'est un appartement de 4 chambres pouvant accueillir 6 personnes.
Ma devise: "La vie est une œuvre d'art très difficile, et, parti de rien, c'est déjà beaucoup que d'en réussir quelques parties, en travaillant et en économisant ". 
Citation de Henry Becque ; Les pensées et notes d'alb (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)

Enjoy of this super clean, calm and equipped apartment.

The space
READ ALL BEFORE BOOKING

Quiet, cosy and cocooning apartment (44m2) ideally located in the very centre of Geneva.
On the first lower floor of an ancient building, it has a lovely living room with a dining corner, and the kitchen corner (free breakfast included.)

name: Chambre Spacieuse-Appartement Moderne-Plein Coeur
description:
1 Chambre spacieuse avec lit double et balcon à 2 rues du lac.
Draps et serviettes fournis.
Salle de bain avec douche. Les WC sont séparés pour les invités.
7ème étage avec ascenseur - Appartement de 100m2 avec 2 balcons dont vue partielle sur le lac et le Jet de Genève.
Machine à cafe/thé a disposition ainsi que WIFI.
Appartement moderne, très bien situé et calme.
Merci de noter que les hotes sont un couple d'hommes.

The space
Nous vivons dans l'appartement et nous serons ravis de vous y recevoir.
Nous sommes des hôtes respectueux et nous en attendons de même de nos invités.
Fumer est autoriser sur les balcons.
Malgré notre amour pour eux, nous n'acceptons malheureusement pas les animaux de compagnie.
neighborhood_overview:
Situé en plein coeur de Genève dans le quartier bas des Pâquis. L'appartement est proche de la Gare centrale Cornavin.
2 lignes de bus avec arrêt devant l'immeuble.
3 supermarchés aux pieds de l'immeuble.
Restaurants et bars à disposition.
Proche de toutes commodités ainsi que du quartier des Nations Unis.

Aéroport à 7mn en train de la gare centrale.
host_about:
Couple ayant beaucoup voyagé! Nous serions heureux de vous accueillir chez nous.

Ivan (Mexicain) et Max (Français) parlent couramment français, espagnol et anglais avec nos invités,

Nous sommes très faciles à vivre et heureux de partager notre temps et de rencontrer de nouvelles personnes.

Couple sympathique et propre, nous espérons que vous apprécierez notre chez nous comme vous y étiez chez vous :)

Lake Geneva Studio

The space
Apartment has double bed as well as sofa bed, fully equipped kitchen and bath room with tub. Super convenient apartment for holidays or for short break. Its ideally for 2 people but if guests are more than has to inform in advance for acceptance or not.

Other things to note
Ideally for 2 guests but since we have an arrangement for 4 guest that does not mean this apartment is for 4 guests by automatically. Incase if the guests are more

The apartment is fully equipped and well situated in Geneva Center on the right bank.
It’s close to main streets but also in a private yard, so it’s very quiet.
Convenient with public transportation to the central train station (5 mins), airport (10 mins), and old town (10 mins).
The apartment has a private bedroom for adults and a large living room with a sofa bed. An infant bed is also available.
Several parks are walking distance (less than 5 mins).

The space

Stunning bright room with jet d'eau view, located in the Pacquis area of Geneva! 10 mins walk to Geneva Cornavin station, 5 mins walk to Bains du Pacquis, in the heart of dowtown. 15 minutes to Geneva Airport by many choices of public transportation. Several supermarkets and restaurant from walking distance. Your stay will be in your studio (one large bed for 2 people and one folding bed). Private bathroom and terrace with view on the 'Jet d'eau'.

The space
Our place is bright, clean, quiet and with a relaxed atmosphere. The location is perfect for the parks and museums, and supermarkets and restaurants are all close.

An French living and working in Geneva with an interest in poker, travel and EDM music. I love living in the heart of Geneva and enjoy walking around the city testing all the surrounding restaurants.

There are so many nice things to visit in Geneva, I'll be more than happy to welcome you to my home and help you settle in and enjoy the city experience.

My motto: Always believe that anything that feels like a good idea is worth a try, in work and in life, in everything.

name: Double room for family friendly business traveller
description:
We are a family with 4 kids 12 to 21. Breakfast is included and we are happy to practice English, German, Spanish and French with you.
If you come by car you can leave it parked at no cost in a very quite street with access from our garden.
Our house is 3km from the city center and 8 minutes walk from a bus stop that takes you to the lake in 10m, train station in 20m and international organizations, airport.

The space
The room is on the 1st floor of our 3 story house. Bathroom is as well there but you will share it with our kids. You can as well enjoy the shared spaces in our house and of course the terrase and garden, where you can smoke if you wish.

Guest access
We expect you to share common areas with us, such as Living Room, Kitchen and Garden. You can as well borrow one of our electric bicycle from us and ride to the city center in 20 minutes
While in common areas you are welcome to practice any of the languages we spea
neighborhood_overview:
If you would like to eat typical Swiss food “Le Gruyérien” is one of the best restaurants to eat fondu, it is only a ten minute walk. The sport center Sous-Moulin, a three minute walk, also makes fabulous pizzas. The sport center also provides a fitness center, an ice rink, etc.
The city of Thônex is located at the border of France and Switzerland, witch offers you a lot of possibilities to go shopping or dining out.
host_about:
Je suis maman de 4 enfants deux filles adultes de 21 et 19 ans et deux garçon de 14 et 12 ans. Nous vivions dans notre maison dans un quartier calme proche de la ville. 
Nous louons une chambre au 1er étage de notre maison, que nous pouvons aménager au gré des demandes de nos hôtes, en chambre individuelle, deux lits séparés un grand lit double. Les voyageurs partagent la salle de bain avec baignoire avec mes deux garçons.
L'autre chambre sous les combles, nous la louons pour les weekends elle est lumineuse avec un lit King-size et une salle de bain avec douche privée. 
Mes enfants et moi aimons recevoir et cette chambre est une ouverture sur le monde et d'autres cultures, ce n'est que du positif et un énorme enrichissement.

I am mother of 4 kids aged 21 to 12 , living together in our place.
When we live in the house we have 2 rooms for rent :
A double room in the attic with its own bathroom and dressing room
A single or double room on the first floor with bathroom to share with children.
During the periods of time we are not there we also rent the house 6 bedrooms
We have two dogs and plenty of bicicles that we make available during your stay. The house is full set with ammenities so that you can spend great  and quite holidays in Switzerland. Close to the Motorway, close to public transportation and close to commercial area.

Soy madre de 4 hijos, dos hijas de 21 y 19 anos y dos ninos de 14 y 12 anos

A prime neighborhood with nearby trendy bars, restaurants, shops and commercial centre. Ideally located near the new gare des Eaux Vives and the Leman Express. (15 minutes to Geneva station). 10 minutes walk to the lake and the famous Jet d'Eau.

name: High standing apartment - Place du Bourg de Four
description:
Exceptional accommodation with a lot of charm in the centre of the old town of Geneva. The apartment is fully equipped and recently furnished.

The space
Apartment with a lot of character in the Place du Bourg de Four, facing the Palais de Justice, ideally equipped for your greatest comfort:

- A pretty entrance hall overlooking a mezzanine with a sofa bed

- A bright bedroom

- A fully equipped kitchen, including all the basic necessities as well as a dishwasher, oven, microwave and Nespresso machine.

- A large living room opening onto the dining room, equipped with a beautiful fireplace and a television. 

- A bathroom (bath/WC).

- A washing machine and a tumble dryer.

A little something extra: a spiral staircase giving access to a tower and a 360° view of the lake, the water jet and the roofs of the old city of Geneva. 

Guest access
The accommodation as well as the e
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in the heart of the old city of Geneva, near the Cathedral of St. Pierre and overlooks the Place Bourg-de-Four. 

All shops are nearby.

To do/see nearby: 

- Geneva Water Jet

- Visit of the old town and St. Peter's Cathedral

- Promenade de la Treille

- Parc des Bastillons

- English Garden and Flowered Clock

- Cruise on Lake Geneva
host_about: Passionné par les voyages et les découvertes, vous accueillir sera pour moi un plaisir. Je mettrai tout en oeuvre pour que votre séjour se déroule de la meilleure des façons. name: Functional apartment - Eaux-Vives Heart
description:
Very clean, very functional apartment in the heart of the best neighborhood in town. 1 street away from Henri Blanvalet, a street with all the best bars and restaurants in town.

The space
When entering the apartment, you will find two doors on your left.
The first door is the bedroom giving on the inside of the building thus beeing very calm.
The second door on the left lets you in the fully equipped
and large kitchen.
Finally, the room on the right is the living area which is large and very comfortable.

Guest access
Guests will have access to all amenities on site.
neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood of Eaux-Vives is quite lively, without being noisy.
There are dozens of restaurants around, bars, food chains, grocery stores (some open late!), boulangeries, small shopping malls and boutiques, pharmacies.
host_about:
Keys'n'Fly - Airbnb Management Solution That Suits You
My name is Marc with Keys'n'Fly Vacation Rentals, a full service property management company based out of Geneva, Switzerland. My team and I strive to make every experience a seamless one, no matter where your trip may take you. As hospitality professionals experts, we are dedicated to provide superior customer service with attentiveness to inquiries and our guests while they are staying with us.

name: Comfortable apartment in the vineyards near Geneva
description:
The apartment is located in the quiet winemaking village Russin at the foot of the Jura mountains and only 15 minutes by train from the city centre of Geneva.
The apartment is comfortably furnished and equipped with everything you need for a short or longer stay. The kitchen is very well equipped (Coffee machine with Nespresso capsules, Mixer, oven, 4 hotplates and pans, toaster, etc.) and the cosy terrace invites you to relax with a lounge and a dining table.

The space
The apartment consists of 3 rooms: An open dining room with living room (sofa and dining table) and 2 bedrooms, as well as a kitchen and a bathroom (with bath and toilet). Both bedrooms have two beds (one of them is a loft bed).
The apartment is on the ground floor.

Guest access
The guests have private access to the whole apartment and the terrace.
neighborhood_overview:
Russin is a perfect starting point for a comfortable and varied stay, for discovering the city of Geneva, for hiking, for wine tours and for visiting the Geneva international Motor Show.

Russin is a beautiful small and quiet village in the countryside of Canton Geneva. The village is surrounded by vineyards, from where you can enjoy a beautiful view of the Jura mountains and Geneva's local mountain "le Salève". In Russin there is a very small grocery shop with a bakery, a coffee shop and a restaurant.

There is a train from Russin station to Geneva every 30 minutes. The journey takes 15 minutes. The train station Russin is 5 minutes walk from the apartment.
14 minutes by car from the Balexert Congress Centre and 12 minutes from Geneva Airport. 16 minutes to the Palexpo (Palais des expositions et des congrès de Genève est le complexe d'expositions de Genève)

description:
Nice house in a beautiful neighborhood close to the city center and with great public transport connections. Parking at extra cost. This accommodation is destined for people wanting to stay a long time in Geneva (students, young professionals, etc.). Food-store and park less than 5 minutes away. Desk in the room, kitchen, living room and garden in common. Bathroom is private for this special room. Free internet with WIFI! Non-smoking house!

The space
You will definitely enjoy the tranquility and peacefulness of the area, especially if you want to work or rest. There is the park of Belle-Idée nearby if you want to go for a walk.
The furniture is brand new, the mattresses are comfortable and each room has an office, shelves for books and a reading lamp hooked on the bed.
You can also enjoy the living room, the kitchen and the garden, ideal if you want to rest or walk around outside and breathe some fresh air, or organize a barbecue with some friends!!! :)

name: Apartment in Paquis-Sécheron (close to lake & UN)
description:
My boyfriend and I actually live in the apartment. We are renting it occasionally while we are on vacation.

Its a beautiful und very charming 2.5 room apartment (approx 70 qm) with wooden floors/colorful tiles and high ceilings.
2 rooms + kitchen+ bath and separated WC can be Used. There is no TV. The sleeping sofa in the living room is from bolia. The kitchen is very spacey with balcony.

The area is very quiet and extremely beautiful. Still, it’s located at high-trafficked Rue de Lausanne.

Guest access
2 out of the 2.5 bedrooms plus kitchen and bathroom/Wc can be used. One small Room (0,5) cannot be used.

Other things to note
As this is our private accommodation we ask to be respectful with regards to private stuff, neighbors etc.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in a beautiful and safe area of Paquis Sécheron. Further, it’s located in front of Parc Monrepos, which is directly at the lake. Thus, the lake is max. 1 minute walking distance.

Also Jardin Botanique (10 min walking), the UN- Broken Chair (15 min walking),
Cornavin Central Station (15 min walking) are close by.

Walking to city Centre along the lake takes about 20-30 minutes.

At Cornavin there is a Migros and a Coop which are open from Monday to Sunday. LIDL is well close by.

Beautiful Café Le Fix is 2 min walking distance.
host_about:
My name is Yasmin and I live with my boyfriend in beautiful Geneva. 

I am working for the United Nations.

I love traveling, meeting new people, good food and music.

name: Charming guesthouse+deck: near lake/UN/GVA airport
description:
Charming separate ground floor independent fully furnished apartment in house
— 450m to the Bellevue public beach on Lake Geneva
— 10 minutes to the United Nations (2 stops) with local transport ticket
— Close to Geneva airport/Palexpo
— 5-minute walk to Webster University
— Near Missions/Embassies/Consulates
— On Léman Express train route
— Exposed beams
— Private deck (24m2 terrace) parasol, table, chairs, barbecue
— There is a garden area with 2 deck chairs

The space
This rental is suitable for a couple. There is a 35% discount for monthly rentals and 20% discount for weekly rentals. Longer rentals welcome; please contact to discuss as the calendar has been limited to a few months availability at one time. NOTE: For long-term reservations, payments are collected and released in monthly installments by Airbnb.

Can sleep 4 if needed for a SHORT period: the sofa is also a single bed with an additional slide-
neighborhood_overview:
450m to the public beach with a breathtaking view of the Mont Blanc, restaurants, post office, gas station, lakeside snack bar, etc. Perfectly situated and near Webster University, the United Nations, Palexpo, Geneva airport, and Geneva city center.

EN FRANÇAIS:
450m de la plage publique avec une vue imprenable sur le Mont Blanc, restaurants, bureau de poste, une station-service, un snack-bar au bord du lac, etc. Parfaitement situé et à proximité de Webster University, des Nations Unies, de Palexpo, de l'aéroport de Genève et du centre ville de Genève.
host_about: I've lived in Geneva most of my life. I'm an entrepreneur and an avid collector. I have a passion for "junking" or as some people would say: going to flea markets and antique sales. My home is a museum and everyone comments on how cosy and clean it is! The guesthouse has a little bit of my style without imposing on the guest - as you can see from the photos.

name: Spacious, comfortable & quiet bedroom
description:
The room is situated in a spacious, light and modern apartment of approximately 100 sqm. The flat consists of in total three bedrooms, two toilets, one bathroom and one shower room in addition to a spacious living room and dining room. The apartment is situated on the sixth floor in a very quiet neighborhood. There is access to a balcony.

The space
The flat is perfect if you’re in Geneva for work at the UN or any of the international organizations; it is just a few minutes walk from Nation and 10 minutes from the lake. If you’re here to visit it is very easy to go downtown. What I love about this flat is that it’s spacious and central yet homey and quiet.

Guest access
The guest will have access to the kitchen, dining room and balcony.

Other things to note
In the flat lives one adult and a child of four years.
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is situated very close to Nation and the UN and to several international organizations. Busses (5, 8, 11) are at a two minute walk from the flat as well as tram 15 - all take you downtown. There are several parks and green areas close by and a very nice local swimming pool as well. The flat is 10-15 minutes from the lake by foot.
host_about: A Swede living and working in Geneva since 8 years.

neighborhood_overview: L'endroi est calme et la vue est imprenable sur tous les massifs montagneux, Les Voirons, La chaîne du Mont-Blanc, le Salève et le Jura... Ainsi que les champs quand ils sont fleuris de colza ou de tournesols. Le bus 32 vous amènera pour 3 francs (billet valable 1 heure) et en 15 minutes à Thônex (region des 3 chênes, Thônex - Chêne-Bougeries -  Chêne-Bourg), une ville dans la ville de 30'000 habitants avec ses commerces et autres. De là, vous pourrez vous rendre au centre-ville de Genève, avec les bus, trams et trains en 15 minutes (avec le même billet).  Depuis le Centre-ville de Genève, vous êtes à la gare "Cornavin" et à 15 minutes de l'aéroport "Genève-Cointrin". Demandez-moi un itinéraire et une adresse mail pour toute demande précise.

description:

This apartment provides guests with excellent dining space, a spacious living room, a large fully equipped kitchen, 2 double bedrooms in suite with 2 bathrooms. There is also 1 indoor parking space available.

neighborhood_overview:
Why Geneva
Embedded between nearby Alpine peaks and the hilly terrain of the Jura, the French-speaking city of Geneva lies in the bay where the Rhone leaves Lake Geneva. With its humanitarian tradition and cosmopolitan flair, the European seat of the UNO and headquarters of the Red Cross is known as the «capital of peace».
The symbol of the «world’s smallest metropolis» is the “Jet d’eau” – a fountain with a 140-metre-high water jet at the periphery of Lake Geneva. Most of the large hotels and many restaurants are situated on the right-hand shore of the lake. The old town, the heart of Geneva with the shopping and business quarter, holds sway over the left- hand shore. It is dominated by St. Peter’s Cathedral, however the actual centre of the old town is the Place du Bourg-de-Four, which is the oldest square in the city. Quays, lakeside promenades, countless parks, lively side streets in the old town and elegant shops invite guests to stroll. One of the best-maintained street

name: Charmant appartement deux pièces avec balcon
description:
Le plus grand atout de ce deux pièces est sa situation à l'entrée de Carouge, un quartier pittoresque de Genève, ainsi que son balcon sans vis-à-vis offrant une magnifique vue sur le Jura. Il est composé d'un salon-chambre, d'une cuisine, d'une salle de bain avec douche et de toilettes séparées. Il est entièrement décoré et équipé. Il dispose en plus d'un garage à vélos, ainsi que d'une buanderie.

The space
Avec ascenseur.
neighborhood_overview: Avec son marché le mercredi et le samedi, ses parcs et sa place de Marché, Carouge est définitivement le plus joli quartier de Genève. Très familial, il n'est pas rare d'y voir des enfants jouer dans la rue pendant que les parents prennent le soleil sur l'un de ses nombreuses terrasses.  Ce n'est pas pour rien qu'on l'appelle "le village". On y trouve également une pléthore de boutiques de créateurs, de chocolatiers et à mon goût le meilleur pâtissier de Genève, Mr & Mrs Renou.
host_about:
Andrea is a 30 years old journalist, working for a swiss magazine. She loves music, dancing, laughing and of course travelling. She speaks french, english and spanish. 
She knows very well the city and will be happy to help you to organise your visit in Geneva and in the surroundings.

She rents sometimes her flat so she can travel around the world :)

name: Unique Studio Apartment Overlooking Lake Geneva
description:
A Cool Studio Apartment on the top level of our Farm in the tranquil village of Collonge-Bellerive with views overlooking Lake Geneva. This newly renovated Studio has a self-contained bedroom, bathroom and kitchen. Its a great place to stay if you are wanting a quiet getaway or if you are in town for business.

We are only a 14 minute Bus or Car Ride into Geneva town centre.

The space
The Studio is a secluded nook on our farm with spectacular views.

The space is ideal for couples or individuals who wish for a relaxed time away from the noisy areas of Geneva but with very easy access to the city center.
neighborhood_overview:
Collonge-Bellerive is a very special village in Geneva. It has a friendly family vibe with very easy transport links into the centre of town.

In Collonge-Bellerive, we are surrounded by vineyards with great walks near by and of course the lake where you can rent a boat, sunbathe, swim and paddle board.

description:
Idéalement situé au coeur du quartier de la Jonction, à deux pas du bord du Rhône, proche de toutes commodités, ce charmant appartement avec cachet se compose:
- D'un grand salon avec une alcôve dans laquelle il y a un canapé lit une place.
- D'une grande chambre avec un lit double.
- D'une cuisine entièrement équipée.
- D'une salle de bain avec baignoire et WC séparé.

The space
Chers hôtes,

Nous vous informons que le nettoyage de la vaisselle et de la cuisine ne sont pas compris dans le tarif journalier de l'apartement ni dans les frais de ménages.

Dès lors, nous vous prions de bien vouloir laisser la vaisselle et la cuisine dans le même état qu'à votre arrivée.

Le voisinage étant sensible aux bruit, aucune fête n'est tolorée.

name: Beautiful apartment UN, CICG, ILO, WHO, ITU, WIPO
description:
In the real UN area, unbeatable location in the heart of Petit-Saconnex, It's a spacious sunny private apartment with fully equipped kitchen, Bath, Wifi, TV - Netflix,
Walking distance to UN, WHO, ILO, WIPO, CICG, UNHCR, ITU. (to PALEXPO and airport a short bus ride) and only 15 min by bus with the line 3 (Bus stop 1 min from the apartment) to the city center.
toiletries are complimentary

The space
Spacious Apartment with a sunny view on Petit-Saconnex Place, with fully equipped kitchen, Bath, Wifi, TV - Netflix, next to the iconic "Café du Soleil" famous for their Swiss speciality
In the real UN area, quiet and residential.
*To WIPO, ITU, CICG--> 10-minute walk
* To UN, GF, GAVI, UNHCR--> 14-minute walk
* To ILO, WHO, UNAIDS, UNICEF,-->18-minute walk
* To Palexpo/Airport--> a Short bus ride
* To City Center--> 15 min bus ride
Special discount applies for weekly or monthly stays!

Guest access
host_about:
Né à Genève, je vous accueil pour faire de votre séjour une expérience agréable et sympathique...

Passionnés par les voyages, et ayant vécu deux ans en Chine, et avoir voyagé en Afrique, et en Asie, c'est après avoir testé AIRBNB en Espagne et en France que j'ai eu envie à mon tour de faire découvrir ma belle ville de Genève.

Je me passionne également pour le cinéma, et la moto.

Je vous propose de séjourner au Eaux-Vives, un quartier animé et vivant à deux pas du Jet d'eau. A 5 min en transport en commun du centre de Genève.

Je reste également disponible pour répondre à vos questions, vous conseiller en matière de restaurant, de sorties et activités genevoises multiples...

Romain

name: Bright newly furnished studio in Eaux-Vives,Geneva
description:
Homey bright newly furnished studio, situated on the top floor of a residential building in Eaux-Vives, one of Geneva's lively neighborhoods. Apartment is located in a quite residential street with a supermarket 20 meters away. Restaurants and stores are at a walking distance, the lake is just 5 minutes away, as well as the beautiful Parc La Grange. 15 minutes walking to the center (Rive). Views from the lake from far away, from studio and kitchen.

The space
This newly furnished apartment is ideal for a couple or a single person staying in Geneva. The relatively large studio is suited with a seating area, a dining area and a sleeping area with a 160cm wide mattress. Fully equipped kitchen with oven, microwave and a Nespresso machine. A quite residential apartment, on the top floor with plenty of light and far away views of the lake. Building has an elevator, please take into account that there are four steps leading to front door, and another four steps to arriv
neighborhood_overview: Eaux-Vives is a vibrant neighborhood of Geneva, where you can find supermarkets, bio food markets,  restaurants and boutique shops all at a walking distance. (A supermarket is 20 meters away). The lake is just a 5 minute walk, and around the corner you can find one of Geneva's most beautiful parks - Park La Grange. The street is very quite with little traffic. 15 minutes walking or a 6 minute bus ride away from Rive (the center of Geneva).

name: Charming Studio UN, CICG, ILO, WHO, ITU, WIPO
description:
In the real UN area, unbeatable location in the heart of Petit-Saconnex, It's a spacious sunny private apartment with fully equipped kitchen, Bath, Wifi,
Walking distance to UN, WHO, ILO, WIPO, CICG, UNHCR, ITU. (to PALEXPO and airport a short bus ride) and only 15 min by bus with the line 3 (Bus stop 1 min from the apartment) to the city center.
toiletries are complimentary

The space
Spacious Apartment with a sunny view on Petit-Saconnex Place, with fully equipped kitchen, Bath, Wifi, next to the iconic "Café du Soleil" famous for their Swiss speciality
In the real UN area, quiet and residential.
*To WIPO, ITU, CICG--> 10-minute walk
* To UN, GF, GAVI, UNHCR--> 14-minute walk
* To ILO, WHO, UNAIDS, UNICEF,-->18-minute walk
* To Palexpo/Airport--> a Short bus ride
* To City Center--> 15 min bus ride
Special discount applies for weekly or monthly stays!
host_about:
Né à Genève, je vous accueil pour faire de votre séjour une expérience agréable et sympathique...

Passionnés par les voyages, et ayant vécu deux ans en Chine, et avoir voyagé en Afrique, et en Asie, c'est après avoir testé AIRBNB en Espagne et en France que j'ai eu envie à mon tour de faire découvrir ma belle ville de Genève.

Je me passionne également pour le cinéma, et la moto.

Je vous propose de séjourner au Eaux-Vives, un quartier animé et vivant à deux pas du Jet d'eau. A 5 min en transport en commun du centre de Genève.

Je reste également disponible pour répondre à vos questions, vous conseiller en matière de restaurant, de sorties et activités genevoises multiples...

Romain

name: Home Is A Feeling: live and homework in Champel
description:
Best area in Geneva. Calm, safe while 2 mins walk from supermarkets, pharmacy, parking, restaurants and Lemn Express station. 5 mins walk from Hospital HUG. Parc 3 mins away. Bus n.3 to Cornavin and many other bus stops connecting to all Geneva areas. Our studio is rare in the market because it is featured in a way which allows privacy and it has a balcony, very rare asset to find in studios, to breath fresh air! Unlimited wifi is provided, hence it is the perfect location also for homeworking.

The space
Yes it is a studio BUT it is very well organized with a separate entrance and wardrobe area, a separate well equipped kitchen, a large bathroom and outmost a balcony area to sit comfortably and enjoy fresh air also while homeworking.
C'est un studio MAIS il est très bien organisé avec une entrée séparée avec armoires, une cuisine équipée séparée, une grande salle de bain et un balcon pour vous reposer, faire du téletravail et respirer librement!
neighborhood_overview: Quite, clean and welcoming building. Very nice neighbourhood.
host_about:
Welcome to "Home Is A Feeling" highly regarded guest. Our studio is located in the heart of Champel, sought after district in Geneva. It covers 38 square meters and it has a balcony too. It is composed of a hall with wardrobes, 1 large bathroom, 1 main room with double bed and a very comfortable sofabed, separate kitchen and west facing balcony. Wifi free access for you!
It is on the 5th floor but no worries.. there is a wide lift!
Leman Express /Genève-Champel (underground connecting Geneva to other swiss cities such as Lausanne as well as to French border villages) stop and shops are 1 minute walk. Parc Bertrand 2 minutes away and HUG 4 mins away.


Bienvenu/e chez "Home Is A Feeling" 
Notre studio de 38 mètres carrés plus un balcon se trouve dans le coeur de Champel, secteur très recherché de Genève. Il se compose d'une entrée avec plusieurs armoires, 1 grande salle de bain, 1 pièce principale avec lit double et un canapé-lit très confortable, 1 cuisine séparée et un balcon exposé ouest. Le Wifi est gratuit pour nos invités.
Le studio se trouve au 5ème étage mais pour le moins sportifs (comme moi!) un grand ascenseur est à votre disposition!
Leman Express/Genève-Champel ( métro reliant Genève à d'autre villes suisses - Lausanne- aussi bien que à des villages frontaliers français) et les magasins sont à 1 minute à pied. Le Parc Bertrand 2 minutes à pied et l'HUG à 4 mins.

Additionally, if you are here on a business trip, we are within walking distance to the business area of Geneva.

The bedroom is small, but cosy. We are on the fourth floor (thankfully, with an elevator in the building).

The space

Fast wifi is available throughout the whole apartment.

The apartment has a comfortable bedroom with 2 single beds. The bathroom is fitted with a bathtub and a toilet. A separate toilet is available
The apartment features a washing machine, ironing equipment, central heating and a desk.
Note that the cleaning, towels, bed linen and tourist tax are included in the rental fee.
Parking is available nearby. Smoking is not allowed inside. Pets

name: Carouge | Stylish & Central | Studio
description: Spacious, furnished and fully equipped studio apartment. This premium boutique studio is defined by unique design — bringing together comfort and style with a sense of cozy home feeling.
neighborhood_overview:
Quartier des Augustins is an interesting fraction of Plainpalais which has a real local neighborhood feeling, is very well connected with easy public transportations to all parts of the city, and where characterful small shops and cafés have been bursting the past few years. Places like Les Enfants Terribles, one of the city’s coolest design concept store, or Chez Marius, a former butcher shop turned into a popular wine and tapas bar with hanging hams, reflect the vibes of Augustins quite accordingly. Located near the University Hospitals of Geneva (HUG), the University of Geneva and Carouge, the flat is in the heart of the city. Wondering around you’ll find bobo-chic second hand boutiques, a vintage record shop and café, design stores, etc. Close to the apartment you’ll also find a great choice of food stores, making the area very easy-to-live on the day-to-day.

The studio is a few steps away from the small Sardinian town Carouge, where facades are pastel pretty and fountai

neighborhood_overview: A deux pas du centre-ville, Carouge est le Greenwich Village de Genève ! Son architecture rappelle ses origines sardes et vous donne l'impression d'être dans le Sud. Commerçants, terrasses ombragées, artisans et antiquaires habitent les nombreuses ruelles de Carouge, dans lesquelles flâner des heures est un vrai plaisir. A la nuit tombée, l'ambiance est au rendez-vous grâce aux nombreux bars branchés, réputés dans toute la ville.

description:
The flat is newly renovated and full of light, with wooden floor and nice deco. It's located in the 'quartier des bains', which is the artistic quarter of Gva, with many art galleries, the Modern Art Museum few metres away, and a large number of hip bars and restaurant around. There's also a small supermarket downstairs which makes it very convenient.
The area is easily reachable with 4 stops by tram from the station. Ideal place for a city break or a short to medium term work assignment.

The space
The flat is very cozy and warm, the wooden floors, the curtains the cushions and decoration makes you just want to stay home. The kitchen is my favorite place, fully fitted with dishwasher and design fridge ... ready to let your creative cooking experiences go!
The area is as good as it gets in Geneva, easy access, public transportation or short walks to all key areas.
neighborhood_overview: The neighbourhood is a good mixture of Artsy (independent galleries), bars and restaurants (The libanese by place de cirque is great value), there are also good walks or runs along the river just 500m away.

name: Appartement pour un couple,jacuzzi en été, jardin
description:
Appartement cosy, 1 chambre, au rez-de-chaussée, écologique (pompe à chaleur, panneaux solaires, récupération de l'eau de pluie, eau du lave-mains filtrée pour la chasse d'eau du w-c, et.) et moderne, chauffage au sol, couvercle w-c auto-rétractable, induction, teppan, etc. Construit en 2012. Pas de possibilité de faire des fêtes. Pas de bruit après 22h. Les propriétaires logent dans le studio situé en face de la chambre, mais n'interviennent pas dans l'appartement.

The space
Appartement cosy, 1 chambre, rez-de-chaussée, proche de tout, entouré d'un jardin de fruitiers. L'arrêt de bus "Guye" se situe à 100 mètres, ainsi que le centre commercial "Planète Charmilles ".

Guest access
Tout l'appartement du rez-de-chaussé est mis à prédisposition des voyageurs. Les propriétaires logent dans le studio situé en face de la chambre-à-coucher, la buanderie est accessible pour des réservations de plus de3 jours, elle se situe au rez-inférieure, qui peu
neighborhood_overview: C'est un ancien quartier semi-industriel, qui accueillait l'usine de voitures Hispano-Suiza. La copropriété a été construite en 2012, dans la zone de villas des anciens ouvriers de l'usine.
host_about:
Fraîchement retraitée, j'ai du temps pour recevoir mes hôtes dans quatre chambres doubles, avec salles de bains, dans le cadre de "Mon jardin en Ville". Il est aussi possible de louer les chambres avec accès à la cuisine et au reste de l'appartement ou de louer tout l'appartement-souplex. Après quelques missions humanitaires, d'où j'ai ramené meubles et décorations, j'ai aménagé un souplex-loft dans une zone industrielle, sur la rive-droite de Genève, proche de toutes commodités. Avec mon conjoint, nous prenons plaisir à recevoir des personnes de passage à Genève. Comme j'aime m'occuper de mon jardin, j'en profite aussi pour préparer des confitures, sirops, pâtes de fruits avec des fruits du jardin. Une deuxième résidence à Collex (canton de Genève), est également mise en location avec 5 chambres dans une villa mise en colocation pour des périodes de longue durée, voire â l'année. Un troisième logement, situé en bord de mer, en Catalogne, à Ametlla-de-Mar, est également mis en location. C'est un appartement de 4 chambres pouvant accueillir 6 personnes.
Ma devise: "La vie est une œuvre d'art très difficile, et, parti de rien, c'est déjà beaucoup que d'en réussir quelques parties, en travaillant et en économisant ". 
Citation de Henry Becque ; Les pensées et notes d'alb (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)

name: One bedroom corner flat in Eaux Vives, Geneva
description: A fully furnished corner apartment in Eaux Vives, five minutes walk to the lake and near popular restaurants and bars in the heart of downtown Geneva. It has one bedroom with a double bed, as well as large living room that includes a pull out couch that sleeps two. The kitchen is a separate room, with full dining table and all necessary amenities. (The photos are mostly from before the apartment was furnished, as I have beenout of Switzerland and haven't been able to take new ones.)
neighborhood_overview: The Eaux Vive neighborhood of Geneva is one of the trendiest in the city, with great cafes, bars and restaurants. It's also close to the lake and Geneva's local beach, which is a great attraction in summer.

name: Private bedroom in a flat, 500m from train station
description:
We are two French people living in Geneva and propose a private room in our flat. For tourism or for a night for professionnal trip, our flat is located at 5 minutes from the train station walking and 7 minutes from the lake. We are at 2 minutes from the Tramway 15 which crosses Geneva.
You will have the bathroom available (shared with us) and your private room, quite big, with a cosy space (Fatboy) and a small deck.
We provide a homemade breakfast in the morning.

Guest access
Access, 5 minutes from the train station. The airport is 7 minutes by train from the train station. So you can be in less than 30 minutes in our flat after landing.
You can also come with the tram 15.

Other things to note
The bed is composed by two 90x200cm mattresses.
The visitor's tax of 3,75CHF / person / night, taken by the Geneva Canton is included in the price. That is why for 2 people, it's 5CHF more expensive
host_about: Passionné de sport, de nature, j'adore rencontrer du monde, discuter, échanger sur toutes sortes de sujets.

name: Stunning home in Geneva suburb, ideal for families
description:
A beautiful modern villa in leafy suburb of Geneva. Spacious, bright, with design furniture and arty atmosphere. Relaxing garden with terrace for outdoor dining, deck chairs and Big Green Egg bbq. Top of the range kitchen, dining room and basement library with natural light and double sofa bed. All bedrooms have access to spacious balcony. Ideal for families with young children : veranda playroom, two children’s bedrooms with toys. Eco-friendly cooling system. Wifi etc.

The space
The house is large, with 3 floors of 100m2. The ground floor and top floor our luminous and have outdoor access. Child protection gates for staircase are on main floors.

Guest access
Access to full house.
neighborhood_overview: A gem of an area. Nature on your doorstep, with direct tram to city center at 5min walk. With river walks, play parks, pony farm and beautiful countryside accessible outside the front door. Lovely neighborhood, with friendly, international neighbors. Just 10mins from airport/20mins from city.

name: Sunny large apartment in international Geneva
description:
Enjoy life in this large sunny two-bedroom apartment in Petit-Saconnex at the heart of international Geneva.

102 square metres floor space with large south-facing balcony and all-day sunshine. Park view of Jardin de la Paix and Le Salève.

Secure entry building within 15 minutes' walk to the United Nations, less than 10 minutes' drive from airport.

A comfortable and safe apartment for an international lifestyle localised during the pandemic.

The space
Apartment traverses the entire length of the building. Living space and balcony receive full-day sunshine during winter time with double-glazed windows for insulation and sound-proofing.

Apartment comes equipped with:
• Washing machine and dryer (in bathroom)
• Fully equipped kitchen
• Microwave oven
• Dish washer
• Unlimited Wi-Fi
• Television including 200+ channels
• Nespresso coffee machine
• Juice/soup blender
• Electric ri
neighborhood_overview: This building is surrounded by two large parks in a residential neighbourhood close to the offices of the United Nations and international organisations such as the ICRC. Easily accessible by public transport at the heart of international Geneva with nice restaurants and cafes.
host_about:
I am an international lawyer who works and teaches on human rights, conflict and peace. I'm keen on fitness, and enjoy playing tennis and basketball, swimming and cycling too. 

I am a citizen of the world, having spent my formative years in Melbourne. I have visited more than 60 countries and lived in 10 countries. I'm both a host and a keen user of Airbnb.

I speak English and Chinese at native level, and am competent in French and a couple of other languages. I love cultures, languages and people. You are welcome to be my host or my guest!

name: Private boat under Geneva’s Jet d’Eau
description:
If you would like an outdoorsy lake experience in the middle of the city under the symbol of Geneva, then this is the place for you. Our boat offers a fantastic view and a unique sleeping experience - you will be lulled to sleep by the gentle rocking of the boat on the waves. During the day, sit above deck and enjoy the refreshing breeze from the Jet d’Eau. The boat offers basic camping amenities and, thanks to its central location, you can find everything else you might want within 200m.
Enjoy!

Other things to note
Trips out on to the lake where you can swim or just relax are available for an extra fee, and more people (up to 6 total) can join for this.
neighborhood_overview: The boat is situated in Geneva’s main port, in Eaux-Vives - a vibrant and busy area with plenty of shops and restaurants nearby. The new Plage Publique des Eaux-Vives, Genève-Plage and Baby-Plage are all within walking distance (not that you will need to go to the beach when you can relax and sunbathe on the boat!)

name: Spacious, comfortable and beautiful room
description:
Large, spacious, high ceilings, big windows and a lot of charm!

This listing is for a private bedroom that is very big and comfortable with a queen sized bed.

There is a fully equipped shared kitchen and very comfortable shared living room.

The flat is centrally located in the Plainpalais neighborhood. Easy access to trams (15, 12 and 18) and bus lines (1). There is a great market in the Plainpalais diamond. Lovely Carouge is also nearby. Easy access to to the UN.

The space
This is very much my home and I am happy to host and share it with you... but don't expect a hotel-like ambience! My two flatmates will also be in the apartment and are very kind and easy going. You'll live like a local but have to keep common areas clean. If you need use of the closet to hang clothes, please make sure to request this. Feel free to write with any questions.
neighborhood_overview: Great cafes, restaurants, and bars are within a few minutes walk. Plainpalais is an excellent and central location.

name: un havre de verdure dans la ville
description:
La Villa Rosa dispose d'une cuisine totalement équipée, un salon avec un coin bureau, une chambre à coucher et une salle de bain. Idéale pour 1 à 2 personnes. Un petit jardin ainsi que 2 terrasses font le charme de cette maison. Le Wifi est gratuit ainsi qu'une place de parking.

The space
Vous planifiez un court séjour ou des vacances à Genève ?
Vous devez vous y rendre pour le travail ?
La Villa Rosa vous propose un appartement indépendant de 3 pièces, idéal pour une ou deux personnes, complètement équipé, avec un petit jardin, ces deux terrasses, et une place de parking gratuite à votre disposition.
Bien des endroits sont faciles d’accès par les transports publics, par exemple les organisations internationales, le lac, le centre-ville, Palexpo, le jardin botanique, l’horloge fleurie et les rues marchandes.
De nombreuses excursions sont possibles, même en une journée, que ce soit en montagne, en campagne, dans les vignobles ou dans les villes

name: Bijou studio in upscale and central area in Geneva
description:
This Bijou studio is located in an upscale district surrounded by some 5 * hotels in the city center of Geneva.The flat is located around a beautiful square and a few seconds walk from the lake and the famous "Rade de Genève". It is in the very center of the city close to the lively district of Paquis and the main train station Cornavin, the studio is however very calm and has a very nice view in a quiet and beautiful park. The studio is very nicely furbished with a king size box spring bed.

The space
There is a King Size bed - Box Spring - of premium and natural quality in the room to ensure the best possible sleep to the guests. There is as well as small kitchen that can be used to cook small things and a fridge that can be freely use. There is a private bathroom with a shower in the flat. There is no WiFi in the flat but unlimited high speed internet access can be bought at cheap price at the shop downstairs opened everyday.

Guest access
neighborhood_overview: The lake is right after the square where the studio is located. You are surrounded by 5 stars hotels, parcs (Jardin des Alpes / monument Brunswick, Square du Mont Blanc, Perle du Lac) and fancy shops and restaurants and the Cornavin train station. The very lively red light district Paquis is close by as well as all the Main Streets for shipping. The Rade de Geneva is a few walks away from the studio.

name: Bright & calm, near lake & center
description:
Lovely, elegant, bright and fresh studio in a calm area 10 min away from the center & the lake. Includes kitchen, dishwasher & washing machine. Fits a couple plus a third person in a sofa-bed. Price includes a portable A/C. I am sorry, I do not accept REQUESTS WITHOUT REVIEWS.

The space
This beautiful modern studio apartment is completely furnished and equipped. The studio has been decorated in style and all facilities are of high quality.

The apartment offers:
- internet wifi (the service is provided by the largest swiss internet provider - Swisscom. )

- Fully équipe kitchen: micro-waves oven, oven, fridge, Nespresso coffee machine, toaster, hot plate
- flat screen TV w/international channels
- flatiron and ironing board
- large closet
- towels and bedsheets
- dishes ad kitchen accessories
- speaker Bluetooth

Guest access
All the flat
neighborhood_overview: It’s calm/not noisy at night (unlike other places in Geneva), but very well situated.   It’s 2 blocks away from one of the most beautiful parks in Geneva. You’ll find supermarkets, banks & everything you need 2 blocks away as well.  You can find a convenience store open till late in the corner, as well as a Peruvian restaurant.  Bus 3 and 8 will take you to the center or lake.
host_about:
I love to travel and do many things on the weekend in our city & nearby places.

I am active (I like riding my bike and swimming), easy-going, but a private person.

name: Cozy room with desk and couch - Room 2
description:
The room is part of a very cute swiss chalet vibe two-bedroom furnished apartment that is in a perfect location in Geneva.
It is, by bus, 5 min from Nation, 15 min from the Airport, 5 min from Gare Cornavin (Geneva main train station).

To share, there is the kitchen, the living room, and the balcony. There is a washing machine at your disposal and also a dishwasher. All amenities included.

The space
The space has a very beautiful Swiss Chalet vibe that will make the stay very unique.
It is on the last floor therefore, therefore there will not be any issues with noise.

Guest access
You can use all of the apartament except the other bedroom.

Other things to note
The elevator is an 1930 lift. It is very pretty but need to be careful with the doors. They need to be fully closed in order for the elevator to operate.

Hello, 

My name is Anda and I will be more than glad to welcome you to my mom's apartment. 

At the moment the apartment is vacant as my moms are living in Zurich, therefore I had the idea to sub-lease the rooms from Airbnb.

Unfortunately, I will not be there and there is a huge chance that we won't meet, as my work occupies most of my day.

name: Châtelaine : appartement pratique
description:
C'est avec un grand plaisir que nous vous accueillerons à Genève. Châtelaine est un quartier de la commune de Vernier, divers supermarchés, bars, restaurants, et pharmacie sont également à proximité. Vernier est la deuxième commune la plus peuplée du canton après Genève. Vous trouverez le centre de Genève à près de 20 minutes en bus (5 minutes à pied), et moins de 10 minutes en voiture afin de vous rendre rapidement aux principaux points importants de Genève, gare, centre-ville et lac.

Il y a un accès reversé : code ou clés pour ouvrir les portes principale de la résidence et ensuite une clés pour entrer. name: Light elegant apt Eaux Vives, Geneva
description:
Lovely sunny apt Eaux Vives available also to shirt or long term. Large open plan sitting room and dining room (two rooms in one), balcony, fully equipped kitchen 65 sqm. Bedroom with double bed and good cupboard space, bathroom, separate loo/toilet.

Jolie apt ensoleillé et meublé dispo Coutsem et long terme. Draps, lins, wif. Double chambre à coucher, salon ouvert sur salle à manger, balcon qui donne sur la mairie des Eaux Vives, cuisine équipé, salle de bains et toilette séparé. 65m2!

The space
Elegant apt

Guest access
All

Other things to note
Best area in Geneva and close to lake!
neighborhood_overview: Close to lake, supermarket, parking, fabulous cafes and restaurants.
host_about:
I travel extensively for work and pleasure and enjoy meeting new people.  I lived and worked in the US, Kenya, South Africa, Italy and Switzerland.  I also love to ski and have a place in the mountains if you are interested.

I am tidy and a non smoker and I love my balcony and a view of any park, nature or river. So this apt is perfect as it overlooks Battersea Park!

name: Studio 5-minutes walk from Geneva-Cornavin Station
description:
The luxury 4-star Hotel Royal is located at the heart of the city. The best of Geneva, the Leman lake and the vibrant neighbourhoods are within walking distance.

Complimentary WiFi, fitness, sauna, hammam and a unique gastronomic experience complete the range of services that invite you to come and enjoy the luxury 4-star Hotel Royal.

Studio (20m2) is equipped with kitchenette (hotplates, fridge and dishes), office space, telephone, flat screen LCD TV and Internet access.

The space
Minimum 7 nights stay is required.

Free transportation card are offered.

Housekeeping service will be made each 4 days.

Check-in time : Rooms are available from 3.00 PM on the arrival day.
Check-out time : Rooms must be vacated at the latest by 12.00 AM on the departure day.
neighborhood_overview: Close to everything and -above all- to you.

name: Apparemment en compagne calme et chaleureux
description:
The space
nous vous proposons un appartement de 140m situé dans un jolie corps de ferme au centre d'un village bucolique.
Au coeur des vignes de la campagne Genevoise, vous mettrez environ 15 minutes pour vous rendre au lac leman dans le centre de Genève.
Notre logement est idéal pour 1 ou 2 familles avec enfants de tout âges. Equipement bébé au complet, jouets etc..
le village est desservis par un bus toutes les 30 minutes, 2 restaurants se trouvent à 100m de notre domicile et la fermette ouverte 7/7 c'est l'épicerie du village.
place de parking disponible à l'extérieur de la résidence.

Hello,

I am offering a cozy bed and place to stay in a 4.5 room apartment in Chênes-Bougeries with my 2 lovely and calm pets.
The appartement is located close to a grocery store, Migros, a gas station and a small kids park. It’s 15 minutes from the city center in a quiet area, near the park ( parc de la Grange/Eauxvives), the lake Lac Léman, 3 minutes from the bus stop and 10 minutes from the tram stop.

The space
Homey, quiet place with the possibility of using everything that’s in the appartement.

Guest access

name: OUTSTANDING APARTMENT IN CENTRAL GENEVA
description:
Outstanding apartment (90 m2) located in central Geneva.
The apartment is located in a 20th century building with lots of character. The area is extremely quiet and pleasant, with a park a few steps from the building and the Rhône river at 300 meters. Moldings, high ceilings, marble fireplace, wood floorings and large rooms make this place unique. Interiors by a decorator.

Other things to note
Enfants non admis. Animaux domestiques non admis. Pas de fêtes. Fumer est interdit à l'intérieur de l'appartement.
host_about:
Swiss-Italian interior designer. Passionated by art, architecture, design, fashion, travels, good food and music. 
Italian, French, English and Spanish speaking.

our house is in la plaine where it is surrounded by absolute beauty of nature. in front of our appartment, we have rhone river and behind, we have green vineyard. this place is only 18 minute from the center of Geneve and 4 minutes from the train station.So, altogether to go to gare cornavin is about 20 minutes. we have all the essential kitchen stuff. this house is with 2 children. so there is 2 cribs and many things that kids can play. this apartment is new apartment so an big elevator.

host_about:
If you can keep your head when all about you;
  Are losing theirs and blaming it on you,
 If you can trust yourself when all men doubt you,
  But make allowance for their doubting too.
 If you can wait and not be tired by waiting,
  Or being lied about, don't deal in lies,
 Or being hated, don't give way to hating,
  And yet don't look too good, nor talk too wise:

 If you can dream—and not make dreams your master;
  If you can think—and not make thoughts your aim;
 If you can meet with Triumph and Disaster,
  And treat those two impostors just the same;
 If you can bear to hear the truth you've spoken
  Twisted by knaves to make a trap for fools,
 Or watch the things you gave your life to, broken,
  And stoop and build 'em up with worn-out tools:

 If you can make a heap of all your winnings
  And risk it on one turn of pitch-and-toss,
 And lose, and start again at your beginnings
  And never breathe a word about your loss;
 If you can force your heart and nerve and sinew
  To serve your turn long after they are gone,
 And so hold on when there is nothing in you
  Except the Will which says to them: "Hold on!"

 If you can talk with crowds and keep your virtue,
  Or walk with Kings—nor lose the common touch,
 If neither foes nor loving friends can hurt you,
  If all men count with you, but none too much;
 If you can fill the unforgiving minute
  With sixty seconds' worth of distance run,
 Yours is the Earth and everything that's in it,
  And—which is more—you'll be a Man, my son!

name: Villa campagne genevoise, jacuzzi en été.
host_about:
Fraîchement retraitée, j'ai du temps pour recevoir mes hôtes dans quatre chambres doubles, avec salles de bains, dans le cadre de "Mon jardin en Ville". Il est aussi possible de louer les chambres avec accès à la cuisine et au reste de l'appartement ou de louer tout l'appartement-souplex. Après quelques missions humanitaires, d'où j'ai ramené meubles et décorations, j'ai aménagé un souplex-loft dans une zone industrielle, sur la rive-droite de Genève, proche de toutes commodités. Avec mon conjoint, nous prenons plaisir à recevoir des personnes de passage à Genève. Comme j'aime m'occuper de mon jardin, j'en profite aussi pour préparer des confitures, sirops, pâtes de fruits avec des fruits du jardin. Une deuxième résidence à Collex (canton de Genève), est également mise en location avec 5 chambres dans une villa mise en colocation pour des périodes de longue durée, voire â l'année. Un troisième logement, situé en bord de mer, en Catalogne, à Ametlla-de-Mar, est également mis en location. C'est un appartement de 4 chambres pouvant accueillir 6 personnes.
Ma devise: "La vie est une œuvre d'art très difficile, et, parti de rien, c'est déjà beaucoup que d'en réussir quelques parties, en travaillant et en économisant ". 
Citation de Henry Becque ; Les pensées et notes d'alb (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)

name: ★★★ Appartement de standing aux Eaux-Vives ★★★
description:
Magnifique appartement situé dans le quartier des eaux vives à 2 min à pied du jet d'eau et du Lac Léman.
L'appartement de 75 m² dispose d'un large salon et salle à manger, d'une grande chambre, d'une salle de bain en marbre équipé d'une baignoire et d'une douche et un toilette pour invités. A noter une cuisine professionnelle entièrement équipé pour les amateurs de cuisine.
Une lingerie se trouve dans le bâtiment accessible uniquement aux locataires.

The space
Le logement se compose ainsi :
- Un grand salon / salle à manger spacieux et très ensoleillé. Il est doté d'un écran plat avec un accès à de nombreuses chaines ainsi qu'à la plateforme Netflix.
- Une cuisine professionnelle entièrement équipée
- Une grande chambre à coucher.
- Une magnifique salle de bain en marbre composé d'une douche, d'une baignoire, d'un toilette et d'une vasque.
- Un toilette privé pour les invités

Guest access
Tout le logement
neighborhood_overview:
Eaux-Vives Cité est l’un des huit grands quartiers de Genève. Au cœur de la Ville, longeant la rive gauche du lac Léman, il se situe entre les quartiers Plainpalais Jonction et Champel.
Dans ce quartier apprécié des touristes, les habitant-e-s d’Eaux-Vives Cité bénéficient d’une large offre culturelle: théâtres, musées, salles de concert.
Le quartier Eaux-Vives Cité est environné d'eau. Son tracé longe la rive gauche du lac entre Genève Plage et la rue de l'Arquebuse, limite de la Jonction. Au bord du lac, le quai Gustave-Ador est bordé d'immeubles de haut standing datant principalement du tournant du XXe siècle. Plusieurs de ces bâtiment sont coiffés d'enseignes lumineuses qui illuminent la rade en soirée. On peut également y voir le jet d'eau, célèbre emblème de Genève, qui fait partie des curiosités du quartier.

description:
Enfin du NOUVEAU à Genève !

Profitez d'un logement exceptionnel au centre de Genève et vivez une expérience inoubliable !
Notre HouseBoat est un véritable appartement flottant tout aménagé, une suite de luxe lacustre digne d'un 5 étoiles. Votre séjour sera certainement particulier et inoubliable.
A noter que Le HouseBoat est un bateau flambant neuf. Il a été construit pendant l'été 2020 et a été livré en septembre 2020 à Genève.

1 chambre

neighborhood_overview:
Le HouseBoat est situé au port des Pâquis.
Le bar "La Terrasse" situé a 50m vous accueille tout les jours de beau temps pendant la saison estivale. Pour la baignade, le "bains des pâquis" est a 1 minute a pied. Le parc de La Perle du lac est au bout du quai a 500m. Grâce au service de Tramway et de bus de la ville de Genève, vous pouvez vous rendre au jardin botanique en 5 min (2 arrêts), ainsi que partout en ville pour découvrir nos monuments, musés, restaurants et activités.

Situé au cœur de la ville, longeant la rive gauche du lac Léman, le quartier des Eaux-Vives est l’un des quartiers les plus prisé de Genève entouré de beaux parcs, d’un grand nombres de restaurants et du lac à proximité.

name: Luxurious one-Bedroom serviced apartment in Geneva
description:
A spacious apartment that’s ideal when visiting or working in Geneva for min. 5 nights.
Whether you come for business or pleasure, the Hôtel Bristol Genève is superbly located at 2 steps from the lake, the shopping and the financial districts and at only 5 minute-walk from the train station.
The duplex one-bedroom apartment is also available for intimate gatherings. Relax in our spacious apartment & benefit from more space, privacy as well as a fully equipped kitchen. Daily housekeeping service

The space
Benefit from these exclusive benefits:
Daily housekeeping service
50% off laundry service
Welcome fruit basket
Voucher of CHF 10.- for a dinner of CHF 40.- and above ordered at the restaurant
Free access to the on-site wellness centre – 200m2 with fitness, saunas, jacuzzi and steambath
24-hour Concierge/ Reception
Domestic pets welcome
Free public transports

Other things to note
Mandatory ci
neighborhood_overview:
Often known as the busy hub for diplomacy and banking, Geneva’s well preserved monuments and splendid natural settings make the perfect destination.
With so much to do and see in Geneva, and with the Bristol’s unbeatable location in the heart of the city, two steps from the lake, no stay seems long enough
host_about: Located in the city centre at two steps from the lake, yet nestled away from the bustle of Geneva, Bristol Hotel is an urban retreat, enveloped by the peace of the Mont-Blanc garden.

name: Cozy Room in Carouge, Geneva
description:
Welcome to Carouge! Enjoy your stay in this 2-person bedroom in a freshly renovated 90m2 apartment with a view onto Geneva (5th floor with elevator). Bars, restaurants and the local theatre are only a short walk away or you can reach the city centre of Geneva in a few minutes by tram.

Facilities available: - washing machine, oven, microwave, bathtub, closet, bicycle room

The space
We rent our spare bedroom on occasion.
It has a double bed with a view right onto Geneva. The room is also equipped with a dresser and a wardrobe. The kitchen, bathroom, toilet and living room is to be shared with us.

A hairdryer, shampoo, shower gel, coffee and tea are available upon request.

Earlier time for check-in can be discussed.

Guest access
All the flat except other rooms
neighborhood_overview: Best neighborhood in Geneva, 5 min to the countryside, 5 min to the nice bars and charming places of Carouge on the other side.

name: Chambre double -Hôtel Excelsior -offre long séjour
description:
L'hôtel Excelsior est idéalement située en plein-cœur de Genève, à deux pas du lac Léman. Les principaux sites touristiques, centres de congrès et d'affaires sont facilement accessibles à pieds ou en transports publics. Pour faciliter vos déplacements, une carte vous sera offerte à votre arrivée et vous permettra d'utiliser tous les transports publics gratuitement à Genève pendant votre séjour.

The space
Idéal pour un séjour en solo ou à deux, nos chambres doubles sont équipées d'une penderie, d'un coffre qui peut accueillir un ordinateur portable et d'une table de travail. Elles disposent d'une salle de bain privative.

Guest access
En plus de la chambre réservée, l'accès au lobby de l'hôtel est libre pour y travailler ou simplement y passer du bon temps

Other things to note
L'hôtel Excelsior est un établissement familial 3* répondant aux normes de classification hôtelière suisse
neighborhood_overview:
Bénéficiez d’un emplacement exceptionnel pour visiter Genève. Notre hôtel est proche de la vieille ville, de la cathédrale, du jardin anglais et son horloge fleurie ainsi que du jet d’eau. L’été, vous apprécierez la proximité du lac pour vous y rafraichir ou profiter des nombreuses animations organisées sur ses rives. Une multitude de restaurants, de salles de cinéma et de spectacles, comme le Grand Théâtre ou le BFM, sont accessibles en quelques minutes et vous garantiront des soirées agréables.

Pour vous rendre à vos rendez-vous d’affaire, il ne vous suffira que de traverser le pont de la machine pour atteindre le quartier des banques et le centre des affaires.

name: Exceptional Flat - Art Déco / Scandinavian - 105m2
description:
Hey Hey,

Welcome to our marvelous 105m2 Geneva cocoon that will be happy to host you during your stay. The flat is located in Geneva, 2 minutes walk from the Rhone river and 10 minutes (with the bus) from the Geneva Cornavin train station.

The flat is brand new and well furnished and can host up to 5 people (two in the bedroom, 1 on the sofa in bedroom 1 and two on the convertible sofa).

We have 1 garden and 1 terrace !

The space
Located on the ground floor, the flat is 105 m2 and composed of a living room, 2 bedrooms, one kitchen, one bathroom and 1 toilet.

Kindly note this flat is our main residence so our personal furniture are still in the flat with limited space for travelers' personal belongings.

Also, please be very careful to :

- Take off your shoes before entering the flat (No shoes inside)
- The walls are easily damageable and will rub/stain very easily if you put your hands on it.
neighborhood_overview: The flat is located in the Saint-Jean neighboorhood which is residential and very calm !
host_about: Hey, my name is Nathan, a French guy travelling on the continents of the world. Always happy to discover new cultures !

name: Loft en souplex,pour un couple+billard et pingpong
description:
Loft en partie inférieur dun souplex, entouré d'un jardin nourrissier, en plein centre-ville. L'arrêt des bus 6-10-19 se situe à 100 mètres.

The space
Composé d'une chambre fermée, d'une salle de douche + w-c+lavabo double-vasque, d'un grand séjour avec kitchenette, il est agrémenté d'un canapé lit dont l'espace peut être clos par des rideaux anti-bruit. Idéal pour un couple éventuellement avec enfants ou/et bébé.

Guest access
Tout le loft est accessible
host_about:
Fraîchement retraitée, j'ai du temps pour recevoir mes hôtes dans quatre chambres doubles, avec salles de bains, dans le cadre de "Mon jardin en Ville". Il est aussi possible de louer les chambres avec accès à la cuisine et au reste de l'appartement ou de louer tout l'appartement-souplex. Après quelques missions humanitaires, d'où j'ai ramené meubles et décorations, j'ai aménagé un souplex-loft dans une zone industrielle, sur la rive-droite de Genève, proche de toutes commodités. Avec mon conjoint, nous prenons plaisir à recevoir des personnes de passage à Genève. Comme j'aime m'occuper de mon jardin, j'en profite aussi pour préparer des confitures, sirops, pâtes de fruits avec des fruits du jardin. Une deuxième résidence à Collex (canton de Genève), est également mise en location avec 5 chambres dans une villa mise en colocation pour des périodes de longue durée, voire â l'année. Un troisième logement, situé en bord de mer, en Catalogne, à Ametlla-de-Mar, est également mis en location. C'est un appartement de 4 chambres pouvant accueillir 6 personnes.
Ma devise: "La vie est une œuvre d'art très difficile, et, parti de rien, c'est déjà beaucoup que d'en réussir quelques parties, en travaillant et en économisant ". 
Citation de Henry Becque ; Les pensées et notes d'alb (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)

See you soon in Geneva ! :) 
Sébastien

name: Fascinating villa with panoramic view of the lake
description:
Located in prized Cologny, this three-level villa nestled in a green setting of more than 2,200 m2 offers a splendid view of the lake and the water jet.

With 480 m2 of usable area and awash in light, this magnificent property enjoys a unique character and one of the most beautiful views of the Left Bank.

The space
The ground floor consists of an entrance hall with cloakroom, large kitchen, dining room, two bedrooms with en-suite shower room, and a double living room with upscale fireplace and lake view overlooking the winter lounge and a large terrace.

The 1st floor offers a dressing room, three bedrooms en suite (one is the master bedroom), study and access to two balconies enjoying a panoramic view of the lake.

Each room in this property has been carefully decorated with high-quality materials.

name: Amazing panorama on the Salève
description:
Residence "Pierres aux Arbres" - apartment « Salève »

This magnificent flat is located in an old farmhouse completely renovated in 2020.

The property, only 2.5 km away from Carouge, is connected with the public transport (10 minutes on foot or 5 by bike): Bus 45 - Pont de Drize; Bus 41 - Milière; Bus 8 - Veyrier Tournettes.

The Léman Express train (Lancy-Bachet stop) is 10 minutes by bike or 5 minutes by car; the motorway, exit Archamps or Etrembières, is also 10 minutes by car.

The space
With its exposed wooden beams and tastefully chosen furniture, this 2-room apartment has a sophisticated charm and is organized to accommodate 3 people:

• a bright living room with a sofa-bed and a modern fully equipped kitchen

• a bedroom with a large and practical built-in wooden wardrobe and an office space with wifi to work comfortably.

• a bathroom (sink, toilet and shower) with a washing machine and a func
neighborhood_overview:
The residences "Pierres aux arbres" is the perfect balance between the poetry of the countryside and the comforts of the city.

The view on the Salève as well as the colours of the sun rise and the sunset make this place increbible wonderful and will give you a special remembering of your staying in Geneva.

Troinex is a small and cosy village offering also a grocery shop, a post office and café.

In the neighbourhood you can enjoy walking around among corn and vegetable fields and vineyards.

name: Beautiful new loft with a view
description:
Visitors will love the zen ambiance and calm countryside surroundings of this newly redone loft.

Stairs from the street lead to the first floor featuring a modern kitchen and elegant dining area. The second floor offers a cozy seating area for reading or working. A fully-equipped bathroom comes with a washer-dryer. The large top-floor bedroom overlooks the magnificent Alpes and country fields. A queen-sized bed, clothes hangers and storage space offer visitors comfort and practicality.

The space
The loft retained the traditional rustic features of the original farmhouse, such as ancient wooden beams and a peaked rooftop. The newly redone interior materials include all-natural woods and stone. The space is very luminous. Convenient velux windows in all areas of the loft let the light and fresh air in.
neighborhood_overview: Choulex is a small village in the surrounding countryside of Geneva, about 7 kilometers from the city center. Vineyards and fields surround the neighborhood. Il est spacieux et fonctionnel. Le balcon est grand et offre une jolie vue sur le centre ville, le Mont-Blanc, et le Jura de l'autre côté. 3.5 pièces genevois avec séjour spacieux, cuisine, entrée, chambre, et grand balcon exposé sud avec vue sur Alpes (Mont-Blanc) et Jura.

proximité nombreux commerces et gare Cornavin à 5mn en tram, 10mn à pieds.

Guest access
Les voyageurs ont accès à l'entièreté du logement
host_about:
Hello dear hosts!

What I do at home? Music, electronics, mountain, etc. But when I travel I like to be surprised and I can become a BD fan for a week-end in Brussel, a civilization passionate in Greece, or a Beer specialist in Czech Republik (valid in Belgium too :) ). I am very curious and like to live the travel experience getting deep in the country or city culture, taking each day as it comes! 

With friends, family or alone, I thank you for the home you offer us for the trip, and I can tell you that your home will be in good hands :)!

description:
Great location, private free parking, wifi, 55inch flat screen tv with 500 channel Swisscom tv with many languages and countries plus netflix subscription included.
There are 4 bedrooms in total all with private bathrooms. The price is per room.

name: ★★★ Appartement de charme aux Eaux-Vives ★★★
description:
Magnifique appartement situé dans le quartier des Eaux-Vives.
Il se trouve au deuxième étage d'un bâtiment calme et sécurisé accessible par un ascenseur.
L'appartement de 75 m² dispose d'un large salon donnant sur un balcon, d'une grande chambre, d'une cuisine entièrement équipée et d'une salle de bain dotée d'une baignoire.
Un accès internet par wifi est disponible dans l'ensemble du logement.

The space
Le logement se compose ainsi :
- Un grand salon spacieux et très ensoleillé.
- Une cuisine entièrement équipée.
- Une grande chambre à coucher.
- Une salle de bain composé d'une baignoire, d'un toilette et d'une vasque.

Le logement se situe au deuxième étage accessible par ascenseur d'un charmant immeuble. Le logement dispose de la connection internet.

Guest access
Accès à tout le logement.
neighborhood_overview:
Eaux-Vives Cité est l’un des huit grands quartiers de Genève. Au cœur de la Ville, longeant la rive gauche du lac Léman, il se situe entre les quartiers Plainpalais Jonction et Champel.
Dans ce quartier apprécié des touristes, les habitant-e-s d’Eaux-Vives Cité bénéficient d’une large offre culturelle: théâtres, musées, salles de concert.
Le quartier Eaux-Vives Cité est environné d'eau. Son tracé longe la rive gauche du lac entre Genève Plage et la rue de l'Arquebuse, limite de la Jonction. Au bord du lac, le quai Gustave-Ador est bordé d'immeubles de haut standing datant principalement du tournant du XXe siècle. Plusieurs de ces bâtiment sont coiffés d'enseignes lumineuses qui illuminent la rade en soirée. On peut également y voir le jet d'eau, célèbre emblème de Genève, qui fait partie des curiosités du quartier.

host_about:
Né à Genève, je vous accueil pour faire de votre séjour une expérience agréable et sympathique...

Passionnés par les voyages, et ayant vécu deux ans en Chine, et avoir voyagé en Afrique, et en Asie, c'est après avoir testé AIRBNB en Espagne et en France que j'ai eu envie à mon tour de faire découvrir ma belle ville de Genève.

Je me passionne également pour le cinéma, et la moto.

Je vous propose de séjourner au Eaux-Vives, un quartier animé et vivant à deux pas du Jet d'eau. A 5 min en transport en commun du centre de Genève.

Romain

neighborhood_overview: La commune de Meinier est composée de plusieurs villages ou hameaux. D'une part, le village de Meinier, dont l'origine du nom proviendrait du bas latin Mainicum ou Mainiacum, d'autre part, les hameaux du Carre-d'Amont et du Carre-d'Aval, dont les noms dérivent de quadrivium, qui signifie carrefour et puis Compois, appelé aussi Copeis ou Compeys, qui autrefois était Compensium. Le hameau de Corsinge, Corsingium, ou Cursingium aurait un nom de formation germanique. Le nom du dernier hameau Essert, proviendrait de ex sortum, terre défrichée. Au cours des siècles, plusieurs châteaux furent érigés sur le territoire de la commune de Meinier, en particulier celui de Rouelbeau, dont ne subsistent que quelques ruines.
host_about:
Hospitality professional, we are dedicated to provide superior customer service with attentiveness to inquiries and our guests while they are staying with us. 
The owners of the different apartments / houses trust us in managing their properties on their behalf and we hope you will trust us with your stay.

We will be happy to help you before and during your stay to find the best restaurant, bar and museum.
We speak French and English, we have some Russian notions.

So do not hesitate one second, we are here for you !

Looking forward to welcoming you soon

Best regards.
Philibert and Benjamin

I Work in Wine and I m not often home. The flat is in a park so no noise at all. You can use the Kitchen , living room and balcony . See you!

name: Great apart Geneva center Plainpalais Uni-Mail
description:
Beautiful studio with balcony. Great location. Perfect for a couple or single voygeurs. Direct bus or tram from the train station Cornavin (8-10 min).
Big grocery store just in 100 meters from apartment.

Other things to note
Parties and smoking are prohibited. Any excessive sound from 22:00-8:00 will be announced immediately to the police agent in charge . Fine 1’000 chf and persecution. Sound detectors installed.

Les fêtes sont interdites. Fumer est interdit. Toute tapage nocturne est interdit. La police est appelée immédiatement. L’amende à partir de 1’000 chf et la poursuite. Détecteur de bruits installés.

Chers hôtes,

Nous vous informons que le nettoyage de la vaisselle et de la cuisine ne sont pas compris dans le tarif journalier de l’appartement ni dans les frais de ménage.

Dès lors, nous vous prions de bien vouloir laisser la vaisselle et la cuisine dans le même état, qu’à votre arrivée.

Le cas

name: Geneva, Carouge, 40M²
description:
A fully furnished and quiet studio in Carouge (Geneva) with a bedroom and a kitchen, located just minutes from the Geneva center.

The apartment offers you a maximum of comfort on 40m2. Our service includes bed linen, bath towels, a fully equipped kitchen, where you will find all the utilities such as crockery, pans, and other cooking accessories as well as a coffee machine.
